title: Very Tiny Rooms
desc: Check-in was a hassle as there was someone at the door completing the health status questionnaire and reviewing your reservation, before you head to the front desk at the lobby to complete the check-in. There was quite a queue due to these double layer of checks. Booked the Alcove Terrace Room which seems to be good for one person. There is hardly enough space to move about the room. The room is basic with the wash basin incorporated into the room, while the bathroom has a WC and shower stall. I had the balcony where I thought it would be a nice place to hangout or do some work, but it turned out to be full of fallen leaves and muddy.

title: It was very nice environment.
desc: Staff Raz Was very nice and fast doing transaction. He was very kind and polite at the front desk. The room was very cozy and relax. Good environment. Would recommend to come and have a staycation at M Social Hotel.

title: Enjoyed our stay!
desc: It was a pleasant stay at M Social Hotel. The location was relatively quiet as it was not facing any major roads and the at the back of the hotel is the nice and calm Singapore river. There are a lot of food and cafe options just beside the hotel and it is located in the middle of very popular dining spots visited by expats and locals alike. The check-in and out was very smooth. Although the Alcove Cosy room wasn't the biggest, it was very quiet (with good noise cancellation from the walls) and very comfy. The design of the room and lighting was also very modern, clean-cut and soothing. Would definitely visit again in future! :)

title: Friendly and helpful staff
desc: Concierge staff was very kind and helpful in helping to make a last minute booking after my mistake of booking a wrong date. The atmosphere was very welcoming and room was very nice and clean. Definitely highly recommend and will come again.

title: Staycay
desc: Was here for a staycay away from work stress…!!!! And was so pleased with Raymond greeting us with a warm welcome… The room is Cozy…Clean…And importantly INSTAGRAMABLE…!!!! Manage to chill and relax at the pool.. Checking out was attended by Ms Gretchen and she was really approachable :)

title: Stayca + perfume making class
desc: Great staycation. Booked via Klook. Package included a perfume making class. Maria's attentive and very patient to us, explain all the different smells and what matches. Great experience in short. Will definitely recommend to friends/family.

title: Maison G Perfume Workshop
desc: The workshop was really great and insightful. We had a hard choice deciding which scent to go for but Maria was really helpful and patient to guide us through the whole process. We'll definitely recommend others to try as well!

title: Grea stay!
desc: Nice to come because of breakfast, staff Hazirah was nice and welcoming! Extended stay as Hazirah was really accomodating. Other staff is nice and friendly. Great atmosphere. Will definitely come here again

title: Cleared one of the things from my bucket list!
desc: My friend and I participated this workshop with two others and I really enjoyed it a lot. It was a great experience with Meria, she was very patient teaching us, guiding us through and recommending the different scents that would suit us based on what we like and dislike. Really thankful for that!!

title: Unpleasant Experience
desc: Unpleasant experience overall. 1. Check-in: check out time was supposed to be 12pm. But instead was told that our check out time was 11am because we arrived 1 hour earlier than the check in time at 3pm. proceeded to tell us this was due to the COVID-19 restrictions but we have also stayed at other hotels before and such a "restriction" was never used on us. This was not stated in the terms and conditions. 2. Request for amenities: Requested for for ice bucket and wine glass but was told that I had to personally head down to the front desk to retrieve it myself, which was fine. However, upon approaching front desk staff, was told that we had to get it from the resturant ourselves instead. Proceeded to the restaurant and was then told by the resturant that they "ran out of

title: Amazing time!
desc: Thoroughly enjoyed my workshop and the staff Novelia is super nice and friendly. She even gave helpful recommendation on creating our custom scent. Definitely an experience I would not forget and would come back again.

title: Perfume making
desc: Guided with clear instruction. And the staff are all very welcoming. I had made my very first perfume, with my bf. It’s out very first workshop too! I thank the staff for their wonderful service, and will definitely come back again.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Novelia is very cheerful and has great energy. Also very helpful in helping us decipher which scent combinations work for us. However the workshop being 45 minutes it wasn’t very educational. I would like to see more information about how to combine and choose the top, middle and base notes.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Very interesting workshop with Novelia, she’s attentive and makes the workshop fun! Highly recommended! Managed to create the scent I want ultimately. Pls visit if you wan to create your own scent 💪🏻💪🏻💪🏻

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Very good workshop. Highly recommended! Host for the workshop is really friendly and helpful. Went all the mile in helping us to choose the scents that are suitable for us. Definitely worth the time and money!

title: Perfume workshop
desc: We had fun! It was an exciting experience! Novella was friendly in guiding and recommending different scents! Highly recommended! 😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊

title: Maison21G perfume making workshop
desc: Novella was a great workshop conductor, very friendly and engaging. Workshop was very interesting, there is a wide range of scents, it was interesting to learn how different scents comes together and produce a unique perfume customized to each one's liking

title: Perfume Workshop
desc: Staycation was on another date so we came back again to have the perfume workshop. It was simple and easy to follow! Trainer was very patient in explaining and guiding us along too. Everyone should try it!

title: Finding your perfect scent
desc: The whole experience was super fun and well guided to discover the scent I love amongst so many permutations! Had really good guidance from Novelia who made the experience relaxing and fun! Definitely strongly recommended for couples on a retreat!

title: Maison 21G perfume workshop
desc: Guided by Geraldine, my mum and I had a fun and exotic time! You have the opportunity to be spoilt for choice and pick the scents you like to mix as you wish. There’s also an initial personality test to suggest your perfume type, but ultimately Geraldine had good options for me, based on what I shared I prefer. We are satisfied and pleased with our final outcome! A sweet souvenir.

title: Maison 21G perfume workshop
desc: Great fun and very well hosted by Novelia. She was really patient due to my indecisiveness of the scents. She was really knowledgeable about everthing. Highly recommended! Lots of time for us to try out most of the scents as well.

title: Good experience value for money!
desc: We had a good stay at this hotel. We arrived early around 12 :30pm and we are able to check-in there's a small queue but everything went smoothly. We booked the pool from the front office staff. The room is smaller than I expected and the bathroom can only fit 1 person only it's very small you and no bidet. There's a sink near the TV console which i liked we can easily wash our hands. The safe box is not working. Quite noisy from outside you can hear people talking and walking in the aisle. Before going to the pool you need yo go at the reception to get the key and towels. The pool is small but okay not crowded and relaxing. Tried to call room service or front office but no one is answering after 5 times of trying someone answered informed us that there is no room service but

Raymond & Hamzah very friendly & polite, it make nice experience of start at staycation at m social, a small incident happen due unable to open the room, but the staff is willing to come up for help, room is clean, nice & cosy, recommend this place

title: Lousiest service and experience
desc: Hotel staff barged in the room without waiting for response. And hotel did not check the room’s facilities before letting new guest to check in. Worst experience ever. Will definitely never come back.

title: Maison21G Perfume Workshop
desc: Great experience! Booked a package with hotel room. We were given a quiz and from there we narrowed down the scent that we appealed to us most and the trainer will help us concoct a scent with 3 ingredients. We got a bottle of our fragrance home

title: Staycay
desc: Very good, nice room, friendly staff at the reception and perfume workshop. It is recommended. Booked directly from their web site have discount also. 300+ after rediscover voucher come with loft terrace room breakfast and perfume work shop for 2.

title: Thanks Gretchen!
desc: Lovely service 🙂 great terrace loft room. Would be great for couples or friends! Items are a little worn in some places but easy to overlook. Surrounding is quiet as well. Really appreciative of front desk staff’s service, Gretchen as well.

title: Perfume workshop and staycation
desc: Had a lovely time picking out scents and customizing my own perfume. Maria was very helpful in assisting us and telling us more about each scent. Got to take home a bottle of what I’ve customized too. Thank you!

title: Good location, questionable hygiene
desc: Hotel check in was very fast because we are at the front of the queue. First thing that we noticed in the room was an open bottle of water. 2 new bottles of water were given, but old opened bottles were not removed. Bed was stained with blood, and pillowcase had makeup and pen marks. Only good thing about this place was the location.

title: Maison 21g perfume workshop
desc: Had a fun experience creating our customised perfume during our anniversary staycation! Novelia was nice ans patient with explaining the process and creating our desired scent. Thanks for bundling this workshop as part of the staycation package!

title: Maison 21G
desc: Awesome perfume making session with Novelia! She is very patient and knowledgeable. We managed to find our custom scent in no time! I’ll definitely recommend this workshop to everybody who is interested in making their own custom scent.

title: What a warm Welcome provided by M Social Singapore
desc: Queue for more than an hour and still yet to be able to check in. And no action seen taken for such situation. The Queue just go on and on…. What a disappointment for an Staycation…. Still able to see the other guest who was the Groom and the Bride still in the gown as the groom in the Queue…. Is this a Joke Seriously…..

title: Unique loft experience
desc: The staycation kicked off on the right note with an early check in available at 10 plus in the morning. The loft room was located on the 2nd floor at the end of the corridor. Room is generally clean, with a fresh lemon scent. We enjoyed our loft experience. Would highly recommend this room type as it provides acceptable room space for movement. Below are some issues we encounter during our stay: 1. The toilet sensor seems faulty - the toilet lights will switch on by itself in the middle of the night. This has happened thrice overnight. 2. Loose door knob - had difficulty opening the room door 3. Late check out was accorded by one of the front desk staff (we appreciate that! :)) BUT our room key was not changed for the late check out. We were locked out of the room in

title: Bad experience
desc: Hotel service is bad, tried to contact front desk numerous times from 4pm-10am on various issues no one pick up. No calls back too. Called the room service for ice, they requested us to go down to take ourselves instead and their tone is pretty bad rushing to end the phone call. Hotel is severely understaffed. Not recommendable at all as for the similar price u can go to other hotels for better services and amenities.

title: Perfume Workshop
desc: Friendly staff & interesting workshop! Created our very own scent during the workshop in a socially responsible environment. Overall definitely worth a try if you are planning to have a staycation here!

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Had fun making perfumes in this workshop! The trainer Novelia was friendly and patient providing us with all the help on finding our personalised favourite scent. I think I smelled at least 50 different kinds of combination. So much fun! Definitely recommended :)

title: Sub-par, Infuriating Service
desc: Check-in time is ostensibly 3pm. I arrived at 3.26pm, joined the queue for check-in, and only reached the check-in counter at 4.10pm. Mind you, there were only 3 staff checking in the guests. Once at the counter, I was told that my room was not yet ready. I asked why and the check-in dude said “because school holidays and need to prepare for a lot of people. Will call you when room is ready.” No apologies. No estimate given of check-in timing. Question in my head: So if I check in late can I check out late too? Second question in my head: Why didn’t you anticipate the increase in room bookings during the school holidays? Overall sentiment at the moment: Quality of service is really lacking. It’s 4.46pm now and I’m still waiting for my room. I mean… at least do a better job at

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Very fun and interesting 😀 great 👍 experience with good trainer novelia. First time doing it and definitely will recommend to other friends or relatives to visit and attend such classes in future. Thanks

title: pleasant stay
desc: My family enjoyed our stay at the loft rooms. 5th floor longish pool's small but quite ok with the 15 pax safe distancing restriction (prior booking at counter needed) The excellent location helped us explore the Robertson Quay / River Valley / Chinatown area. Some delays in getting the rooms when we were checking in but overall we enjoyed the experience.

title: Great Service, clean rooms!
desc: The services are great! front desk Diyaanah gave great advice on the services available at the hotel. Room attendants also did a great housekeeping job! Thumbs up for the service. The loft room was well kept. Doors were sanitised well and floor was kept clean. Only pity is that there isn’t complimentary parking.

title: M social amenities/staff
desc: The hotel room was beautiful and very spacious. We booked 4 rooms and all of the rooms were kept up to the same standard. The staff (diyaanah) was friendly and very bubbly. Other staffs were also very polite and greeted us.

title: Msocial amenities
desc: The service at hotel Msocial was excellent with a lot of help. Diyaanah was very helpful and cheerful when talking to us . The facilities here are abundant with the cool gym and nice pool and staff are extremely friendly

title: Nice hotel
desc: The hotel area is neat, spacious and nice with good ambience. The room is clean and tidy. The staff are friendly and clear in conversing. The general ambience of the hotel was very calming. Recommended for staycation with families and friends.

title: Book Out staycation
desc: Mr Shafiq gave us & upgrade with nice room with balcony. The pool was nice and amazing. He was pleasant. He also was very welcoming my check in to the hotel. I would look forward to get serve by Mr Shafiq again.

title: Celebrating fiancé birthday
desc: Mr Shafiq was very welcoming upon my check in to the hotel, double confirmed and assured that the booking I made and the room that he checked me into is the correct one, am looking forward to get served by Mr Shafiq once again, had such a pleasant stay :)

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Perfume workshop was fun! Facilitator was friendly and informative, lovely! Time at hotel was great as as well, convenient location, near to town and public transport. Had a really fun time, highly recommended!

title: Fun Perfume-making workshop!
desc: Interesting experience! The quiz was quite informative and had detailed description. There was also a wide spread of perfume choices and it was fun to select and mix the different scents. The guide Marila is also very friendly (: Recommended!

title: Perfume making workshop
desc: It was a fun experience smelling the different scents and experimenting what works and what doesn’t. The facilitator was really friendly and took the time to answer whatever questions we may have. Overall a pleasant experience

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Really enjoyed the workshop as part of staycation package. Novelia was very kind, patient and experienced in helping us navigate the world of smells! Fun and enjoyable bonding activity with my friend :)

title: Perfume making workshop
desc: Had an amazing experience, novelia was extremely professional and knowledgeable in identifying complimentary scents and was really helpful throughout the workshop. Learnt alot and will definitely recommend this to my friends interested in perfumes and scents

title: Perfume Workshop @ M social
desc: Awesome workshop with a great facilitor Novella! Very knowledgeable and had great fun smelling the different scents! Worth it and you get your very own bottle of perfume! :):):):):):):):):):) Small group size as well

title: Staycation with Maison 21G perfume workshop
desc: Awesome and special experience. Thank you teacher Novelia for the professional guidance and patience. Told her what I prefer and she started to adjust the quantity for me. So happy I created a unique scent for myself. I love so much!

title: Perfume workshop
desc: It was such a fun experience! Novelia was very professional and knowledgeable and patient with us with our many questions. I learnt a lot more about perfumes today and even went home with a bottle of self- concocted perfume as recommended and guided by Novelia based on our preference. Wonderful experience. Thank u so much!

title: Perfume Workshop
desc: Came back for a perfume workshop that we dint manage to enjoy during our stay previously due to the tightening of restrictions. Was attended to by Novelia, whom did an amazing job introducing us to the world of scents - very professional, friendly and engaging! Worth the trip back.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Staff is patient to guide , very knowledgeable to mix and match different fragrent for us to smell. Good recommendations , friendly. Overall wonderful experience doing this perfume course and would recommend to friends or family.

title: Accommodation
desc: The hotel staff was great, very friendly and patience with the explanation. Reach there and check in was fast and super efficient and they upgraded my room! Awesome! Thank you for this wonderful experience!

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Superb experience!! Coming from a guy, I feel this has brought new insights to me and I enjoyed the class a lot. Surely recommend this to all couples there who is looking to do something different than the usual dates. Something to bring home for everyone!

title: Perfume workshop staycay
desc: The check in experience was quite upsetting. Could be better improved. For example, I've booked for 3pm workshop with them and upon arrival at 130pm I was told my room was not ready. I had already emailed in to prebook my workshop and would expect that my room should be ready for me to have enough time to settle down and wash up before attending the perfume workshop. Shahira is really nice and helpful to us during the perfume workshop. Really enjoyed ourselves during this session and thanks for sharing with us the different scents and curated a scent for us based on our descriptions. Thanks to her, our day was saved with her hospitality and sincere attitude. Special shoutout to her to make our stay enjoyable. I would highly recommend the perfume workshop!

title: Nice perfume workshop from m social
desc: Trainer was very friendly, patience and knowledgeable. I had fun with the perfume class with my best friend. Definitely recommend friends and couples to attend this workshop. Each perfume already cost around $95 to $100 in retail. We booked through klook and this is definitely worth it.

title: Maison 21G Perfume Workshop
desc: An extremely enjoyable experience. Session was personal, we had 1 instructor guiding 2 of us and it was also timed well. You will be able to find a scent that fits your liking and work for you within an hour, highly recommended.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: It’s a very fun workshop to attend with your partner. Shahira is very helpful in explaining the details and share with us basic knowledge of perfume. She also tries to mix match your favourite scent for you. Definitely a fun workshop!

title: Amazing first experience in perfume workshop
desc: Highly recommend! The manager running the workshop is very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. It was hard for me to decide with the many scent options but she helped me to narrow it down with questions and giving me the time I need. Lots of laughter in the room which helps lighten the mood because choosing a scent is stressful personally. Thankful for Shahira to guide us through patiently. If you haven’t been to a perfume workshop and wanting a wonderful experience, this is the one for you. :)

title: Understaffed?
desc: Booked 1 month in advance for a 2d1n stay at M social. Went to check in at Friday with a bookin slot at 2-2.30pm. Queued outside the hotel for 20mins to fill up a form. Went in the lobby and queued for another 20mins. Room was not ready and was told to wait out. Time was 3pm. Waited a full hr until 4pm before getting the room, late checkout was given but was only given til 1pm. Front desk too very long to pick up until we just gave up entirely. Pricing is rather Low and you will be trading in for rather slow service.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: First time attending a perfume workshop and it was more fun than I anticipated, got to bring home a custom scent that I like too, a really fun activity especially for couples, highly recommended!!!!!!

title: Workshop with Shahira
desc: Shahira was very patient and focused at teaching us the different types of perfume. She is super friendly and approachable, making the workshop fun and engaging! Highly recommend the perfume workshop to everyone.

title: Fun experience @ Maison 21G perfume making workshop
desc: This is definitely fun. The moderator/trainer - Novelia gives you the space to experiment around and gives you suggestion for you to explore further. Overall a great experience! I’ll recommend anyone to try this!

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Shahira was really patient and engaging as she explained to us how perfume is being created as well as the different types of scents and mixtures to us! I had a really enjoyable time learning and creating a unique scent for myself, would highly recommend!

title: Excellent Place to Stay
desc: MSocial was our 3rd hotel in 8 days. It was the best in that price range. To us, it scored 5 stars in customer service, room service, comfort, amenities like a very nice gym & pool. Surrounding environment of Robertson Quay was excellent to stroll during the day or night. All staff have been great. We specially appreciate Hamzah who was very friendly, attentive, warm & has excellent customer service. Even the interns who were involved in housekeeping did their jobs with great cheerfulness. Please keep up the great job! Well done, guys! Best regards, Tiffany & Raeann

title: Great birthday stay with amazing workshops!
desc: M Social stood out because of the workshops they offered and the photos of the room that were displayed. And I am glad we give it a chance! We didn't manage to get a free upgrade, which is understandable because of covid19. The room was cosy enough for the two of us. The staff there are very personable and friendly, even though they all seemed very busy at all time of the day. Huge shoutout and big thanks to Hazirah, at the check in for the birthday wish; Fiona for the very informative and yummy cocktail workshop even for non-drinkers like us; Shahirah for the fun and enjoyable perfume making workshop! Just a quick word of caution that the workshop slots are snapped up quick and might throw a wrench if you come with a tight schedule. But that seems to be an unfortunate

title: Stay in M social with Maison 21 workshop
desc: The lady Shariha attended to us very well. Friendly and very professional. It was a light hearted meaningful workshop. Glad we came and enjoyed. The stay was nice and fun. We look forward to coming again in future.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Had really fun and we had all of Shahira’s attention since it was a two person session due to restrictions. She is super friendly and helpful, very patient and recommends different scents that we may like as well. Will recommend! :) Got to bring back a bottle of perfume too yay!

title: Perfume Making Workshop with Shahira
desc: We booked a staycation at M Social, together with a perfume making workshop. Our host was Shahira and she was incredibly patient, enthusiastic and really attentive in helping us understand more about perfumes! It was amazing and would highly recommend :)

title: Perfume making
desc: Shahira was really knowledgeable about the scents that Maison 21 had to offer. She recommended various combinations after I narrowed down the scents and helped guide me to identify a scent that I was happy with. Definitely something I’d recommend trying out!

title: Perfume workshop & staycay
desc: Enjoyed the perfume workshop which included a 30ml bottle to bring home. This was part of our staycay package. Room stay was ok. Got a room upgrade coz we waited 3 hours to check in. Will prob try the art jamming next time

title: Lack of interaction with staff
desc: I was looking forward to having interactions with the hotel staff as it has been long since I have had a staycation. However, I was disappointed as it seems like this hotel is very reliant on automated systems like their machine servicing robot. I understand that the hotel is a more innovative one but it is a shame to see that they are diverting too much from the usual hospitality aspect of increasing interpersonal relationships with staff...

title: Lousy and disrespectful attitude
desc: Please improve your customer service especially the front desk. Its vomiting and disrespecting. Especially the filipino lady, what kind of lousy attitude is that? Dont give me that i owe u 1million dollar face. 0 star and wont ever return again.

title: Great experience
desc: Staff was very professional and polite during the entire experience. Particularly enjoyed the suggestions generated by the survey which were further refined by the staff present. Was an interesting experience with the wide variety of fragrances.

title: Bad Customer Service
desc: The girl receptionist is very rude in treating the customer. Every time sounds like scolding them. Won’t come again. Supposed to be our special occasion but sadly didn’t get enough happiness as I should due to their service. Too overrated

title: Staycaytion at Loft Premier Room
desc: Was really pleased with the warm welcome of the guest associates atthe reception! It is a really safe place to book a stay for as they provide a really outstanding service at the same time reassurance throughout the stay! Would like to comment on a fellow receptionist by the name of Hazirah! She is patience as to attend to my enquires and really made my stay really welcoming! At the same time! thank you M social for making my staycaytion a memorable one despite the complications of the govt rules and regulation and was unable to hold a birthday celebration between friends. Despite it all! it has been really an enjoyable stay! To future bookings with you guys!

title: Staycation at M Hotel
desc: Wonderful staycation and lots of fun with the perfume making workshop!😁 The hotel was clean and the staff are really friendly. The facilities are clean and well maintained. The hotel is located along Boat Quay which has many restaurants and amenities nearby! Looking forward to come back again.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Novelia was an amazing and experience perfume maker. She guided us in making the perfume giving clear and concise instructions, helping us find the perfect scent along the way by asking for our likes and dislikes. Very professional. Will recommend to others!

title: Extremely good room service
desc: Para attended to me regarding the cleaning of my room and she was very efficient and fast in doing her role. All the linens and towels she gave was new and nice. She was extremely nice and gave me all the things needed

title: A good stay!
desc: Super friendly staff, food was amazing too! And the rooms were perfect(: The room was clean and checking in and out was hassle free. Overall the stay was really fun and we enjoyed the pool! Thank you M Social will definitely be back for more real soon❤️

title: Staycay
desc: Clean and cosy room:) Staff were efficient and friendly during our check in, they were also ready to assist me whenever i needed any help. Though the room was abit small, it had everything we needed for the night.

title: Purfume making work shop
desc: The workshop is really fun and enjoyable. Great experience for couples activities. Highly recommended if you are coming for a staycation at MSocial. There many varieties of purfume which allow you to mix and match, select best of your choices.

title: M Social
desc: The service was great. Checking in was very smooth and staffs were friendly. The facilities and hotel in general is very clean!! Highly recommended! Room is very cozy and clean!! Great location for a getaway

title: Modern and central to Robertson Quey. Plenty of restaurants and a nice walk along the river.
desc: I checked in over COVID so they lined us up outside in the parking area. The staff are friendly and helpful. The hotel looks very modern and cutting edge but sadly the lights all through the hotel are very dim, even in the elevators and hallways. With that you get a lot of overlooked maintenance in the rooms and corridors. It’s quite dirty in the room with hair and dust build up along with mold in the shower. The bed is very comfy. The best part about the hotel is the location and the bed.

title: My own Perfume
desc: After smelling so much scent, I'm unable to choose the preferred scent. Thankful for the staff here who saw me having a hard time choosing, check with my preferred scent and customised for me until I found the one I love.

title: Perfume making workshop by Maison 21 G
desc: Novelia brought us through the workshop and was really helpful and patient with us. She gave us ample time to explore the scents and gave us great suggestions on how we narrow down what we like. The suggested combinations she offered was really great as well. 10/10 would recommend this workshop for anyone!

title: Maison 21G!
desc: novelia was the person who hosted my girlfriend and I for this perfume making. I think it was quite well done, it’s my first time being here and Novelia guided us very well! She found “my scent” and I didn’t know that I “had one”. So I’m actually very pleased :)

title: Discover you!
desc: Loved the experience!! We are able to search for our favourite scent and Novelia is great and helpful when we are torn with our choices. We each bring back our own be-spoke scent 30ml per bottle. Great couple activity. Unique. Highly recommended!

title: Amazing stay
desc: we booked this hotel for our wedding anniversary. would recommend to reach earlier to avoid long queue especially on weekends. service by staffs were excellent! one staff stood out especially - shafiq. our room air con was down so he arranged for the hotel technician to fix it and moved us to another room afters (cuz technician had to further look into the matter) the only downside i would say is there is no free parking other than that it was an amazing stay!

title: Our 1st wedding anniversary
desc: The service of the staffs are really helpful and well mannered . The rooms are clean and well maintained. I have enjoyed my stay and would recommend my friends and family to try M social for next staycation getaway.

title: Amazing first stay thanks to Hamzah!
desc: Hamzah was truly the highlight of our first experience with M Social, from the moment we walked in by providing a warm and friendly welcome, up till we departed from the hotel refreshed and feeling well taken care of. Any time we encountered any difficulties or required assistance, he was quick to handle things and leave us with great assurance. We were honestly shocked to learn that it was only his third day at work! With a big heart, cheery disposition & can-do attitude, he’s definitely a reason why we want to return in future. Thank you Hamzah & the rest of the M Social team!

title: Perfume making workshop
desc: Had a wonderful time with Novelia and Shahira!! They were guiding us well and helped me find the scent i Love! Def recommend people to try this workshop! Thank you for your guidance ladies! Laurene and Guru

title: Interesting perfume workshop by the lovely staff
desc: Novelia and Shahira were really sweet and patient with us during the perfume making workshop! Novelia is well trained and knows how to mix the best smells for us! :) They were both really friendly to us :)

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Very interesting and I found my own scent. Uses a profile system to narrow down your preferences. A series of experiments later, you arrive at a blend of your own. A nice big EDC to take home. It's relaxing and an enjoyable experience.

title: Msocial Perfume Workshop
desc: awesome perfume making workshop class! Nolelia and Shahira were both very friendly, helpful and professional. would recommend to go for the workshop with your partner as this is also a good bonding session.

title: Really interesting and fun perfume workshop experience
desc: Novelia was so engaging and accommodating. Gave very clear instructions and gave great insights and tips too! Fun experience overall! Glad we did this! Highly recommend to try it, will be fun to do with friends or partner!

title: Great ambience
desc: The outdoor lounge was beautiful and we love it! A Comfortable stay for us and although we had like a short stay, we like our hotel room very much! Definitely will recommend if you would like to stay in a hippy hotel

title: Perfume making workshop
desc: Fun workshop! First time experiencing perfume mixing. So many scents until my nose also overwhelmed. Novelia was conducting the workshop and she's really professional and patient in helping to choose the scents. Note that it's mainly choosing and mixing scents!

title: perfume
desc: novelia is very helpful and nice. great job for teaching us to make the perfume. She is very patient and understanding for the needs of the clients. She knows what she is doing and good in making it more fun.

title: Personalised Perfume Workshop
desc: Attended with my bestie for a retreat and attended the workshop. Totally blew my mind and Novelia is an absolute doll and professional to work with! She helped me to find my perfect scent and her cheerful personality helped to lighten the atmosphere! Will come back and create a new personal scent! Thanks Novelia, Maison 21 G and M Hotel!

title: Maison 21G Workshop M Social
desc: Fun and interesting workshop. The host, Novelia is very friendly and helpful in helping us to choose the right scents. Hope to participate in similar activities if there is a chance or hotel promo. Highly recommended!

title: Mansion 21G Workshop
desc: Very good explaining of all the scent~ Very friendly instructor( Shahira) we had great time~ Love the way how they mix the scent into one and let us had a selection of our choice. Our instructor communicated with us very well.

title: M Social Maison 21G Perfume Workshop
desc: Loved the experience, enjoyed every single minute of it, especially how the session is private to make the experience more personalised. The workshop trainer was super sweet and friendly, really guided us through the entire process & also made sure we are well briefed and guided. Venue provided was super comfortable & nice. Definitely super satisfied with the experience.

title: M Social Maison21G Perfume Workshop
desc: What a fantastic workshop and experience this was!! I did not expect a perfume making workshop to be this fun, but my partner and I really enjoyed ourselves! Shahira is a very sweet & patient trainer, and she really helped me out a lot ☺️☺️

title: Average staycation, nothing fantastic
desc: The check-in process can definitely be improved, especially when guests were queuing up at the prescribed check-in time but were told to wait for hours for room turnover. Luckily for us, we got a Loft Premier which was already available upon check-in. The room was however pretty average and basic, if not for the loft design, and there was no room service in this hotel - e.g. we couldn't request for ice as the fridge was not cool enough. Location-wise, it's a good 15-20 minutes walk away from the nearest train station, but close to cafes and restaurants around Robertson Quay and down to Clarke Quay and Boat Quay if you're willing to walk.

title: Stay at M Social
desc: My stay at M Social was satisfying to say the least. The checking in was a little bit of a wait but I had my room regardless. The perfume/fragrance workshop conducted by manager, Shahirah was super super fulfilling. Not only creating new fragrances were great but Shahirah took it upon herself to guide us in the whole process and made sure our needs or concerns were all addressed. Our biggest thanks to Shahirah for making the experience a more a fruitful one. Thank you!

title: Masion perfume workshop at m social hotel
desc: Went to the masion workshop on the 20th nov. Really amazed by the selection of scent available for us to choose from. Shout out to the staff who conducted this workshop, she was patient by educating us the scent as well as guide us to select scent based on our liking from the quiz result. Thank you!

title: One that I won't need late checkout for
desc: The hotel is well situated in the Robertson Quay area which is great so you can easily access the nearby cafes, bars etc. And I do enjoy the perfume workshop, the facilitator was very patient and helpful in suggesting different perfume scents so we can locate our favourites. The hotel could do a lot better in many areas, especially in customer service and digitalisation of their services. Firstly, we were never informed of the timing of the perfume workshop. A week prior to check in, I had to call in to check, and was told the workshops are conducted at 3, 4 and 5pm, but all the slots are fully booked. They did eventually open up a 6pm for me, which I appreciate but proactive coordination from the hotel part would be better for guests. They also mention that guests have to

title: Never Alcove Room Again
desc: When we first got to the room, the door wasn’t closed completely, to our horror! We should have went to the reception and ask for another room instead. However upon entering into the room, we tried to lock the door without any success. Seeing there is chain lock, we locked it. To another horror, we aren’t able to unlock it! The receptionist had to call the engineer to come to outside our door and he had to manually removed the entire chain lock from the wall. In all, it was a traumatic experience to a relatively imaginative person who was then thinking of the possibility of a fire event. We were sadly given another Alcove room and will definitely think twice about M social hotel.

title: What a staycay
desc: Booked the check in timeslot at 2pm and check in was a breeze although room was still not ready. Hazirah was helpful and offered to help us store our luggages while waiting for the room. Glad we booked the loft room. Truly an amazing interior, small but cosy. Will definitely come back

title: A perfect place for staycation!
desc: We had a really good time staying at M Social. We picked this place out of the review and the look of the place and we were not disappointed at all. Cool style of decor and a great location so it's all we needed. The staffs were very nice and helpful. I'd definitely come back!

title: Perfume making class @ m social hotel
desc: Great experience, very fun trying out the different scents and instructor was very experienced and nice :) Will recommend all who stay at the hotel to try out the workshop and go home with a bottle of customized perfume.

title: Perfume workshop at M Social
desc: Interesting workshop of getting your preferred scent. From personality check quiz to matching of various combination of fragrance, the instructor has been friendly and helpful throughout the whole session. Had a great time finding my own personal fragrance

title: My fav staycation!!
desc: Very very happy with my experience at this workshop . The instructor was very patience and well verse in her work and guided us very well throughout the whole hour session. Very very happy. You guys should try it too. Highly recommended!!! I would definitely come again to this hotel for this workshop .

title: Workshop
desc: The instructor (Shahira) was very passion and smile is always nice and kind thanks a lot and so much to her was guide us and helpful will come and visit here again thanks for the hospitality. Regards, Harry

title: Perfect Scent
desc: Fun and exciting experience. Super love the scent recommended and Shahira has been a real sweet professional instructor. Her recommendation was also on point with what I like. Would love to attend another class by her. A pity we can’t pay extra and to do another bottle.

title: Perfume making class by Maison 21
desc: I really enjoyed the perfume making that Shahira was facilitating! She was patient and able to suggest a scent that i really like over so many other scents available. I would recommend everyone to sign up for this class to try out a new activity. Thank you!!!

title: M Social Review - Couple Staycation at Alcove Terrace
desc: Pros - Generally clean, comfy bed and well provided amenities. Chromecast available for streaming advices although with periodic lag / distortion. Plenty of outlets for charging. Nice rain shower design although could be larger. Terrace area is a nice addition but small to truly utilise frequently. Benefit is to open the door to terrace to air out the room if needed. Cons - Try to avoid public holiday connecting to weekends (Thursday was a PH combined with weekend for us) and the wait time was at least 30 minutes if not more around check in time (around 2pm). If you must, come as early as 1pm to check in. Room was also not ready upon arrival. Staff was kind enough to provide complimentary drinks for 2 to make up for the wait. However, we opted for the terrace

title: Perfume Workshop
desc: Shahira is really friendly and nice, she has been very helpful with all the steps and can answer any queries from us. It is slightly challenging to choose the scents and we’re very happy to bring home our very own personalized perfume!

title: One of the worst experiences ever
desc: Staying here for SHN/quarantine after arriving from overseas. There was no explanation/introduction upon arrival, just one security guy escort with no help for the luggage. There was someone else’s dinner from the previous night still in front of the door, the toilet bowl isn’t fully clean, stain on the sink and curtains, molding in the shower room, lots of someone’s white hair (my hair is not white) on the floor and they took one hour ti bring the dinner I had ordered for delivery. They may be short staffed but sadly not a pleasant experience especially you cannot get housecleaning service during the stay and all you can do is stay inside the room. Had stayed in another dedicated SHN facility earlier in the year, but the cleanliness was so much better. I would not come back not

title: long waiting time for check in
desc: what is the use of booking a slot to check in when you still have to queue all the way outside of the hotel? After registering, please be prepared to queue more to get your keys and booking of breakfast slot. Total queue time is around 2 hours maybe 3 hours maximum. Basically half of the time at the hotel is queuing. Totally not worth it.

title: Unacceptable long wait for check in.
desc: This is not a hotel for guests. Their staff are perhaps more interested in their own affairs rather then clear the guest check in queue. The wait has been excruciating and awful, made worse by unhelpful staff. Not recommended. Stay away from this ‘hotel’.

title: Perfume Workshop
desc: The workshop was conducted professionally! We enjoyed our scents and sweet moments. masterpiece catered at the end to your unique preferences. Kudos. Personality choices profile was sent to your email 😉

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Workshop is conducted at M social. Instructor is very nice, friendly, and knowledgeable. The personality quiz helped to identify scents which we adore. We love our scent pairing and we bag home a 30ml of our creation, was a great and intimate workshop!

title: Perfume workshop with shahirah
desc: Shahirah was very helpful and attended to our queries regarding the different scents. She shared her experience with other visitors to help us choose the perfect perfume The workshop was conducted as a private session for 2 which was very personalised, would recommend to others!

title: NOT RECOMMENDED!
desc: Check in took 1hr50min. And still had to wait further 40min for a room. And then there were queue-jumpers. Finally breakfast is a sad affair compared to just 2 months prior. I am definitely not returning, nor recommending this hotel for anyone, ever. (You can see from the photo the ridiculous queue) The management obviously thinks calling covid as an excuse works, but they certainly forget that there are many other, better and equally affordable options across Singapore. Spent your trip dollars elsewhere, M Social does not deserve a cent of it!

title: Perfume workshop
desc: The perfume workshop was facilitated by friendly and helpful staff. There was a wide range of scents but the staff was patient and helped to narrow down choices. Whole process was relaxing and fun. Would recommend to friends!

title: Horrendous Check-In Process Dampened The Staycation Mood
desc: Was looking forward to a nice getaway at this uniquely designed hotel ...... until I spent 2 hours just to check-in! Noted that the hotel was under-staffed due to covid19 (which was the explaination given) but I'm sure there are also reasonable alternative ways to handle the snaking long quene rather than leaving us out there standing with our bags/luggages for a good 2 hours. Not surprised if people got upset/angry/impatient/frustrated as I sure did. I noted that there were actually benches near the entrance and along the alsie leading to the restaurant (Beast and Butterfiles) so why can't quene numbers be given so that some of us could've comfortably sit down while waiting and/or get a much needed coffee nearby (where there are plenty of cafe options such as Botany, Toby's

title: Recommended!
desc: Upon check in we were warmly greeted by Yun Ting. We love her friendliness. Room is amazing, kudos to the room attendant who cleaned my room. Although there was some connection issues with the tv which i assumed it’s because a lot of people is using the hotel’s wifi, it wasn’t really a huge concern. The staffs were friendly and helpful throughout the stay! Will come back again!

title: Great experience
desc: I really enjoyed the perfume workshop! Very fun and informative. The duration can be longer though as one hour wasn't really enough. Otherwise great experience. Will recommend to my friends and family!

title: Great perfume workshop
desc: First time joining a perfume workshop and it was a really great experience! We were given a mini lesson on the science behind the scents and it was really informative. We could create our own scents and bring home the perfume we created. overall this was a really fun experience! would recommend :)

title: Enjoyed my stay at M Social SG
desc: Enjoyed my stay at M social very much, will consider booking a larger room next round as the basic room is quite small, but cosy. The staff and reception were very attentive. The hotel is also situated at a hood location, very close to an array of food choices and amenities!

title: Staycation at M Social Hotel Singapore
desc: Overall experience was bad. Stayed 1 night from 6 - 7 Nov 2021. The time taken for registration took us about 1 hour long. The socket in the room was observed to be old, although it’s functioning okay (but were too scared to use). The next day, we realised that room keycard system is down (right before our breakfast timing) - meaning to say anybody could enter our room from outside without the room card. Would not recommend to my friends and family..

title: Extremely bad service and terrible place to stay in
desc: I am currently still staying in this horrible hotel with my wife but I wanted to warn everyone that is contemplating on staying here. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY HERE. There are many recent reviews complaining about the same thing and all the replies they received are copy and pasted. This hotel do not care about the wellbeing of the guests. There is no complimentary parking for all guests that are staying here. So be prepared pay a ton for parking, take a cab or take the public transport. Just a warning, this hotel is situated far from the MRT. This has been pointed out even back in 2019 by other guests and was told that it is being reviewed. Guess what, nothing changed. We received email confirmation to check in at 2:00pm. We gladly obliged and went ahead to do our

title: Perfume workshop at M social
desc: The perfume workshop conductor Shahira was very friendly and patient with us. She gave very good recommendations for our perfume making process!! Really enjoyed the whole workshop, would recommend my friends and family to come!!

title: Perfume workshop at M Social
desc: Instructor Shahira was very friendly and patient. She made very good recommendations and helped me and my partner find the right scent! Highly recommended for other couples to come here if you guys are coming here for a staycaytion.

title: Perfume workshop with m social
desc: Very interesting workshop to know various kind of scent for different occasion. I can even customise a perfume that is suitable for my personality. Ms Shahira is very knowledgeable and helpful. This is a highly recommended workshop for friends and family.

title: An okay stay
desc: Reception was swift and fast. The room given have a poolview. The bed was awesome. It was difficult to use the showerhead to manipulate the water temp. BEWARE of the locked door. The TV is user friendly. As u can connect it via ur phone. The blinds for the Windows is hard to pull. The room was super clean. The toilet was crampy. There is no bidet spray besides the toilet. The fridge was not cold enough. The sink is infront of the bed. The switches for the lights are hard to manipulate.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Fun and interesting workshop. You will get to mix and match different scents to customise your own perfume. Trainer was able to provide suggestions on what scent goes well together based on what you prefer.

title: Perfume workshop (M Social)
desc: Shahira was really friendly, interactive an knowledgeable! She was also very accomodating! She made the session feel personal and fun! All the scents actually smelled really great so choosing just 1 combination was hard but Shahira gave astute recommendations so it was easier to formulate my very own customised perfume!

title: Worse hotel I have ever stayed in!
desc: I checked in 1 hour ago and I must say this is one of the worst hotel I've ever stayed in. 1) no usb charging port - most good hotels offer this so I'm surprised they don't. There were 2 use ports on the side of the phone but they both do not work. 2) when asked if they have a phone charger, the answer is a flat no. My fault, I guess, for thinking that they would have a usb charging port. 3) TV would just switch off by itself after 10mins. This is very frustrating so I decided to call their m'bassador but the phone does not work! 4) room phone doesn't work so I decided to call from my mobile phone but no one picked up the phone. So here I am with a dying phone and a TV that does not work. Great. I'm hating my holiday already. Oh yah, the air-con doesn't seem to be working.

title: Perfume Workshop
desc: Workshop was fun and informative. Definitely enjoyed the hands-on experience creating my own scent. Trainer was very patient and answered all of my enquires well considering that she was not working for the Maison directly.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: The trainer Shahira was great and it was a insightful and enjoyable session where we got to create personalised perfumes based on our personality. It was great would definitely recommend you to come and try it out for yourself.

title: Mixed
desc: There was a monstrously long Q to check-in. Thankfully we were served by Hamzah. His service is exceptional. He even cheered my little girl with a otter soft toy. They seem to be understaffed. Bathroom door is not kid friendly. The breakfast is delicious

title: M Social Hotel - Perfume Workshop
desc: Lovely experience with the entire perfume making process. We started off with a small quiz to determine what's recommend based on our personality - and I must say it is pretty accurate! Next up, Shahira gave us a quick overview of what we need to do to get the recommended scents. It is really an engaging experience to find the scents on the turntable, with Shahira going through how each scent complements each other. I was really impressed with Shahira's energy and knowledge, especially when she was able to immediately recommend some scents when I was trying to find a third scent that goes well with the first two scents that I've decided on. All in all, it was an enjoyable experience!

title: Super fun!
desc: Super fun because we got to try out legit all the scents and mix and match all we want. I love itttt super recommend with your friends/family if you like scents and perfumes. Super worth it! Shahira was really helpful 🥰

title: Covid staycay
desc: Room very sick, value for money. The only thing that is not clean is the fridge. Covid check in took 1 hour. Room layout and design nice and modern. Some stains on cloths but overall room is decent with normal ageing signs.

title: Perfume Making
desc: Instructor is patient and friendly. Perfume making was fun, very wide selection of scent available to choose. Was struggling to find out which scent suits me at first but instructor managed to help find the ideal scent for me.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Was a very amazing and fun experience, definitely eye opening. Good experience I would say! Love it. Very friendly staff as well. This is a very good activity for staycation in Singapore, for those looking for things to do.

title: 3D2N staycay, Loft Premier Room.
desc: Room is nice and I really like the modern design, the walls seem to be...decent in terms of thickness. So you don't hear your neighbours. Its situated beside the Singapore river so its nice to take a walk there. Check in can take around an hour because of the queue so do come early (like around 2pm?). The room's fridge was quite smelly as there was no maintenance done but other than that everything is 👌👌. The staff is friendly too. Sorry for the lack of photos, the room is a little messy currently 🤠.

title: After 1 year of COVID experience, never improve checkin process.
desc: Stayed here last year (2020),experienced super long queue during checkin. 1 year later in 2021 the queue is still insanely long. There is no attempt to improve the experience, example, they could have assign check in time for each group of guests, although we can make selection of the preferred slot, it doesn't really helped as the queue is simply too long. They could have also issue out the physical declaration form to all in the queue but have chosen to let guests fill in when at the counter. There are only 2.5 counters working, why there is a 0.5? The front counter also doubled up as an enquiry counter attending to various requests. Please increase the headcount for checkin. See the photo, after queuing for 40mins since 4pm, decides to give up and come back after 7pm. Go

title: Maison 21G perfume making session
desc: Interesting experience and you get to do a perfume based on your own preference! Staff is patient and knowledgeable in helping us to get the scents that we wanted. We also get to bring back the scent that we have made!

title: perfume making workshop
desc: enjoyable and process was well explained. there was a variety of scents. suggestions were given, but feel free to pick out and combine any scent you like. very flexible. i would come back again as it's very personalised and my preferred scent can change as the days go by

title: Thanks for our staycation
desc: Good looking hotel with nice and efficient staff. Well located and clean. Room is spacious enough and really clean. The location is very nice , we can find a lot of great restaurant around. Will definitely come back for our new staycation …..

title: Perfume making session
desc: It was really fun and the trainer is fun. We get to learn so many different scents and combinations. Based on our personality and moods. We get to try out all 4 types of combinations. Definitely recommend this to frens.

title: Nice stay and perfume workshop
desc: The perfume workshop is very fun. It is such a memorable stay at M Social. The hotel location is convenient, just a few minutes walk from Fort Canning station. The check in and out is fast and efficient

title: Workshops
desc: Spent my New Year holiday at M Social. They have complimentary perfume and cocktail workshops, learnt something new. Even had free perfume and a shaker to take home after the session. Thanks for the nice experience!

title: Made my own perfume
desc: Great, much more worth it than the Cocktail session, super worth trying, she was clear and know her stuff well compared to the cocktail session where it is not very comprehensive on the things that he is trying to say with his accent. The cocktail session is more or like a disaster where he forces an answer out from you and can’t even understand him.

title: Made my own perfume!
desc: I love my fragrance and enjoyed making my own perfume. Trainer lady was sweet, nice and clear with her instructions. An awesome activity and a great present (to myself) to end 2021. One bottle retail at 90 - 100 bucks!

title: Perfume Making Package
desc: We bought the package for stay in Alcove Cosy Room via klook that comes with perfume making workshop by Maison 21G. Workshop was held in the hotel's small function room with 2 couples per session, it was fun smelling out the available scents and curating a scent we like. Check-in was a breeze as we had arrived rather early but snaking queue started forming around 3pm. Room wise was rather small with 2 single beds and 2 pillows but was rather soft. The sink with mirror + TV in just right in front of the bed which makes it a little uncomfortable during sleep. Bathroom has a window of sorts that looks through to room but can be easily shut off with the blinds. Individual toiletries and towels are provided. Breakfast was inclusive and we decided to do a takeaway instead as

title: Perfume Session
desc: Great experience with this session ! The girl instructor very friendly & patient with us. i love it when we can try to smell different scenes & create our own perumes! hehe highly recommended to come with families!

title: Very fun even without experience
desc: Very interesting workshop even for someone with little to no experience with scents. You are given results from a personality quiz but are also free to mix and match if you’d like to explore. Novelia was extremely patient and gave excellent recommendations when I could not decide on what type of scents to combine.

title: HOURS of waiting for check-in
desc: Partner and I completed the online contactless check-in before arrival at 2:45pm. We were told that we still had to join the long queue (queue went out of the hotel's entrance) to get our cards verified before getting the keys. This renders the contactless check-in pretty redundant in our opinion. We decided to take a walk and come back later when the queue will perhapse be shorter. We were met with an even longer queue upon returning at 4:45pm. Joint the queue and only got to the room at 6:30pm. There wasn't any room with twin bed ready (which was what we booked), so we had to settle with the room with 2 single beds. Room was small but everything else was alright. One of the worst check-in experience I've experienced both locally and overseas. DO NOT book a staycation at

title: Wonderful experience!
desc: Stayed 2 nights for staycation with husband at M social. We had wonderful stay and couldn't be more happy with the service and the staff. The hotel itself looks cool and chic. The room is clean. the bed is very comfortable. The hotel also has pool and gym so it is very convenience for us to work out and hang out at the pool. Check in and check out is flow even if there are a lot of people but the staff manage it well with the smile on the face . Thank you Msocial for making our stay so memorable.

title: Nice hotel
desc: Thank you Msocial! We had the best time during staycation. The hotel is very cool and stylish. The location is superb easy to go everywhere. Check in process has a lot of people but the process went smoothly. I can see that the staff are doing the best they can. The staff are so nice and apologize for the waiting. They are so helpful and very friendly. The room is super clean and tidy bed very comfortable. There is also the restaurant downstair called beast and butterflies we also love the food there. Recommended 100/100 ❤

title: M social perfume workshop
desc: Had a perfume workshop with Shahira for our hotel stay at M social. Really enjoyed the workshop, she is very friendly and very well versed in all the scents! She provides recommendations on top of the scents that we gotten from our personality quiz! Recommended to visit!! 👍

title: M social perfume workshop
desc: Had a great experience trying the various scents and combining all differwnt scents to create a unique perfume to bring home! Really enjoyed the perfume workshop & would definitely recommend on your stay at m social :)

title: Perfume workshop
desc: The perfume workshop was really fun and interesting finding out about the different scents and combinations we liked! We also got to bring home a bottle of perfume per room :-) thank you Shahira for your sharing and patience and making the experience so enjoyable!

title: Great service!
desc: Thanks Diyaanah for being so kind and helpful :) She is very friendly, made my family fele very comfortable with her service! So glad you're the first person we encounter at the hotel, gave us a great start to our trip!

title: Only perfume workshop is worth it
desc: Location of the hotel is great. But the service is pretty bad. We booked both the perfume workshop and cocktail workshop as an add-ons to our staycation, but we did not know we have to book a slot before hand and no one ever reached out to us to schedule a time. So we called in the morning of check-in to check and they told us all slots are fully booked and gave us a slot AFTER my checkout (ridiculous). They eventually managed to schedule a perfume workshop outside of allocated time but the cocktail workshop will still be held after check-out - which means we have to check out, leave the hotel, and come back for the workshop. During the check-in the queue was ridiculously long - queued all the way into the drop-off point. Luckily we arrived early and didn’t wait as long as

title: Disappointing stay
desc: Hotel location is great but I think that’s pretty much it for this staycation experience. Hotel amenities and cleanliness is average. Staycation package was supposed to come with a cocktail making class but was informed that class was fully booked when I checked in. Breakfast took more than 30 mins for the food to arrive. We had to leave without our additional order because the waiting time was just too long. I am afraid all in all, it was a disappointing experience. Hope to see improvements in the future.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Shahria was friendly and had a warm personality. We had a lot of fun each with making our own tailor-made perfumes. The experience was interactive and we would definitely recommend this unique experience.

title: Do seriously consider buying door chokes for your cleaners
desc: The cleaners leave the front door lock engaged but the door not fully closed so that they can push/pull open the door without needing to turn the door handle. The doors have a door close mechanism on them, so every time the door is opened, the door would automatically slam shut but with the lock engaged, it would slam on the door frame with a loud bang every time. Seems like the cleaners need to get in/out of a room at times every 15-30 seconds while they are cleaning it. So for the entire duration (about 10-15 minutes), you will hear bang, bang, banging of the door. It is loud and I can assure you that even if it is happening on the floor above or below you will hear it very well from your room. Rooms get cleaned throughout the day (people check out at different times) so

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Had alot of fun learning about perfume and creating our own fragence! Shahirah was our instructor and she was very helpful and encouraging in getting us to try out the different combinations for our fragrance. This is definitely the highlight of our stay. Wife was extremely happy with this experience! Thank you again! Will highly recommend this.

title: Friendly staff but checkin process is slow and unorganized
desc: The staff are friendly. However… Check-in time was stated 3pm. But I only gotten my room at 4.30pm. Reason given was because they need time to turn-over as the hotel was packed. But it’s a relatively small hotel… So, they could be understaffed. Sigh… They sent me an online check-in link prior to my arrival but apparently, it didn’t even helped the process… I don’t even know what’s that for.

title: More than 5 hours of delay before room is available.
desc: Still waiting for a room after more than 5 hours from supposed check in time. Staffs are very friendly. But around 5+pm, room was still not ready. Had to leave for dinner appointment. Came back to hotel at 8+pm. Was told that our prepared room was given to someone else by mistake, and had to wait another 15 minutes before room will be ready.

title: Staycation
desc: Good to be back again after a while. As usual, good stay, clean room, central location that is near to wonderful dining options around the hotel. Friendly check in and check out experience. Will be back soon. Thank you to Yun Ting for delivering a great service experience.

title: Extremely bad experience
desc: Check in queue was more than 2hrs. Poor service, under staff and inexperienced staff. Feels like a 3rd class guests. The staff just try their best to avoid equally frustrating customers waiting outside the hotel. Ridiculously unacceptable. WILL NOT STEP INTO THIS HOTEL AGAIN.HIGHLY NOT RECOMMENED.

title: Staycation + Perfume workshop
desc: Great experience overall! Excellent service from all of the staff we met :) Cozy room with comfortable bed and pillows. Perfume session was really fun and explanation by Novelia was clear but a pity the duration was so short 😆

title: Compliments for Hamzah from M Social Front Desk
desc: We would like to compliment Hamzah from Front Desk for his cheerfulness and patience, especially under pressure! His helpfulness, warmth and upbeat personality has made our stay at M Social a pleasant one! :)

title: 친절 사랑 서비스 친구
desc: 좋은 위치, 적극적인 서비스, 친절한 응대 모두 만족스런 숙박이였습니다. 조식도 너무 맛있고 독특한 복층구조의 룸 덕분에 오랜 기억에 남을 것 같네요! Super friendly people and had a wonderful time at M Social. I should comeback when I back to SG. Thank you for all your serviced. 🥰

title: Great staycation !!
desc: Had a recent short yet sweet stay at M Social. My booking was inclusive with all the fancy workshops. My partner and i attended the perfume workshop and it was great! Staff were friendly and knowledgeable in food recommendations especially. Very Good staycation place. Check in was a bit long but the staff attitude made up for it. We ll be back next year

title: Really nice hotel with great service
desc: Our recent stay at M social was superb. The room is nicely decorated and very clean. The staff also very helpful and super friendly. PLUS the perfume workshop is so much fun. We definitely comeback again :)

title: Disappointing Stay
desc: I booked a stay on 18 Dec 2021. Upon arrival, there was a long queue to check-in, i.e. approximately 100 pax in the queue. There was no crowd control and no safe distancing measures. Security personal was just sitting on benches near the hotel lobby and not doing anything. It took 1.5 hours before it was my turn to check-in. Feedback to the Director of Sales and asked him why bother asking people to book pre-arrival check-in time and was informed by him that they will feedback to management. Check-in to the room, 02-237. Basic housekeeping not done. Toilet paper not refilled and no tissue paper, i.e. tissue box empty. Tried calling the front desk to seek assistance but no one answered so i gave up and went down to ask for a box of tissue paper. Met the duty manager at

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Great fun making my own preferred perfume with the help of Ms Novelia. The combination of different tonka, ocean and ginger that created a good fragrance that I really like. I can’t wait to try it out when I am out.

title: Maison 21G Perfume class
desc: Very nice perfume making experience with Shahira! Thank you, Shahira for making this a very pleasant experience for us. It was a fun, memorable and exciting class! (: (memorable scent too) love the final scent that we've created!

title: Long waiting time for check-in, bad service.
desc: It’s totally a ruin experience, it’s my second time coming back to m social, at my disappointment, their service standard dropped tremendously. Upon arriving, there’s was a long queue in front of us. We called in for early check in they say full occupancy. As the long waiting to check in makes me have lesser time, hence we requested for late check out, yet again, they say can’t as it’s Dec peak period… As a Millennium hotel, we can’t request for more towel, we can’t request for more coffee capsule, which is a very no logic sense. Their attitude of speaking to us over the phone doesn’t sounds nice, it’s like we own them money. What a hotel stay that ruin our day… This second time coming here makes me rethink what really m social serves. It used to be one of my favourite

title: Long Check-In (1h), Room smell of smoke, booked itinerary was full.
desc: 1. Check in Q stretches all the way to the other street. Long check-in more than 1h. Expected check in time of 1.5h or more for the rest who were behind us. 2. Room full of smoke. This is a non smoking hotel FYI. First housekeeping staff asked to call front desk. Called front desk and 2nd housekeeping staff merely wanted spray and not addressing the smoke issue. Very unprofessional. Had to call again to front desk to have the room changed. Housekeeping left a can of dettol disinfectant spray in the new room. 3. Booked room with cocktail session months prior. Was told it was fully booked during check in. Do not offer as a package if you are unable to fulfil it. Terrible. Spoils the entire staycation. 4. Just starting my terrible stay at M social.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Awesome workshop. Easy to follow and allow u to experiment on creating ur own scent. Impress by the range of different scent that i can choose from. The end product is also very classy and the volume can last me a for quite a while .

title: Disappointed, never returning
desc: Check in Arrived at stipulated time of 3pm. Already there was a queue of ~40 people. After queuing for 15 mins, the length of the queue had doubled. Finally got to check in at 4pm. Room Small and dark. Sink was outside toilet. TV remote buttons were quite unresponsive… had to press quite hard. A single half-used toilet roll was provided. We ran out by next morning. I’ve never run of toilet paper in a hotel before. Called for one but couldn’t wait so I went down to front desk where the lady promptly went into a room nearby and passed me one, thereby saving my life. Gym All booked out so I couldn’t try. But it looked decent. Pool Okay for a small size. Breakfast Easily the best aspect of this hotel. Black Coffee was good. Food was tasty. Cocktail making “workshop” This was

title: Comfy bed+good food
desc: Thank you, Daniel and Sabrina for making my stay feel so welcome! Now, on to the actual review. Tips for guests: 1. Strongly encouraged to use the email check-in link for faster and more fuss free check in to beat the crowd where possible. Coming in at 2pm and 4pm makes a big difference in terms of queuing. 2. The gym and pool on Level 5 is accessible via the hotel card. However due to social distancing, usage of swimming pool has to be pre-booked. Suggest for hotel to have greater clarity/less gaps in terms of communications (i.e. confirmed time and place meetup before courses starts) for a better guest experience. Pros: 1. The TV shows are not grainy as compared to some other hotels' and you get Disney channel. Never hesitate to contact the hotel if you tried to screencast and

title: Hamzah the Power 😊
desc: Hamzah was super friendly and accommodating to all our requests. He was efficient and his genuine hospitality made all of us feel at home with his touch of witty humour. Although quaint and relatively small in size, we had a great stay in our rooms. We had a good meal during breakfast at the restaurant too. Waiters were friendly and efficient in attending to our needs. Housekeeping staff were also quick to attend to our requests. The highlight of our stay here would be the swimming pool where we had a splashing good time!

title: Thank you Shahira!
desc: Awesome workshop by Shahira! Knowledgeable and very patient, would definitely recommend others to come back again! The perfumes were good and the smells were interesting. Shoutout again to Shahira! She is kind and a great teacher / guide :)

title: Lovely session with Maison21G
desc: Trainer was really professional and friendly, gave detailed explanations about each scent and how the flow of the workshop functions. Was a small and intimate session, would love to try other scent combinations in future :)

title: Maison 21 perfume making
desc: I was an interesting experience. We got to make our own perfumes and take it home with us. Shahira was very informative about the whole process. All in all its a great experience. Will definitely recommend it to our friends.

title: Shahirah 💯
desc: this was so fun thank you so much Shahirah for the wonderful session, it was a lovely time experiencing different scents and curating out very own parfum! Shoutout to Shahirah for being so friendly bubbly and patient with us as we asked endless questions and thank you for your guidance!

title: Perfume making workshop
desc: It was a fantastic experience, and the instructor Novellia is so patient and kind. Very fun, highly recommended!! The end product was such a lovely smell too, love every minute of it!! We get to bring back a really cute bottle of perfume too!

title: No Need to Consider
desc: Check in time - 15:00 Only got the room past 17:00 Requested for extra bath towel, housekeeping personnel asked if I’ve used mine yet! No free car park…. Only offered welcome drinks vouchers while waiting for the room and $20 dining credits after complaining for 2nd time. The American bf set came without bread. Asked for scrambled eggs gave sunny-side up. Didn’t call when told to do so when food is ready. Don’t ever book this hotel. It’s terrible.

title: Perfume making workshop
desc: Pleasant experience. Found the scent i really like. Person running the workshop is really fast and knowledgable. Enjoyed the workshop. Brand of perfume is good too. Will willingly try again if i wanna change my scent.

title: Fantastic experience
desc: Shahira is very friendly and very patient too a very awesome experience! Came to celebrate my mum’s birthday and the family love the experience! Definitely recommended for families or even couples to try too. Definitely worth the time. ✌🏼😁

title: Perfume making
desc: It was relaxing and fun. Definitely recommend it for couples and families (without children). The instructor was clear and friendly. She was helpful and made the session even more enjoyable. Will come back in the future.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: The workshop started with a quiz for recommended scents and trying out the different scents separate and combined. Ended up with a personalised product. Engraving is complimentary if brought to stores.

title: Maison 21G Perfume workshop @ M social
desc: Perfume workshop came with the staycay in dec 2021, although had hiccups previously and only manage to make the booking fr this workshop in jan 2022. Great experience. Friendly coordinator. Recommended the needful to complete the workshop, gave the time and space to find your desired scent. Accomodating as well.

title: Perfume workshop by Maison 21g
desc: Extremely welcoming, and the entire workshop was very pleasant. They let you explore all kinds of scents and give you time to find your favourite scent. Would definitely recommend to my friends! Worth it.

title: Perfume workshop @ M social
desc: It was a interesting workshop on how you could make your scent from the start and spray it together to see if it works together as well as the proportion of it. You are actual free to create and play around with the scent.

title: WILL BE BACK
desc: Good Service by Shahira. It's my 1st monthsary w my partner and also friend's bday celebration. We booked two rooms. She even took the initiative to put us on the same level. Will be back. Just wish there is room service so i can wine and dine in my room 😂😅

title: Perfume Making Workshop!
desc: Very accommodating.. Fun workshop, we had a great teacher, Novilla, taught us on perfumes and scents.. We had our scent analysed with an app and narrowed down to our preference.. with the help of Novilla, we managed to get the perfect perfume! Thank you :)

title: Recommended
desc: M social is a great place for staycation! Check in was a breeze and Lady Sabrina was very pleasant and welcoming. Thank you for the upgrade! Would definitely recommend to have a staycation here again ! Location is awesome as there are many restaurants and bars around!

title: Doesn’t feel like a 4-star hotel service
desc: Arrived at M Social earlier today slightly after 3pm, and check-in was smooth. I was even offered a complimentary upgrade to the loft room type. However, the service standards do not match a 4-star rating hotel. Called front desk (they do not have a speed dial for housekeeping), and after waiting for almost 20 minutes, no one picked up.
