Went down to front desk personally to request for an ice bucket, but was told it was subject to availability, and to my dismay, I had to collect it at Beast & Butterflies (the restaurant) myself. Would not consider coming to stay again; other hotels would have better service.

title: Maison 21G Perfume Making Workshop
desc: Had a great experience throughout this workshop. Would recommend to my friends and family! Staff is knowledgeable and friendly. She has a great personality and we had a great time interacting with her.

title: Chill Stay
desc: A room with an X Factor + High Ceiling.. front desk is friendly & easy going. Enjoyed our stay given that its in a chill location. Walks / joy around in the mornings, its lovely. Will return for sure thank u ;)) Cheers

title: Perfume making
desc: Nice experience , would definitely try it again and recommend it to my family and friends. Staff was friendly and approachable. Ambience was also very relaxing. Being able to mix and match the scents was a new experience to us.

title: Excellent service
desc: We stayed from 2-3rd Jan 2021 with the family. I would like commend on the good service by service officer Mr Hamzah. He is very professional and provides us with good options on the facilities in the hotel. Thank you for making the stay so enjoyable for us!

title: Staycation
desc: Nice loft and clean room with fantastic view 🙆‍♂️ Recommended for staycation 😀😊 Staff are friendly and professional as well ☺️☺️ Free room upgrade given to me as well Surely , i Will come back again 😍

title: Enjoyable Staycation!
desc: Helpful and friendly front desk staff and beautifully decorated room. Convenient to nearby F&B joints, walking distance. Will recommend if you haven’t been here before. Only area of improvement is there is no complimentary parking; parking charges can be quite expensive - maybe consider taking public transport.

title: Wonderful Staycation
desc: First time staying in this Hotel. Staff like Shahira and Hamzah were welcoming, friendly and helpful. The room here was very chic and cozy, well equipped with all the basic necessities. In addition, it was well designed, brightly lit and very clean. The bed was very comfortable and the rain shower was soothing and relaxing. The nearest shopping mall, Great World City, is just a ten minute walk away, making it very convenient to get food and amenities. Dining at the hotel's restaurant, Beast & Butterflies, was a pleasant experience. The food was delectable and the staff were friendly and professional as well. Overall, we are happy and have a pleasant staycation here. Once again, thank you Shahira and the team for the wonderful service.

title: Great Staycation!
desc: Was a good stay and the check in process was pretty smooth although there weren't many counters open (which was understandable since it's off-peak). That aside, the front desk staff, Nurul, was really nice and welcoming especially during the check in process. Was booked on the alcove cosy room but got upgraded to the loft premier which was certainly a nice touch from her. Would be back for my next staycation!

title: Check in
desc: Check in was an ease. although it took quite sometime, it’s understandable as there was only 2 receptionist. Nurul was very helpful and gave us a free upgrade to the loft and a cute plushy with her sincerest apologies. loving the loft space but the downside is the tv is upstairs :( Thank you Nurul for assisting me and my fiancé, we love the cute otter and the service you gave us. before we entered our room, we felt very welcomed, much appreciated!

title: Perfume making workshop
desc: Friendly staff, Novelia helped to make this experience amazing and fun! She made sure we are completely satisfied with what we have produced! :) Will definitely want to go another workshop~ Thank you Novelia! :)

title: Utter Disappointment
desc: Bad service (almost no service at all) If you are just staying at the basic room, you will automatically be outcasted by the service crew as a low-tier customer (cannot believe this hotel is 4-stars) Refused early check-in and late check-out (they will tell you that the next customer paid for early check-in and you didn’t 😊) They do not care if you are celebrating an anniversary or special day at their venue ($15++ for basic towel swans that other hotels provide for free, also a small cake at $50 nett that they are so proud to offer) Given the most basic amenities that labels this apartment as a “hotel” “Coffee machine” is a lie "Free Shuttle service" is a lie “Bathrobe” is only available when you ask (if you don’t ask, they will pretend that it does not come with it,

title: Perfume Workshop
desc: The instructor is nice and friendly. The workshop is quite challenging but so fun to explore during the vacation. Feeling like an escape away from reality. So good that M Social provides workshop like this for us/ tourist to select. Definitely a bonus to be able to attend workshop like this without leaving the hotel!!

title: Wonderful Staycation
desc: I booked my stayca under the Singapore Rediscover package for 7-8 Jan 2022 with my family. It was a smooth and swift check-in as I was expecting long queue after reading from news that some hotels saw long queue of guests waiting for hours to check-in during Dec 2021. Though the Loft Gallery room is small, it is spread over 2 floors with adequate space for sink, mini fridge, sofa and work desk. Simply love the sleek room design and equipped with all the essential room amenities. I attended the Perfume workshop by Maison 21G which was well conducted by the Hotel staff, Novelia. She has good knowledgeable of the products and helped us to mix and match the ideal scent unique to our personality. I was impressed with the workshop as it was fun and memorable experience for us.

title: Bad Service !
desc: Saw that it was a four star hotel and service was just like 1 star! I stayed 3 days 2 night in the hotel and one day in the loft gallery while second day at the normal room . First day I needed some cutleries and called the front desk for assistance and they took 1 hour to deliver to me and I understand they might have shortage of staff or etc . Second day which was at the normal room and I needed the cutleries again and notified them . I waited for 1 hour and called the front desk again for the request , answer was they are on the way . In the end the cutleries reach my room 3 hours late !! I’m finding it unacceptable as my food was left cold and thus I’m writing this reviews in .

title: Maison 21G perfume workshop
desc: Trainer was very helpful, equipped with an extensive knowledge of various smells and combination. Overall good experience! Do give this workshop a try and go home with your very own perfume of your choice!

title: Perfume making class
desc: I ended up with this amazing marshmallow havana scented perfume from maison 21. The class was conducted by Novelia. She was very nice and knowledgeable and gave me good recommendations on the do's and don'ts

title: Worst Hotel Ever and worst service!!
desc: Booked M social for proposal to my girlfriend and called beforehand to arrange with the staff (i.e. decorations, early check in to prepare), and thought that hotel could at least accommodate to some of my requests since it is a special occasion (other hotels had complimentary services for special occasions such as anniversary) but for M Social, the staff rejected ALL my requests (even simple ones) with a sloppy attitude. Tried talking to other staffs as well but had the same result. After we checked in, we requested to pay for extended stay till 6pm but was told by the reception that there is no availability - the attitude was very bad as well. This was the worst hotel that we've stayed - even 3 star hotel has better service than this. Will not come back again.

title: Extremely disappointing customer service and experience.
desc: I booked 1 night at the Loft Premier for a long awaited staycation with my husband. to celebrate a late valentines day We were very much looking forward to a night away and so I had booked what looked like the most spacious and comfortable room. I prebooked my check in time but had to wait quite some time to be served. Then, I was told at checkin that the room I had booked was not available due to some 'technical maintenance' issues with the room. No loft rooms were available and I was downgraded to an alcove room with a tiny and very depressing looking outdoor terrace. I was offered a $50 dining voucher to use at the hotel restaurant with a limited expiry date and an extended check out time. No offer for a refund was made. I was then told that it was a last minute issue but I

title: Perfume workshop was a great add on!
desc: Came for our staycay 3 months back but unfortunately couldn't find an available slot for the workshop. Hotel staff very kindly printed us a voucher for us to use again on a separate day. Workshop itself was a unique experience, very well explained in terms of brand history and what scents compliment each other well. Would have been better if it was conducted in a more open environment and the underlying hotel scent wasn't as strong.

title: Not bad but also not so good
desc: My review is as shown in the screenshot. Adding along some additional points too. - The pralines wasn't given to us but it's included in the booking. - The sink designed in front of the bed is really a weird one but ok... - The TV only links Googlecast and it doesn't really link properly too. Took my partner a number of tries to get linked but to our surprised, the link expires too and we have to relink to the TV again... Quite a spoil mood.

title: AVIOD this hotel!
desc: Very bad experience with M Social. Totally not worth the money with such service and unclean room. We read good reviews by bloggers and decided to give it a try. Paid $588 for 3d2n Loft terrace room wanting to celebrate hubby's birthday. Upon checked in, the room has a musty smell and food crips are all over on the sofa and floor. Pillows were smelly, basin and cups were dirty. Has to repeatedly chase front desk to come and clean. We asked to exchange towels (as we did not ask for housekeeping) and the staff only bought up ONE bath towel and tell us that their clean towel has no stock. What??? Extremely disgusting stained sofa placed outside the patio. Tell me who will dare to sit on it. The bed is so small (look like a super single to me). Leather sofa has a bad musty smell

title: Great stay
desc: Great stay , beautiful rooms , friendly staff. Hotel is a bit far from the train station but loads of busses around. Swimming pool and gym access is well controlled. Would recommend to single travellers and couples as the room size is just enough for 1 or 2 persons.

title: Amazing Staff = Amazing Stay
desc: I booked the Perfume package on Klook for the Alcove Cosy Room. I was excited for the stay as my Wife loves perfume and it was our first staycation ever since Covid hit years ago and it was our wedding anniversary. We had great hopes of a amazing and memorable staycation but was worried from the overwhelming numbers of reviews on the queue. We did what we can to help make it a smooth stay. We received the email to register online and give credit card number upfront to try minimize the process needed so we can have a faster check in process. Due to unforeseen circumstance, we can only check in later at night around 9+ pm, but the Manager Raz who processed our check in was able to secured a slot for tomorrow. He told us that the slots are fixed at 3pm 4pm 5pm and can be next

title: Horrible
desc: My wife took the trouble of booking and pre-paying for a nice loft room for a much-needed midweek break. We had both been really busy at work and were looking forward to an evening off. On arrival we were downgraded to a room that was tiny and told that to make it up for it, they would give us a voucher worth SGD 10 more than the difference in price for the room! Oh and the best part - the dining voucher has to be used during the stay even though we had plans to eat elsewhere that evening. So basically even though we paid for a big room- they would put us in a small room and expect us to eat in their restaurant to get our money back.No explanation other than they just didn't have time to call us and tell us the room we booked wasn't available (even a 10 minute heads up would

title: Perfume workshop at m social
desc: Really unique experience, able to create a special scent unique to your own. Thanks for the awesome workshop shahira😊 highly recommended for couples and fragrance lovers. Brought my favourite fragrance to recreate something similar too.

title: Love the perfume Workshop
desc: Great and friendly host! Knows her stuff! Helpful and recommended! The selection of scents are very good! The scents I chose very more of a manly one, oud outshine, Bergamot blast and sage supreme! Men can try My girlfriend took the honey heaven and Bergamot Blast. Must recommended to try

title: MAISON 21G PARIS WORKSHOP
desc: It was very fun and interesting. The instructor Hazirah was very nice, patient and helpful! She is very knowledgable and knows exactly what to recommend. Would recommend it for couples who are looking for something new to try or get matching perfumes.

title: Maison 21G Perfume Workshop / Hotel Stay
desc: We had our workshop conducted by Hazirah and she was such a pleasant and knowledgeable instructor to have! We had an amazing great time and left with a perfume we both truly love. Highly recommend :-) On the hotel room, we were pretty bummed that 1) the toilet doesn’t come with a bidet, 2) the toilet has an unpleasant/funky scent, 3) the pillows were way too fluffy (and it’s a square shape instead of the usual rectangle). But overall, the hotel room is small but cosy and clean (important!). :-)

title: Perfume Making Workshop
desc: Trainer Shahirah was very experienced and helpful. Gave many ideas and suggestions. Good quality materials provided and session was enjoyable. Timing was just nice. I wasn’t rushed to complete my two bottles (topped up during the class itself, they are flexible that way Highly recommended.

title: Unacceptable check in time
desc: Ruined our vacation. Check in time was 3pm so I’d expect rooms to be ready by then. We arrived late at 4pm and queued almost an hour before our turn to reach a counter. There were only 5 guests in front of us and 2 counters and yet it took forever. When it was our turn at 4.55pm, they said room was not ready and housekeeping needed another 30mins or so, so gave us a welcome drink at the hotel bar/restaurant, which really was just coffee/tea/juice or a can of beer. Waited for another 1.5hours (until around 6.30pm) and I even made 2 trips back during that time to check on the status. We wasted 3 hours doing nothing, couldn’t even rest properly. They offered late checkout but what’s the point if we already have activities planned the next day and can’t stay. Completely unacceptable

title: Staycation CNY
desc: Thank you for the excellent service by Diana, who personally went to my room to help me open my door cos I thought the access card was not working. She was patient enough to explain the use of the F&B voucher, which was a nice touch from the hotel. Maria at the front desk was also cheerful in greeting me when I checked out.

title: Unacceptable service.
desc: Experienced a very disappointing trip to M social. Check-in time was 3pm but only managed to get into the room at 630pm. We were offered late checkout and free breakfast as compensation which we chose to be served at 930am, so I set an alarm to be prepared to receive it. Next day, wokeup to doorbells being spammed at 830, saying that our breakfast is here. Had breakfast and went back to rest, but got woken up again at 1137am to phone ringing 3 times but could not get there in time before it stopped. Chromecast on TV was horrible throughout the night as it would restart every 10mins, so gave up using it and just used my phone. All in all a very disappointing trip which is out of the norm from all the staycays I have had in Singapore.

title: Staycay at M Studio with Perfume Making Workshop!
desc: The Perfume Making Workshop is what attracts me to booking the staycay. It was informative and fun making my own scent that I prefer. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable! Recommended to try the workshop!

title: Great 2nd visit
desc: 2nd time I have stayed in this hotel. Generally fuss free check in and fast check out. I had the same loft room on level 6 over my last 2 stays here. Only comment is the TV should be viewable from the bed. However it is upstairs in the loft, hidden from the bed downstairs. I would also like to suggest discounts for dining in the hotel's one and only restaurant "Beasts and Butterflies." Food there is great! Champagne is also wonderful! Overall I enjoyed the stay here and coffeemaker in the room!

title: Bottled Up Happiness Stay Package
desc: Shahirah is very accommodating and patient during the perfume making workshop. On top of that, she gave a few friendly advices on the scent suitability. We really enjoy the process and it’s definitely worth the experience!

title: Bottled up happiness
desc: The workshop was really enjoyable and eye opening. Shahira was very patient and friendly towards us as we tried out so many different scents. She gave us a lot of advices too as we find our favorite scent combination. All in all this package is really worth the price and it was a really enjoyable experience.

title: Recommend this place :>>
desc: loved our stay here! gallery loft was cozy and clean. restaurant (beast & butterflies) had great ambience and food, especially the nasi lemak breakfast, was spectacular. amazing customer service too! receptionist (Hamzah) was affable and made us feel super welcomed. would definitely come back again :”)

title: Refreshing experience!!
desc: Learnt about the various types of scents, and had fun mixing my own, very happy with the end product!! (: Would highly recommend as an activity for couples seeking for a novel experience, not to be missed!

title: Joyful
desc: Housekeeping did a very good job. Though I don’t know all of their names, Paramus (Para) is one of the housekeeping. Everytime I got back to the room, I feel comfortable, clean along with the nice scents. I want to thank her and every staff in M social, I really enjoy the days here.

title: Do not stay here!!
desc: my friends booked M social via booking.com for my hen’s night in Feb 2022. It was delayed from Nov 2021 because of phase 2 HA and booking.com charged them double the rate because of the date change. We ended up paying $755 for 2 cosy aclove rooms. Cosy indeed, the room is so small you wont be able to open a suitcase or change your clothes in the toilet without hitting the wall. The toilet is so small that the sink has to be in the bedroom. The bed is so cosy that it’s clearly a super single, although the counter staff begged to differ and said it’s a standard queen size (yea right). The room had a balcony shrouded by trees and plagued with mosquitoes. The sofa seat in the balcony was drenched with rain water. What a waste of space. We booked 2 cosy aclove rooms, one reeked

title: 1 night stay
desc: Booked this hotel for a 1 night stay as our appartement was still not ready. General amenities were okay but we found that the room was not cleaned properly, the hair dryer wasn’t working and there was no proper ventilation in the bathroom. Overall the wear and tear of the room was clearly visible.

title: Cocktail session at beast and butterfly
desc: Yummlicious cocktail learning with Fiona. Fantastic learning of each layers of cocktail using scent and taste. Great knowledge sharing of cocktail from Fiona. Learning so much more about spirits and mixers.

title: Friendly Shanna
desc: During our stay (16-18 Mar), Shanna was very friendly and accommodating to many of our requests. She was genuine and efficient although new at work and was able to provide a high level of hospitality to us. We visited M Social Hotel again because we simply love the whole experience especially the swimming pool. Housekeeping boys were very nice to accomodate our requests too. And the highlight of our stay here again had to be the splashing good time! Area for growth: One of the waitresses who served us at our first breakfast was not as customer oriented as compared to the service we had at our previous visit.

title: Excellent solo staycation
desc: Checked in on 27 Feb 1510 hrs. Farisha assisted my check in. It took about 25 min to complete the check in and get my room key. I informed Farisha that I am on Health Risk Notice, and she said just remember to take your ART test daily. If need any assistance just let her know. The room is a bit small thou. The breakfast was great. English breakfast or nasi lemak or yogurt cereal. It is ala cart buffet. Afternoon went to beast and butterflies for desert. It is nice. On my last day, after my breakfast a staff came up to me and offer me a care pack, and said there is mask, hand sanitizer, mouth gargle and blood pressure monitor. Pack in a box. I took it without knowing there are so many masks and hand sanitizer in it. Really appreciate it from M Social hotel staffs hardwork.

title: Maison 2G perfume workshop@M Social Hotel
desc: Awesome experience! It was very interesting to mix up my own perfume and the spread of option was amazing. Ana was very patient, friendly and clear in her explanation and steps to making my perfume. Love the outcome of what I had mixed! Definitely a must do workshop when staying at M Social Hotel. :)

title: Amazing Service !
desc: It was pleasant staying at M Social Hotel. Whole staff and ambience made me feel at home also hospitality and food was great. Would love to come back and explore more. The whole experience of staying at M Social Hotel was mind boggling. Thanks to the Front Desk Staff Yunting for smooth check-in, Farishah for the wake up call service and the Manager Liana for the amazing and prompt service to ensure that we had a great experience thru out our stay in the Hotel!

title: Pleasant getaway
desc: Stayed in the Alcove Cosy Twin Room for one night with a close friend. We were surprised when we entered the room because it looked bigger in the pictures. That said, I felt the room was a good size for the two of us. The high ceilings made the room feel more spacious too. The beds were really comfortable and I slept extremely well. Think the blackout curtains contributed to my good sleep too. I liked that there were a good number of charging points situated around the room. I found the toilet to be quite small, although I must mention that I really enjoyed the relaxing rain shower! Another thing to note is that the sink is located outside the toilet (it's at the foot of the beds and beside the TV). Strange location... but it does mean you're able to use the sink even when the

title: Great Day-cation at M Social Hotel
desc: First off, I enjoy hotel hopping and for this hotel, it was a great experience :) The check-in was smooth and efficient thanks to the staff that was assisting me. The instructions given during the check in were clear and my partner and i had a great stay overall except for the exceptional choice of coloured cups haha! High ceiling was the xfactor for me! On the other hand, there was a sink in the middle of the room which made it a little awkward and water was splashing everywhere but no biggie wasn’t a big problem. Will be back for another staycay maybe?

title: Unpleasant stay
desc: Went for a 1 night stay at M Social on 18 Mar 2022. Was supposed to check in at 3pm but informed them that we going for late check in. Came at 6pm but they do not have a room available for us and receptionist told us to wait. Waited until 8pm but still no room for us! In the end they changed our room from Alcove to Loft. However the room door was difficult to open, the water flow in the sink was slow, dusty lamp and bad room service (requested for body wash and water bottles, waited 3 hrs before finally received!) Bad bad bad. Hope those who booked did not experienced like we did. Totally not recommended.

title: Perfume Workshop Staycation
desc: Was really fun to have a perfume workshop along with the staycation! I had enjoyed trying out the different scents on their own, followed by mixing them and trying out different combinations to get a scent that is uniquely my own

title: great location, cozy room
desc: The stay was great. Even though the room was relatively small, it is quite cozy, which is suitable for couples. The location is a plus point for the hotel, many food options available nearby. The ambience around there is also very nice. Overall, it was a pleasant experience!

title: StayCay
desc: I was amazed by the service staff of the hotel. The front office clerk Ms Yun Ting helped my friends and I checked into our rooms with smooth and efficient speed. Ms Marina greeted us and gave my friends and i some care packages for our stay and lastly Ms Hazirah was kind enough to direct us to the nearest convenience store at 3am in the morning. Overall the service staff were kind and were willing to assist us. Would definitely go back again.

title: Perfume making
desc: Personalized perfume making session was fun! Shahira made it so comfortable and easy to understand! Kudos to her we discovered something new! We highly recommend anyone who is looking to customize your scent! Give Maison 21G @m social a go!

title: Staycation with Perfume making workshop
desc: Perfume making workshop was fun! Enjoyable session with Shahira, she is really informative and patient! Staycation package is really worth it with the perfume making workshop! Memorable experience! 😊

title: Review of M Social
desc: Pleasant, boutique hotel. Staff are friendly and service-oriented. Location is along the river, and accessible to many F&B outlets and walking trails along the waterway. Had a relaxing stay. Could have a wider selection of movie channels. Highly recommended if you wish to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city.

title: No frills and efficient
desc: Confession. I worked around the area when I was young. 2 overseas stints and 20 years later, the area has changed much The room is cosy and efficient with space. It was clean and proper. No complaints. I’ll just zero in on what I didn’t like much. Toilet no bidet. That’s it literally. Everything else was pleasant. As mentioned space in room used well. Tv, safe, fridge, dressing table. Nice bed. And wifi of course. Gratis Check in was 3pm. Out was 11am. Service is prompt and patient. I called for a bathrobe and one came immediately without hassle. Front desk is polite. Be kind to them. Looked overwhelmed when I was checking in (that shows hotel popularity) I think the hotel only suits 2 profiles. One - the person who only needs a roof. Goes out the whole day and comes back

title: Too many minor and not so minor faults
desc: My second stay at M Social - first since 2019 and overall a disappointing experience. I phoned about an advertised upgrade deal in advance to be told there were plenty of rooms and to enquire on arrival. There were no rooms when I arrived early in the morning after a long flight which was irritating- I was moved later that day but in the meantime the shower was broken. The air conditioning packed up - I assumed I was using it incorrectly but the maintenance man said he could see it was faulty on their system - not sure why they don’t check it routinely. Had to move again. The room amenities incl towels were not topped up daily - once I had no hand towels or bath mat at all. Had to search for a cleaner to get supplies. Had backache from day 2 onwards - new for me - but

title: Easter Staycation
desc: Had a short weekend stay with friend. Was given free room upgrade and service was good! Thanks to M social, my friend and I were able to spend some pleasant time together. Loved the neighborhood area, Robertson quay, decent place to have a walk after meals especially at night. Surrounded by many eateries, no need to walk far for food.

title:
*Very Poor Service
*Very Small Room
*Poor Internet Service.
*cleaners/room service is Poor
desc: We booked from 30/4/2022 to 2/5/2022. Not a good place for staycation. Room is very small. Internet service is not good. Even if you are already connected but signal keep switching off and cannot reconnect. Until we call again the counter for IT help, that IT personnel told me that they need to accept my unit before i can use the internet even if i already connect to hotel wifi. Poor Room Service / cleaners: the cleaners will not clean the room untill we already called them to clean at 5:30pm already, so they never cleab our room the whole day and not replace the towels and bedsheets. After the cleaners came to change our bedsheets and towels, we still noticed that tissue, body wash/shampoo/comditioners was not changed to new one and atill need to tell them. The swiiming pool

title: Highly recommended not to stay
desc: No matter who pays, is it by yourself or your company. But staying has to be money worthy. I think M Social has disappointed by far considering everything of this hotel. I just cannot find a single good thing to write about. Let me give some bad sides of this hotel: Front Desk: They are always extreme busy always. I think they just memorized the steps and deliver accordingly. They have to be a lot more slow while dealing with customer. They are always in hurry seems like they have to catch a train. Room quality: Tremendously bad. Not money worth it all. Breakfast: I was quite surprised that till some hotels are available who don't give buffet breakfast. Here you have to order your breakfast and wait for 15 mins. If there are more customers then waiting time will be more. C'mon

title: Nice
desc: Booked via Klook. Free upgrade room for stay. Staff are friendly. The perfume workshop is amazing. We are really appreciated. Well explain about the scene and got the perfect perfume for me. Noiceeeee!

title: Maison 21G Perfume Workshop
desc: Calm and adventurous session to discover scents that are catered to u based on a quiz. Additionally, customising your own scent adds personality and depth to your vey own fragrance! For fragrance aficionados, come down to try most of the Maison 21G fragrances

title: Perfume Workshop was great!
desc: Anna was very helpful and patient in guiding us through the whole perfume Workshop! I got to take a personality test which helps me find the scent combination of my liking and managed to create a scent I really liked.

title: Perfume workshop at m social
desc: Perfume workshop was quite the experience. Ana was knowledgeable and provided good recommendations on alternatives perfume. Will definitely come back if they have a staycation package! It's been fun! !

title: Awesome 9 Days 8 Nights
desc: We had a great stay in M Social. The room is very cozy. Check-in and check-out process was super fast and smooth. The room attendant made our room daily when we are out, it was nice to always come back to a clean room after a long day. Amenities were delivered fast. We didn't try the pool and gym as we were busy outside the whole day exploring SG. The staffs are very polite, friendly, and attentive. Housekeeping staff Li Xing and Hazurrah brought the amenities that we requested with a big smile and ensure that we have all that we need. Front Office staff Yun Ting, Farisha, Sabrina, and Hazirah always greet us with their warm smile and assist us with our inquiries. Beast & Butterflies' foods are amazing. Fiona and Carisa made sure we had a great time during our meal. See you

title: Excellent Service, especially Yunting!
desc: This is my 4th times staying at M Social Hotel since the beginning of this year, so I really feel the staffs at M Social are excellent! Always ready to assist the guests with great personality and friendliness! I messed up my most recent reservation and Yunting was there to listen to me very patiently and helped me to resolve the mess seamlessly! Very professional and yet friendly with sincere smile radiating from her eyes even with her mask on. Very grateful and thankful for her help. The rooms at M Social Hotel are very well maintained and clean, the room size are normal but the high ceiling helps to keep the claustrophobic in me at ease. It’s a nice and quiet place to take a time off staycation. The location of M Social Hotel is conveniently located near eateries, pubs

title: Perfume making workshop
desc: First time learning and going to a perfume workshop. The whole experience was fun and enjoyable. We get to keep the perfume we make and trainer Ana is very patience and knowledgeable she share her knowledge to us so we are able to choose what we want fast.

title: 3 night stay - it was great
desc: Read many of the negative reviews. Not sure why their experience were so unpleasant. For me, it was okay. Given the steep discount offered. It was $170 a night for a Loft Premier. I even extended by purchasing $150 Loft gallery, but they agreed to upgrade me to a Loft Premier. Front desk staff were friendly. My extra bottles of water came quickly (it’s a habit of mine to get them as I drink a lot). Check in was smooth. Room cleanliness: 9/10. It’s definitely not dusty and the bed is clean (I have sensitive skin). Use the room slippers provided and you will not have any issue with cleanliness. The hotel is part of SG Clean after all. Minus points to obvious wear and tear on the sink and shower area. In summary, loved the 3 night stay. Fuss free and staff were polite and

title: Great location, ordinary breakfast
desc: We stayed at M Social for nearly a month. Biggest pro was the location, right on Robertson Quay. Biggest con was breakfast. Beast and Butterflies is the restaurant connected to the hotel and where breakfast is served. The food overall there is excellent - the cous cous salad and grilled salmon were standouts. But the breakfast was appalling. Three a la carte options only, no buffet. Imagine a white toast, wilted salad, lukewarm hash browns affair. There were no real healthy options either which, day after day, made for monotonous and unappetizing eating. We abandoned breakfast there after day four. The rooms were quite good, compact but design inspired eg cathedral ceilings, little courtyard off your room. Clever features included things like space under the bed to store excess

title: Nice hotel but beware: prioritise new customers for housekeeping; mouldy pillows; ignore your feedback after asking
desc: I do not have any more access to the survey the hotel asked me to fill up but luckily I compiled my responses below. I gave feedback on 9 May and had not heard anything from the hotel even though I asked on 17 May. And when I asked through IG and FB DMs, all they can say is please call/email the hotel (the same email that has not been responsive), or to fill up yet another form online. If you are not serious about getting feedback or improving, please don't waste customers' time. Housekeeping: The housekeeping staff was trying her best but obviously overworked. On the first day, I kept my make-up room (MUR) light on when I went out and also verbally told one of the front counter staff in person to make up the room. When I came back to the room 3 hours later, the room was still

title: Feedback on honeymoon staycation
desc: We initially booked the Alcove room with honeymoon decoration. But were surprised to see anniversary decorations instead. It wasn’t a big deal for us actually and we just wanted to highlight to the staff. But the staff was polite and very professional on handling the issue and offered us to upgrade our room to loft premier. Shoutout to Syahirah for her professionalism. Thank you M Social for the wonderful experience.

title: Mr J Buchan
desc: For anyone thinking on booking this hotel which is at a premium rate, you are booking basically a cupboard. There is very little room to open your luggage apart from being placed on the bed. Beware when using the toilet and shower room as the door handle is lethal. This resulted in a cut head and a report of a member of staff cutting their arm.

title: Amazing staycation
desc: Perfect location and modern hotel. The hotel is small but it got everything you need. they don't have many restaurants but it's near to Clark quay ( an enormously helpful desk staff that guided us to restaurants) .

title: Dirty rooms and our bathroom leaked
desc: We booked their Alcove cosy room for 8 days and on my first night... my room was flooding, not extreme flooding but the water from the bathroom was leaking to the bedroom. Upon checking in, I checked the room and there was no water (usually complimentary). The room was a little small and seemed dusty. I advised reception regarding my room and they sent an 'engineer' to check my room ... however it was so blase and the engineer said that I had to move rooms.. quite obvious as my floor was wet. After speaking with reception I was advised that someone would be there to assist with my luggage etc... they came 40 minutes later and I had to follow up. Please note, this occurred during 10:40pm to 11:50pm.. you can imagine how exhausted I was. We were moved to a different room and to my

title: Excellent!
desc: First of all, I love the area. The hotel is located around the riverside and is very peaceful. Having a drink and delicious dishes at the location is one of the best memory of my stay in Singapore. Staffs are very friendly and lovely. The hotel is very modern and nice. Therefore, I recommend M Social Singapore. Thank you so much for all.

title: Perfume Workshop
desc: Awesome and fun way to design your own perfume. Shahira is helpful and knowledgeable with recommending different perfume scents. The packaging and variety of perfumes are great. Recommend my friends to try it out

title: Super long waiting for check in
desc: This hotel is understaffed, and the check in process is very slow, which results in a long queue which extends out to the outside of the hotel. Waited for 3 hours before getting a room, this is unacceptable.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Very fun. Able to try out the different scents and make your own customized perfume! Ana who was conducting the workshop was v friendly and informative:) You can bring back a 30ml bottle of perfume and can bring to the Madison 21G shop for engraving of your name on the bottle.

title: Staycation for occasion
desc: Checkout was smooth because opted for express checkout so we could skip the queue, check in was fast and smooth as well and we were able to check in early. Customer service was excellent from the beginning to the end.

title: Couple staycation
desc: Smooth check in and check out. Went for the cocktail masterclass with the hotel package. Was fun and interesting. Room was tad small with the loft but still comfy and quiet. Helpful with our request of wine glass and a bucket of ice for our room!

title: Love the vibe !
desc: M social colours and vibe … really fabulous location .. Robertson quay ! Good breakfast Thank you for a lovely visit . Will be back to visit . Stay for business . Nice for entertaining . Clean and lovely loft rooms .

title: Amazing service
desc: The housekeepers were amazing and the staff were also good. Mallika was my room service person and she left the room looking more stunning each time. Great place. Amazing location- has a lot of good bars and restaurants around.

title: Best Staycation Ever
desc: It was a short getaway for myself. I have been wanting a break from work. I stayed in the loft room, bed and work area were separated, it was quite an unique design. Staff are so welcoming and helpful. I will be back again to try other types of room

title: Cosy and pleasant stay
desc: The room is cosy, just nice for 2 persons staying. Staff are friendly and have been accommodating. The food at the restaurant is pretty good. My friend and i have enjoyed our stay, we will be back again

title: Designed room
desc: Room is cosy though small but located at Robertson Quay with lots of nice Food and Beverage choices. Will return for my next visit. Food at Beast & Butterflies was excellent too with cariza who was able to recommend their best dashes.

title: Scent making workshop
desc: Very professional workshop with wide range of scents available. Our guide Ana was very informative and gave suitable ideas based on our preferences. Would highly recommend to everyone who wants to smell good! 👍🏻

title: Good Service from staff
desc: My wife and I was checking in, we were assisted by Danial and Hazirah, who both were very joyful and cheerful despite being scolded by a couple of others who were infront of us. Usually I would expect the service would be negative but they made us feel welcome and the warmth of him made us feel positive of the stay. Although Danial was alone, he managed to handle everything well, even with the help of Hazirah they served us very well. I would recommend this place to my kids when they come. Thank you to the both of them.

title: Average review.
desc: Hassle free check in. Room is nice. Good environment. Limited selections for breakfast. Mis-comm with information given. Knew nothing about the check out time at all. Standard check out time is 11am but was told and written as 12noon. Had to rush out. The room still feels like north pole despite temperature was adjusted to 30°c and with only 1 blade spinning speed. Service given was ok. Staffs are all friendly and approachable. Took the staffs quite awhile to send up extra sets of shower gels and new sets of towels when requested.

title: All is good except the pillow
desc: I got 4 pillows which are all in square shape. Not a rectangular shape as it should be and that makes me woke up at night few times (not a good sleep) due to felling off the pillow when flipping during the night.

title: Millennium DNA
desc: Tried the loft room this time around as I enjoy the quiet area away from the bustling work demands Walking distance away from Clarke Quay with many tourist attraction and eateries Room was well efficient with the tv and and relaxing sofa upstairs. Hot water in the bathroom. Fridge available. Wifi was easily connected Cosy, clean and comfortable Staff were polite and courteous.

title: Amazing service
desc: While checking in, I was kindly given a free room upgrade and breakfast for two! It made the staycay so much better! The room (Loft Gallery) was perfect for two people, and we love the way the room was beautifully designed. Would definitely come back here again!

title: Awesome location though small room size
desc: Perfect location and a very nicely maintained hotel . Right along the river , gives a perfect evening view too . Lots of cafes around . Their own beast and butterflies is also amazing . Local supermarket nearby so u can get ur supplies too . Rooms neat and clean and awesome room service for Amy kind of help u need. Staff is sweet and courteous special mention for Marina who made our stay comfortable. Room size though is very small.. infact very very small but I belive it's the thing with most of the hotels in singapore . Also to mention here .. its very weird to have the washbasin in the bedroom and not in the washroom .. I wonder why they did that. Breakfast can be better .. They have very limited options ( that too for 20sgd) and that too repetitive (we stayed for 4

title: 3D2N staycation at loft premier
desc: Pleasant stay with hotel, friendly and helpful concierge. Room was dusty but was offered a free upgrade and change of room. Staff was prompt and handled the issue well, was served by Shi Jing! ☺️ Lots of restaurant options in the vicinity, within walking distance ~

title: The guest
desc: Thank you for the good service,hoping to visit again soon .i'd also like my family and freinds experience the good quality hotel here in singapore and have some fun while enjoying there vacation and accomodation at service.

title: Clean and enjoyable stay
desc: The room are clean, bed is nice, just that the room cleaning service takes place every 3 days.. but overall, it is still fine as in 3 days, we will not havr enough time to mess up the room yet. Checking out is fast too. Like it and will stay again next time.

title: Awesome and refreshing 3D2N staycaytion
desc: Spent the 3D2N weekend here at M Social while participating in our church camp held at Grand Copthorne waterfront which is a short walk away. We enjoyed our stay here. The room was small but was cozy and had everything we need as we only used the room to rest and sleep at the end of the day and during breaks but most of the activities were outside. The vibe surrounding the hotel was quaint and lovely, great to take walks around, littered with cafes and restaurants, prices were on the higher end but affordable. The bed was small for 2 of us but very comfortable. The only con was the red light coming from the TV which was very obvious at night and took a bit of getting used to but not really much of an issue. Overall we enjoyed our time! Will be back again for sure! Thanks all!

title: Staycaytion at M Social
desc: Great service and kind receptionists, We were 15 minutes late for our check-in but they were okay with it. The hotel even gave us a complimentary room upgrade and the view was not too bad. The room was clean and neat, Door needs fixing though.

title: It's a great week staying at M Social!
desc: Everything is great! Clean and cozy! The only thing I haven't tried is the pool coz it's always raining when I wanted to swim. Next time! Amazing cleaners too. Thanks alot M Social. Best stay here!!!!!!!!!

title: Loft Terrace Garden with Perfume Workshop
desc: Awesome perfume workshop hold by Marina. She gave very nice suggestion to the type of scent to mix and match. Very observant to what i like and don't. The room is just right for two pax. Love the coziness of it!

title: Great Staycation
desc: Staff were really friendly and helpful. Despite the queue, I can feel the staff trying their best. They have been showing their warm service and have been trying to help me with my lengthy questions. I will definitely come back again

title: Bad customer service as well as proposition
desc: Arriving early, I was not provided a room and unlike other hotels giving out rooms as they become available, this one insisted that we come back at 3. Fair enough. But on arrival at 3, provided a room with technical failure. Upon going back to front desk and asking a replacement, they suggested to check the original room first!! As if i am lying or that is the only room at the hotel. Raising my voice got them going but seemed like they did the check anyways!! I was provided a replacement which turned out a/c was faulty!! They decided to service it while i am in it! why dont you give me another room, perhaps upgrade. Havet i suffered enough? I have only been in the hotel 45 minutes. I need to stay here 2 nights gets me worried.

title: First holiday in 4 years
desc: Thank you to Shi Jing, Keith and the team for being so friendly and helpful during our stay. There was a delay on arriving at the hotel of our booking confirmation coming through. They supplied a chilled bottle of water each to calm us down while they quickly resolved the issue and then supplied us with an immediate upgrade of our room. Always happy to advise, help and book taxis too. Thank you once again

title: A pretty small and average hotel room
desc: Don't get me wrong, 5 stars was for how overall everything was alright, nothing too drastic for us to not give 5 stars however, we got the loft terrace room, we'd expect it to be a little bigger but that's not the case. Well definitely with the loft space and the patio, the sqm is bigger but the spaces in between are very narrow. Our room layout was that we had the bed downstairs and the couch and television on the loft space so the gap between the steps leading up to the stairs and the bed was very narrow, my pinky toe hit side of it couple of times and it swelled for a while so that was uncomfortable. The couch and the angle of the television was kind of awkward in a way I don't know how to put into words, the television has a movable mount so you could move it to face your

title: Nice Hotel with Nice Staff
desc: Check in at 3am. Efficient & fast check in process by the front desk staff. Being offer late check out due to my late check in. Thank you for the offer. Room a bit small compare my stay at others hotel. Overall clean and nice room. Breakfast acceptable but it won't be good if more choice available.

title: Overpriced 3 Star
desc: Overpriced hotel with poor service. Furthermore to cut costs the hotel fails to uphold cleanliness and other standards. For instance garbage in the hallways. Small rooms. The breakfast buffet is not worth it. Flies all over the fruit and an automated machine that makes horrible omelets. The only thing going for it is the location.

title: M Social Perfume Discovery
desc: Wonderful and quick perfume workshop conducted by Ana. A collection of scents to explore and enjoy taking you to an odyssey of wonderful fragrances and allowing me to reminisce on the memories I have with scents

title: Perfume Workshop
desc: Very interesting experience. We explored a beautiful sensory journey of the different scents the world can offer. The workshop enhanced the way we appreciate the different notes of each and every scent. To be able to create our own scent was definitely a fun way to discover ourselves.

title: Splendid
desc: Great location and very friendly and attentive staff. Having wide range of eateries plus grocery stores on your doorstep (on the Quay) is a big plus and very easy to get to CBD and central shops etc by online cab call service in the lobby. Will definitely stay again and highly recommend.

title: Staycation
desc: The hotel service was great, the room was neat and clean . The service staff Hazirah knowing that it was my boyfriend’s birthday had given us little surprises. We enjoyed our staycation at M social and will definitely come back again.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Love the perfume workshop. Ana is very good at explaining things and she is very accommodating. I got the scent that I exactly want. The overall experience is very unique. Will totally recommend this to our friends and definitely coming back again.

title: Cute trendy hotel
desc: Fuss free check-in, rooms were spacious and clean! Wasn't too impressed with the breakfast there to be honest but location was great! Have stayed here twice before, once in the alcove room and once in the loft. Found the alcove room to be quite cramped and our bathroom door kept getting stuck. Overall was an ok stay with friendly staff though!

title: Loft Experience
desc: Had an amex promo and took the chance to try M Social. I specially selected the loft gallery room since this looks pretty unique among other hotels, did some research and found that this is newer than Studio M (do not be confused with this!) The 2-storey loft concept is nice as you end up with quite some real estate but take note on the climbing up and down a lot. The premium loft might be a better option at a slightly more premium price since the bed is located on top. It also has a nice pool allowing a long lap. Food was alright but the hotel is near numerous highly rated cafes, you will not be short of options. Nearest shopping mall at Great World is about a 30min stroll away, with a nice view along the way.

title: Overnight trip
desc: Stayed here just overnight but enjoyed our stay. We checked in very late in the night and requested for late check out and was granted. Didn’t manage to get his name but the front desk male staff who assisted us (who had the same birthday as me) was very friendly. We went for breakfast the next morning and it seemed as though the timing told to us was incorrect as there were still people coming in after 0930 when we were told that it was till 0930. Automated omelette machine was very busy and you might have to wait for abit for your turn. Bathroom is alittle small. Location wise, it was slightly far from public transportation but we loved the neighborhood and it’s proximity of being near to so many cafe / restaurants. Tip: Try to avoid peak check in / check out times as it

title: Splendid Stay
desc: The room was spacious and neatly cleaned, Vivian the room service was very professional , helpful and the best in her work. Also the staff was polite and helpful. The place in near by the river and has many good restaurants nearby. The gym and the pool area was also nice

title: Fun Perfume Workshop
desc: The website personality quiz recommendations was a little strange, but we got to sample all the scents and Ana was very patient in letting us pick and choose our scents. Very fun! Would highly recommend it

title: Seeking solace
desc: Staff at check in counter Natasya is so warm and sweet. She is very forthcoming and makes u feel.welcome. thank you for making me feel welcome. Thank you for your warmth and hospitality. You displayed sincerity and seems to enjoy your work at the front desk. Continue to shine!

title: Expensive Rabbit Hole - Look Elsewhere
desc: First up I must applaud the staff. Everybody was exceptionally friendly and professionell. But this is where the good things end. We stayed two nights. Our room was paid with Qatar Airways miles. The booking process was a nightmare as there was a "third party" in between. It took me several expensive phone calls to Singapore to sort it out. The biggest nightmare is the room. You cannot build hotel rooms any smaller than that. There is no chance to have two suitcases open at the same time. The washbasin is in the bedroom. Seriously????? Who designs such a nonsense. Have a look at the photos posted by others and you begin to understand. The normal price - which we did not pay - is $250 per night - for a rabbit hole..... Stay away from this hotel unless you only want a bed

title: Check-in process can be Improved
desc: The room is awesome, with the bed in the loft but no TV since it was positioned downstairs. One should be able to enjoy the TV from the bed. Such a weird layout. There was also the sound of weights being dropped on the floor coming from upstairs. Seemed like a gym above / in the vicinity of room 302. The Check-in process takes too long compared to other hotels. What is the point of scanning the QR code for registration just to register again at the counter? I thought I have provided my Credit Card info upon booking and uploaded my NRIC image via the QR registration. Why do I have to go through this again? This experience hasn't changed after visiting this hotel for the 4th time. Check-in can certainly be improved. Quick Check-out box used to be placed on the left of the

title: Staycation
desc: Had a great staycation at Social M. Was offered a room upgrade to the loft and an extended check out upon request. Ana whom attended to us at the perfumery workshop was fun and friendly as well. Breakfast was good. Only disappointment was that the TV and the bed was not on the same level for the loft. Overall still a good staycation!

title: Staycay
desc: Staff at the front desk Jun Song and Leong san was extremely helpful and friendly hence making the stay more enjoyable! It was for my birthday and we were offered little surprises like complimentary Macarons. Would visit again for sure.

title: Avoid at all Costs
desc: 8 night stay - never again. Check in terrible - long queues -not enough staff. Mixed up my reservation with someone else with same first name - took ages to unravel. Room was tiny and dirty - sheets unlcean, bathroom similarly. Breakfast is completely uninspiring, managed it twice before going elsewhere for the rest of the stay - certainly not up to 4star Singapore standards. Bar closes on the dot at 11, and drinks were emptied into plastic glasses. Gym is small and not opened 24 hr - which is really inconvenient. In general the service is grumpy and uninspiring. Only good point is the location.

title: Room cleanliness is horrible
desc: Long queue when registering guest as there’s only 2 counters open and 2 other closed Room is pretty bad in cleanliness with foil on the floor, stain in the fridge, multiple flies in the toilet and musky smell in room. Switch casing came off which is extremely dangerous.

title: Daycation
desc: Friendly staff upon check in by staff name Zleena. Nice ambience and cozy lobby I would say. Walking distance from Blue line MRT station Fort canning roughly about 15 mins or less. Cafe at ground floor and it have express checkout.

title: Singapore Stopover
desc: Great experience overall, just didn’t get 5 as breakfast was fairly average (boring) - and room very small, but in hindsight we should have booked the loft room as there 5 days. The location of the hotel is stunning on the river and very green. Pool lovely. Very easy to get about SIngapore using Grab and although a bit of a walk to the underground, it’s pretty along the river.

title: All in all the hospitality i received in M Social was superb.
desc: I was checked in by a staff named Sleena. She has tattoos on her hands if i remember correctly. She welcomed me warmly and greeted me with a smile. She was very friendly and was very efficient in doing my check in. My whole experience at M Social was really good. Especially the front desk department. I think that hotels in Singapore needs more staffs like Sleena. Well done!

title: 2 nights staycay
desc: Everything is good, from check in to check out. The hotel room is quite clean, amenities are provided, Had some small defects with the AC and LeongSan who is working on night shift responded and attend to the issue very swiftly. LeongSan is the most courteous, patient and helpful staff I have ever met. He is always paying attention to his customers. Even the most subtle gesture will send him coming your way to assist. He shows perfect personality, cheerfulness and charisma, and always providing great suggestions to his customers to fulfil their needs and likings.M social is really fortunate having such a dedicated staff like him , and we will definitely recommend M social to all our families and friend to this hotel.

title: Excellent Albeit Quirky Hotel
desc: Friendly staff and the room was nice and clean. This hotel definitely deserves 5 stars. That being said, it does have its quirks, and here are a few: 1. Gym opens at 8am. Why so late? I'd like to get some exercise in before having breakfast, but with a team meeting at 9am, it's impossible. 2. That bathroom door. It has a huge bolt, it's very heavy and it auto closes. Why? I like leaving my bathroom door open for easy access in case I need something from the bathroom. 3. That bathroom sink. It's located, err, outside the bathroom. It's no big deal, but just strange.

title: Could be so much better.
desc: Well, where do I begin? The positives: the hotel is really well situated on the river, with some lovely restaurants and bars very nearby. The Alkaff Bridge is a short stroll and you can easily walk to Chinatown. Getting around is easy with Grab which is also well priced. The hotel is quite funky and the lobby has a really welcoming vibe. But that’s really where it ends. The staff on reception are just hopeless. Several of them crowded around only a couple of computers, slowly making their way through the check-in process, despite me having completed it all online. I had to slow the woman my confirmation email several times before she could find my booking. My deal with Expedia included a room upgrade which got a “computer says no” response. I went on to Expedia later and

title: Very nice atmosphere
desc: The staff was always very kind and supportive! For example, my adapter for my phone charger broke and they borrowed me one for my whole stay. Especially, Aliah was really nice to talk to! The breakfast was also good, and showed some variety every day - I very much enjoyed the possibility to sit outside. It was a relaxed and welcoming atmosphere. Thank you very much!

title: Stay for experience
desc: A hotel which is definitely for the millennials who would enjoy loft and cozy rooms with privacy, whether for personal or professional purpose. Loved hospitality, management is really good. If given a chance, I would stay here more often during my official visits. I had good time for my stay in Nov-22. Cheers! Tushar

title: Malaysia to Singapore
desc: I went by the bar and nobody acknowledged me. I ordered a drink off then “app” and my “made” drink ended up at the other side of the bar. I have tried multiple time to ring the bar but no answer. Multiple phone attempts but no answer.

title: Terrible service
desc: I start my staycation with a perfume workshop. Me and my partner enjoy it a lot. Special shout out to Ana, she was so patient when my partner have so many difficulties choosing her favorite scenes. However, I feel so frustrated with the evening staff service. The room phone is not working at all and this is how the hotel release room for guest??! When I approach the reception I feel like I talking with someone who works in a hawker center instead of a hotel. I request, a towel, wine glasses, and an opener because the whole room there is only one towel for two occupant rooms. Then she wants to pass the wine glasses to me right away instead of sending them to my room, is this the service you guys provide to your hotel guest?! She does not even apologize to the guest when there is

title: A terrible experience !!!!
desc: It was a terrible experience in this hotel. It is pricy but not worth at all. It is so call 4 star rating hotel but actually it is not. The room is not that clean as you can found hair on the wash basin and floor, bed is ok. The light is not enough in the room which even not able to have proper make up. Make up room service is very slow as I heard they lack of manpower which make it delays to 5pm still not yet make it. The house keeper even forget to refill your shower gel. Towel…..not to say, feel like they are in limit as well. The funny things are: 1) I was trapped in the bathroom a few Tim’s because of the poor glass door quality. 2) The entrance light was fixed for two times during my stay (6 days), and they even left the light bulb on the floor when I back into the

title: Top notch check-in! 👏🏻
desc: Customer service crew, Mr. Dann checked us in. We felt so honored as he isn't only attending to our needs but even gave us advices on transport & nearby risky road conditions. We arrived earlier than expected for unforeseen circumstances. 😢 He efficiently found out our needs, strived for excellency. Came all the way to us a few times when we were waiting outside the lobby to ensure we're checked in fast. How thoughtful & enthusiastic he attended to us. 😭 We were touched by his enthusiasm in making sure all guests are attended promptly & thoughtfully.

title: Excellent room
desc: Loft room was excellent. Fittings is new and deco is nicely done and optimized the space. The pool and gym is at level 5, pool and gym is small but it was not crowded when I was there. Max 15 min walk to great world city, convenient. But do note that the eatery nearby are pricey. Overall an excellent stay and recommended.

title: Enjoyed my stay
desc: Upon check in had some hiccups with regards to my reservation, but Duty Manager Faisal was very helpful and patience in assisting and able to resolve the issue. Service was great and front desk staff was fantastic in assisting us with attraction booking and directions. Rooms are decent size but was clean and bed were extremely comfortable. Breakfast was simple but delicious and sufficient.

Perfume workshop was very fun :) Ana was very friendly and the perfect host for the workshop. Would highly recommend! We also got the complimentary upgrade to the Gallery room so that was very good too.

title: Amazing service and stay
desc: Was hosted by Zleena on the first night and had such a good service that I extended another night. Had some issues with the room phone initially but she quickly solved it in a matter of seconds. She was very understanding and had amazing customer service, maintaining her professionalism despite faced with a difficult situation. Overall, kudos to the team at Msocial Singapore. Enjoyed my stay throughout.

title: Amazing staff
desc: Sean and Ana were the best in terms of making the process easy, helping me book the room when the website bugged out, etc. went the extra mile that you’d imagine that customer relations would have. The hotel itself is very nice and cozy. My first loft hotel experience. Loved the walled mirrors and comfort!

title: Great service and chill area:)
desc: Hazriah and his team helps a lot including but not limited to offer transportation and postal advice! One recommendation is to improve the notification of the robot service so that no back-and-forth is needed~ Definitely recommend the hotel here:)

title: Dissapointment.
desc: Everytime I called front desk to connect me to the restaurant they hung up on me. At the same time asking for items takes very long to the point I just went down only to be told they are sending it. Throughout the night i ate with my hands like a ravager. In the middle of the night staffs are using their phone more then attending or greeting the guest. Paying more only to be treated like peasants. Disappointed with the service, there used to be a man by the name Dann who works in the middle of the night but it seems he is no longer around. Bring him back. He gives us the top service.

title: From good intentions to empty promises
desc: i booked a room to stay for month mid of December 2022 in M Social but unfortunately had to cancel same due to family reasons. The booking was done basis "non-refundable" and i paid the full amount upfront. Nevertheless, when i had to cancel, the hotel was very forthcoming and wrote me an email saying that they understand my situation and will charge me only with a 2 nights penalty and refund the balance which would take 10-14 working days, hence they came forward with a very good intention which i really appreciated. however, after several requests from side in regards to the refund such as when it was sent or if they have a swift copy or similar so i can track the receipt, i was told various times that the accounting dept had expedited the re-payment but up to today no refund

title: Perfume Workshop is Awesome
desc: Perfume making workshop with Ana was fantastic! Highly recommended! Very informative and the experience is great for couples and friends. Got it as part of one of the Merlion Staycation offers! Highly customizeable scents!

title: Staycation
desc: Aliah has been helpful. And make our stay really nice and enjoyable. It's very restful and the buffet breakfast has been very much improved The surrounding is very beautiful and the rooms has been well maintained

title: Warm and welcoming staff at the front desk
desc: I got to M Social to check in and was immediately greeted by a wonderful staff named Zleena. She was all smiles throughout the check in process. She even ushered me to my room. The next day I was thinking of going to a bar but I don’t really know my way around here. So i asked Zleena. She was very helpful in giving all the information i need. I have to say that the front desk staff named Zleena is really wonderful. She really made my stay at M Social really delightful. Keep up the good work ethic. Kudos Zleena.

title: Great quirky hotel
desc: Have stayed here during January business trip and wanted to try something different from the usual business hotel that I‘be stay. Ended choosing m social for 3 night accommodation and they do not disappoint at all. The staff at the reception was warm and friendly. They Even provide a complimentary early check in which really makes a difference especially after a long flight. Rooms were clean and spacious sufficient for solo business traveller like myself. Did not manage to try out their breakfast but perhaps on my next trip back to Singapore.

title: Central location but service could be a little warm and friendlier.
desc: Impressive interior, the concept of the place was done well. The lofts had impressive floor to ceiling windows. Cozy and clean - sufficient for short stays. I just wished the sink was in the bathroom itself and not adjacent to the bed. Front Desk and Breakfast Staff - doesn't hurt to smile and greet a guest. Should learn from the housekeeping team as they never failed to greet me with a smile on the 6th floor.

title: Room was far to small, quite claustrophobic
desc: The hotel is in a great location at Robertson Quay and handy for the MRT at Great World. The staff were lovely and I got a late check out free to 2pm. The reason I gave 3 stars is because there were 2 things I wasn't happy with so I deducted a star for each. The room was tiny. More like a pod. I'd booked a double room and got the old twin beds pushed together job. This annoys me intensely. The sink was in the bedroom and it was just so so small. I had stayed in another hotel the weekend before and I could have fitted my pod here 3 times into the other hotels room. The second thing was that on my first night I was heading out and I was propositioned by prostitutes at the front door and when I rejected their advances one of them got abusive. I just walked away as I didn't want the

title: Grateful for the early check-in!
desc: Great service when I arrived. Planned to leave my luggages (brought plenty of stuff) and find somewhere to snooze a little since I arrived earlier than the 3pm check-in time, but staff offered an early check-in instead to make my life easier. Thanks Zleena! Promised to leave you a review so here it is! Will deffo come back again when I’m back in town

title: A pleasant stay
desc: We recently stayed four nights at the M Social (M for Millennium?) with two other couples. The M is well located at Robertson Quay, with many cafes, restaurants and bars located within easy walking distance along the river. The Havelock MRT station is a five minute walk away, and the MRT is by far the best and cheapest way to get around Singapore. We never waited more than 5 minutes for a train, everything is clean and so efficient. We bought an MRT pass at the airport and loaded $50 onto it. In our four days we would have caught 20-30 trains, and at the end we still had $35 left on our passes, which was refunded at the airport on the way out of Singapore. There is also a nice bar and restaurant located within the hotel, which is also the breakfast area. The buffet breakfast

title: Relaxing Stay
desc: Smart, well maintained hotel located in peaceful part of Singapore equipped with a gym and swimming pool with a view. Very friendly and professional staff. What's more delicious breakfast offering variety of options with coffee bao being my favourite.

title: Excellent service
desc: Excellent service! Very kind staff, great check- in experience, they even let me in before the check in time which was awesome. Rooms and beds comfy. This was my 2nd time here and can’t wait to come back again next time I’m in Singapore - highly recommend!

title: Cool and cozy
desc: Very nice Hotel and nice staff especially Lorna that took care of me with all my requests. The buffet breakfast is cool with the robot egg maker machine. Nice location and neighbourhood. I will definitely return here !!!

title: Feels like home 💕
desc: Check in with Cammy and Hazirah was smooth. They were engaging with us throughout and immediately it felt like home. Room was cosy and the view at the level 10 was truly amazing! All thanks to the front desk for catering to our request. We had a hard time opening the door though but Hazirah was so nice to follow us all the way up and guided us on the process. We could feel her sincerity assisting my partner and I during our stay. Definitely coming back again,

title: M Social awesome staycation
desc: This was my 3rd visit here and was greeted by a super friendly frontdesk, Zleena. Having also work in the service industry, I would say Zleena service was impeccable. She was extremely helpful, cheerful, went the extra mile.. I would even say that she's a star 🌟 in this industry. Good job, 👍🏽, Me and my wife would definitely come again.

title: I enjoyed my stay there. Will definitely come back and hotels should have more staffs like Zleena,lovely
desc: Great place was welcome with a staff. Big smile. Lovely. Zleena made me feel at home. She is so positive. Friendly too. We shared the same birthday. It's like we known each other for years. Keep up the good attitude. Love the restaurant too. Gd breakfast.

title: Amazing experience!
desc: Nice hotel with an amazing layout. Had a really enjoyable stay. Limited breakfast spread but tasted quite good if you're early and the food is still hot. Lighting of the hotel is also a little too dim for my liking. Would like to give special mention and thanks to the staff - especially Logaes & Vini. Logaes was super polite, friendly and made the environment super welcoming even at check in. Vini on the other hand was the night shift staff who was also polite at the many calls I was making and accomodated to my requests really politely and quickly. The housekeeping staff were also very nice and accomodated to all our requests for extra amenities. Thank you!

title: Excellent staff
desc: Absolutely the BEST hotel stay and experience. Staff is friendly and helpful, special thanks to the duty manager Wong Leong San. He is very thoughtful and made the beginning of our stay special and comfortable. Simply perfect all the way around.

title: convenient & enjoyable experience at m social SG
desc: me & my friend had enjoyed our time here at m social as we gt to catch up tgt plus the room was really cozy, jus nice for the 2 of us! its also walking distance to havelock station as well which was needed for us~ 🤗

title: Spot on!
desc: We loved our stay here. The staff were wonderful and the room was gorgeous. The location is perfect; right next to the river and we walked to Raffles along the lovely river path. We ate at the restaurant for dinner and breakfast. Highly recommend.

title: Very cozy place to take a break or work in the room.
desc: The place is really clean and the staff, vini, is very efficient. She speaks respectfully and does her best to make sure I have a good stay and nothing goes wrong. She takes initiative to pass us water when we are waiting for your room.

title: Great stay with good service and fantastic vibe
desc: Stayed from 10-12 Feb 2023. Great service overall from the service team who were friendly and helpful. Special shout out to Selina who helped us out with our requests, it worked out beautifully for us. The onsite restaurant, Beast and Butterfiles, was very convenient as it was raining throughout my stay and I had arranged to meet 3 different groups of friends there, which meant I didn't have to travel in the rain! The rooms are not the biggest, but we already knew that when we were booking the hotel. The rooms and the hotel were clean and met our expectations. 5 stars!

title: Perfume Workshop
desc: The perfume workshop is a fantastic activity for couples. The trainer Ana was very knowledgeable as well and patient in her teaching. Overall a great experience! Will recommend it to friends and family to come try it out!

title: One of the worst hotel stay experiences - poor service, unclean room, and extremely small room
desc: This is an absolutely horrible experience. One of the worst hotel stay experiences. There are so many issues but let me articulate three major set backs. First, the hotel staff demonstrated extremely poor service. When I walked up to the lobby check in counter, the staff was continuing to text on her phone and talking to me without even looking up. On the next day, when I came back to pick up my luggage that I had left, the staff asked me to go into the storage room and find my own bag! Second, the bathroom was extremely dirty. I could see the yellow urine stain on the toilet from the previous guest. Very disgusting. Third, the room size was extremely small. It was so small that the bathroom sink was located outside of the bathroom, literally right near the bed! All in

title: An amazing staycation
desc: Check in was a breeze with Qais. He provided us with an early check in as we were celebrating our wedding anniversary. The rooms were small. However, it was cosy,clean and comfortable. Overall, a great staycation and will definitely come back.

title: Fun & Engaging!
desc: We made our own perfumes with Ana from MSocial, and she was so kind and helpful! We're not usually perfume people, but it was still fun finding scents that fit our personality and doing 'chemistry' with the mixing. Thank you so much for the great experience! :D

title: Lovely staff, good value for money
desc: We stayed several times in the M Social - the central location and the (for Singapore!) reasonable price are strong arguments for the choice. The best about staying there are the friendly and helpful staff, Zleena at the reception helped my wife finding a doctor when she needed it, Lin in roomservice was a sunshine every day. Downsides are the very small rooms, for which only very very small beds fit, and rather complicated processes - you do a complete self-check-in online with passport fotos and all, but once there the whole process starts from scratch again.

title: clean and cosy
desc: I had a great time with M Social. Everyone is accommodating, including Ms. Li, the housekeeper assigned in her room. She is very warm and makes sure all our needs are attended to every single day. I look forward to visiting this hotel and booking the loft room again!

title: Nice experience
desc: Nice hotel,the breakfast it s fantastic. Beautiful swimming pool . The bed is confortable. The restaurant it s good and they are a lot of restaurant around ,good place i love it. Personnel is very friendly

title: Perfect woukd definitely stay again
desc: Great hotel. Stylish. Rooms great - wuitky in a good way. Bed comfortable. Mezzanine area with sofa. High ceilings floor to ceiling windows. Rooftop swimming pool. Lovely dining room & bar. Great breakfast. Staff couldn’t be more helpful. Lent us an adapter plug & an umberella. Offered luggage storage. Late check out at 12:00.

title: Great comfortable hotel in quiet location but central enough to see sights
desc: We stayed here for 10 nights in March 2023. The hotel is lovely and the staff really friendly and helpful. We arrived at 10.30am and check-in wasn't until 3pm. We had been travelling from England so Zleena managed to let us check-in early (complimentary) so we could get some sleep. We had a loft gallery room which was cosy, very clean and perfect for our needs. The high ceiling and little lounge area made it feel a bit more spacious. The shower room was clean and came with complimentary toiletries too. It has Wi-Fi, English plug sockets, complimentary water given each day. The bed and pillows were really comfy and there was air conditioning in the room too. The shower and toilet has blinds too so you're not exposed to your travelling companion! The hotel itself is in a quiet

title: Highly recommended !
desc: Good place and nice surrounding. Room service and hygiene is superb. Staff is friendly and supportive. Ideal place if you are on business purpose. Easy access to Great World, Havelock MRT and Clarke Quay.

title: Fun on the river
