desc: I had a lovely stay at M Social. They are conveniently located right on the river (beautiful spot!) amongst the hustle and bustle of all of the restaurants and Bars. It’s a very busy wee spot! I ate breakfast and dinner at the restaurant beasts and butterflies, Both were lovely (I especially enjoyed the Singapore sling cocktails!) the staff were very friendly and obliging and got to know their patrons closely each day. I’ll miss this lovely spot and will definitely be back!

title: Very good experience that I want to recommend to more
desc: The facility, hospitality and design details of hardware and process are very impressive and make people feel quite at ease. Frankly M Social wasn’t my first choice as the location isn’t the nearest one to my company, but the fantastic experience make me would like to overcome all the difficulties to put M Social my first choise any time I travel in Singapore. I would like to recommend to more of my colleagues and friends to come and have the superb experience as me.

title: Friendly staff at the restaurant
desc: We like this hotel for the location but also because of the restaurant. Beasts and butterflies has a very nice atmosphere and the staff is so friendly. We loved especially Linda and Siti who are so happy and caring! I think the European F&B manager can learn a lot from his staff. Good job staff we like to come back!

title: Never Try Never Know
desc: Breakfast, simple, but I get more than wat I need. Trust me, go n try d egg station. Happy hour, give me a surprise, in menu is summer fresh, v their refreshment ingredients. End up, they will custom make d refreshment drink according to weather n cheer up ur evening mode. Thanks and APPRECIATE to Naren

title: A restful DAYCATION
desc: I like how spacious the place was and not everything is in one space.. there is a loft. I love the loft. Everything was clean and the bed was amazing.. I got enough rest after a few days of hard work. The environment around it is pretty and able to explore heheh even though I am a local. I will come back here next time.

title: Great experience
desc: Good customer service! We were allowed an early check-in after a long tiring flight which made the whole experience alot better. Room was slightly smaller than it seems in the pictures but it has everything you need. House keeping was great too.

title: Good location - bad rooms
desc: The BAD : A. TINY room. a. Hardly any walking space around the bed. B. BADLY designed. a. The legs of the chair jut out into the narrow walking space -= TOE BREAKER b. the beds have a supporting leg in the middle - these are not seen because of the bedcover coming close to floor. another set of TOE BREAKERS ! c. Wash basin in the bedroom, 2 feet from the bed ! Never seen this anywhere C. Room Cleaning a. Room was not cleaned. Disconcerting to see we towels on the floor, tea sachets/ water bottles not replaced. The GOOD: Central location Close to the River The GOOD part was why we chose the location. And we were hot by the bad p[art. Choose the hotel if location is very important for you. Find out the dimensions / layout pf the room in advamce - maybe they have better

title: Ideal location, friendly staff
desc: M Social is a great place to stay. Perfect location with pleasant surroundings. Lots of restaurants close by with its own as well. Rooms are small but well equipped for a traveller. Very friendly staff and very clean accommodation. Second stay here and highly recommend.

title: Awesome stay
desc: Thank you Ana for the great hospitality. Wonderful stay at M Social and we hope we can stay here again when we return to Singapore. All the other staff were just as pleasant and accommodating too! We had a few requests for amenities made late in the night and items were delivered promptly.

title: Great experience!
desc: Stayed from 18-19 March for on night. Great service overall everyone is friendly and helpful. Special shout out to San who helped us out with our request he is friendly and politely!! The room is clean and tidy and all met our expectation.

title: Excellent!
desc: Excellent! As soon as you enter the hotel you realised the quality of the hotel! The hotel smells very nice! The bed and pillows are very comfortable! The design of the room is unique and beautiful! Cleab room! The breakfast was very good! The staff was helpful!

title: Great Staff
desc: hard working dedicated front desk staff, always ready to help. Huge thanks in particular to Zleena, so helpful, best of the best, she saved my day twice with superb assistance. Smiling & professional from start to finish, despite long shifts at Ede. Nice rooms, great value for Singapore. Superb robo service in the restaurant! Only one tiny gripe - shame the gym has no rowing machine, every hotel should have one!

title: Memorable 4-day Staycation
desc: Had a 4-day staycation at M.Social in April 2023 and thoroughly enjoyed the experience. The hotel is hip, clean, and well-maintained. Staff were very prompt and efficient with what they do too. I requested an extension of one day and it was done within minutes. During check-in, the staff attending to me asked whether I’d be alone, and once I replied in the affirmative, he immediately arranged for a Queen bed. What I really liked about my stay: • The entire hotel had a “chillax” ambience. The lobby décor is arty and with avant- garde vibes. Club music also plays at the lobby and the vehicle drop-off point. It’s cool to just chill in the lobby during the later part of the evening. • My alcove room was somewhat small as far as floor space is concerned. However, the super high

title: Business trip
desc: Went back on a business trip, staff were as usual friendly and kind to assist with anything. Rooms were clean and location was good. Definitely will return again on my next business trip to singapore

title: Enjoyable stay
desc: Very lovely stay, was given early check in by the friendly front desk manager Shaun after knowing that we are tired after a long flight. Staff were friendly and very willing to assist to our inquiry. Rooms were clean and nicely design. Breakfast was also good. The only downside is the room size which we can’t fault much as hotel room size in Singapore were usually small.

title: Short getaway
desc: Wonder experience from the service staff was especially friendly and helpful. Special shoutout to Hazirah for being so professional. Will be looking forward to my next visit to M social in the near future.

title: Hotel next to Riverside walking track with bars and restaurants. Comfortable place.
desc: The view from the room was perfect on the 10th floor for a clear view to the walking street and river. The room was always clean. The breakfast was fine and well enough. The Hotel is very well located right next to the walking track by the river with a lot of bars, restaurants nearby. I propose it for anyone.

title: Minimalist in every way
desc: This is a minimalist hotel - in every sense of the word. Minimalist in space, minimalist in extras, and minimalist in manpower. The rooms seem small (the alcove room definitely is), with barely any space to walk. The decor is pretty cool, though, with high ceilings that at least give you a sense of space when lying on the bed. There are some things you don't get unless you ask, like bath robes. There was also no shampoo in my room, but there were two tubes of body wash - maybe that was a mistake. And the booking system is upfront about extras that you have to pay for (e.g. birthday decor), giving you a budget airline feel. Check in and check out can be slow. Either there are too few front desk staff or they're not very well-trained. Don't be surprised to see a long queue in

title: Great location, great service & a stylish space
desc: The location is great. The rooms are quite small. I stayed in a loft room & despite being bigger than the regular rooms, I think it would be tight for more than one person for more than a weekend. I stayed for 8 days. However the rooms are stylish & very comfortable. The bed was wonderful with very comfortable. A special shout out to Vivian & Jessica who do the housekeeping. It was a pleasure coming back at the end of the day to a pristine, perfectly made up room. They were great 👌🏼

title: Really nice (but too short) stay at M Social
desc: Excellent stay in the middle of Robertson Quay, right at the riverside. Very friendly and attentive staff, clean and exciting loft type room with the bed on the loft floor. Bit minimalistic approach in the rooms and corridors, in a very nice way. Wish I could have stayed longer! Breakfast and meals recommended in Beast&Butterflies, also nice stop for a drink or two in the evening.

title: Nice location and a nice restaurant
desc: Nice location and restaurant! A staff at the restaurant named Linda is an excellent woman ! Very attentive , jovial and always energetic. The rooms are neat and nice too, a bit small in size though. The look of the hotel is very arty though

title: Not good....
desc: It was totally different from the photo that we saw from the website and booking.... Call to for the fornt desk to change the room but no room available for us... End up have to stay here unhappy for the entire stays...

title: Wonderful experience from staff
desc: Great location, spiffy design, clean facilities and wonderful service. Special mention goes to Zleena. I arrived early and was really tired out. I was going to wait until the checkin time at their bar, but she noticed it and made a special concession. You made my stay! Keep up the great service!

title: Great service and stay
desc: Very nice and friendly staff, San in particular was extremely helpful with the check in process. My last minute booking was processed without hassle as well. In terms of hardware, the decor is nice and modern and the ambiance is great too.

title: Pleasant stay in singapore p
desc: Reception staff friendly and helpful. Accommodations good value for money. Location is ideal for visitors who want to be that area, less practical for business people who need to more central towards of Orchard Road.

title: Had a great time
desc: The hotel has a nice chic vibe and great location. Had an amazing time when my friend and I decided to get some dessert and drinks at the restaurant, staff was friendly and very accommodating. Big shout out to Shiloh for an amazing service, will definitely come again 💯.

title: Poor service from the get-go
desc: The service from front office staff was horrible - they were unfriendly, unprofessional and downright rude. Just not a great experience from the moment we checked in. We will not encourage anyone to stay here despite the price.

title: Nice experience in hotel
desc: The environment of the hotel is very comfortable, the staff is also very polite and have a smile. The food in the restaurant is varied and delicious. Next time when I go to Singapore, I will choose yours again.

title: Affordable hotel in Singapore
desc: If you are looking for an affordable hotel in Singapore with a boutique feel M Social hotel in Singapore is the perfect choice. Granted, the rooms are small but that is to be expected in a city where space comes at a premium. The bed in M Social was one of the most comfortable I have ever had in a hotel. Although the room is tiny it proves a cozy feel due to architectural adaptation and smart layout. I really enjoyed the hotel pool where I was able to work using flawless hotel wifi. Last but not least I have to mention the hotel breakfast: M Social hotel offers a fabulous buffet style breakfast. A must try is a typical Singapore breakfast Koya Toast along with a great selection of meats, sweets, cheese and fruits.

title: Great service and stay
desc: Service by Front Office Manager Sean was courteous and helpful. I liked his service a lot . The room was small yet cozy. I was also impressed by the breakfast spread too, the dishes were great. Will definitely recommend to my friends and family to stay here.

title: Disappointing
desc: Had a booking using dayuse and was told that we can’t even be guaranteed a room if we want to wait for 2 hours. I do understand that they may give priority to those who booked directly and i have no issue with that. But to say “can’t even guarantee if there’s any room available after 11am” is just ridiculous. Seems that my last two visit over here wasn’t a pleasant one.

title: Unforgettable birthday celebration in a cozy hotel in Singapore
desc: I just spent my 31st birthday celebration at M Social Singapore and it definitely made my day a special one! I love how the room is uniquely designed with a mix of vintage and modern vibes. The fact that it’s a loft room allowed us to have more space at the living/study area and enjoy some peace at the bed. My fave features are: 1) The comfy bed and pillows! In our 3-day stay, we never had any issue sleeping; 2) Nespresso coffee: Unlike other hotels that provide 3-in-1 coffees, this hotel treats us with 4 Nespresso pods to enjoy every day; and 3) Amazing technology: A robot surprisingly visited us to bring us some stuff and their super fast wifi is simply amazing! Also, a huge shoutout to Leong San and Hazirah for being so accommodating with all our requests and inquiries!

title: Artistic Design
desc: Check-in was fantastic. Came at 6pm, there was no queue and i was attended to immediately by Mr Tinesh and Ms ShanRu. Mr Tinesh was friendly and welcoming. Check in took like 15mins and was smooth. Lobby area was clean, room was well kept. I simply love the design; small room with everything within reach, and the high ceiling! Will definitely be back, and this time with the kids for the pool. :)

title: Great stay
desc: Staying here was so great. Place is in a nice location, rooms are comfy, and beds are soft that it would sometimes be hard to get up in the morning! We had such a nice stay and Li was so nice and helpful with us.

title: Great staff + service
desc: Thoroughly enjoyed my stay at M Social, was greeted by friendly Front Office Manager Sean and check-in was prompt. Li Xing was also very smiley, assisted in getting my toiletries in an efficient manner. The breakfast spread was delicious and will want to come back again! Definitely recommended.

title: Selena front desk very Helpful.
desc: Room is very clean and neat.staff service is good.Breakfast is good.only thing is room is small.Front desk is very helpful…Got early check in.AC is good.Centrally located.Ambience is good.Omlette Robo is special

title: Great location
desc: Excellent location with a nice restaurant overlooking the River.The rooms are compact probably not unusual for Singapore.The corridors are a little bit dark & industrial. I would recommend a stay here as it is only a 30 minute walk along Robertson & Clark Quay both excellent venues for bars & restaurants to Marina Bay.

title: Very small rooms. Dimly Lit. Untrained staff
desc: They have extremely small rooms. Not at all suitable for couples. Quite overpriced for the room size. The rooms are very dimly lit with hardly any lighting. At the reception when I was checking out, they took ages. I had given my card for charges at checkin but they had no record of the same. The person at checkout was clueless about checkout process. Overall a very bad experience

title: Awesome stay in Singapore
desc: Had a really great time with my family here! Service was exceptional and would definitely recommend everyone to stay here if they are visiting Singapore! Thanks for the great experience M social, we will definitely be back!

title: We was disappointed
desc: We booked a loft. A room was clean and looks fresh, but very very small. I don't know why they made a 2nd storey. Nothing to do there. Bathroom very very small. I will recommend this hotel for this who travel alone.

title: Short getaway
desc: Was warmly welcomed by Hazirah. Check in was smooth, got in my room quite fast despite the queue, Hazirah was fast and efficient. Been wanting to try the Loft Room but did not get to book it prior but the Alcove room did not disappoint me! Although small but it’s cosy for myself. View was ok, tv can be used for netflix, a bonus point! Will definitely come here again :)

title: Amazing 3D2N EVER!!
desc: The hotel was amazing for one person, its soft snd cozy while comfortable and stylish in the same time. The bed and pillows are also soft and just perfect. The customer services are also great and it makes me happy that its not awkward for me to check in by myself. The breakfast selection was great and staffs are polite too !!

title: Will not go back
desc: Great location and that’s about it really. You can easily walk by the canal and end up in Clare Quay. The reception service was a little hot and cold. Some ladies were lovely and some others a little passive aggressive or maybe it’s the culture, I just didn’t understand it! Hotel room itself was ok, a little smaller than the pictures … Pool is lovely but the gym is tiny (literally not more than 4 people could work out at any one time) Did not actually eat the breakfast as I am vegetarian and there weren’t many options available.

title: Fantastic
desc: First time staying in this hotel, both Sean and Shanru were welcoming and helpful. We were having a staycation and had arrived early for check in, their Front office manager sean noticed we had an infant with us and offered to give us an early check in despite it being a public holiday and the hotel was busy. He even offered to help us with our bags to our room.

title: LOVE IT.
desc: Service was good and prompt. Very responsive front desk. The place is clean and comfortable. Will rec this place. Fuss free check in, very accessible location. Good for staycation. Facilities adequate.

title: Don't Stay Here!
desc: An unfortunately terrible experience that I did not have in mind. Rooms were small, some staff were not helpful or friendly and had poor attitude. Also, always check your bill at this place; triple check it to ensure accuracy of charges. Group needs a lesson in hospitality and proper communication with guests/former guests.

title: Great experience. Thanks Armando
desc: Great service from Armando and Anne from the guest relation staff. Check in was smooth we had a little talk they even offer water before registration. The loft room was nice and clean. We’re even surprised when we open our room small request such as birthday decor was really appreciated. Thanks for the warm and great experience Armando and Anne . We’ll be back for sure

title: Good location with many area to improve
desc: Poor check in process Ignorant staffs including unprofessional staffs / no experience staffs (the security who helped us on luggages deposit was nice though) Dusty especially on the vanity area Can be improved in many ways to be as good as your hotel location.

title: A very remarkable loft style hotel in singapore
desc: A highly recommended hotel accommodation in Singapore, a loft style hotel that surpass our expectations. We stayed here for 2 nights and 3 days and we definitely had a pleasant stay here. Staffs are very friendly and approachable and not to mention the atmosphere of the place is very relaxing and the food at their restaurant are all delicious. I would like to make a shoutout to Anne for taking care of us during our stay at M social hotel and made us feel comfortable, Thank you so much for your attending to our concerns.

title: Above and Beyond Expections!
desc: Fantastic! The location is great! I emailed beforehand as it was for a special event for myself and my other half. They went above and beyond! and we had a heartfelt note and a bottle of wine waiting for us in our room! It was great! I loved having the extra room with the bed being on the second floor.

title: Amazing experience, Outstanding Staff ✨ and the food was superb 👌🏻
desc: We've had a great staycation experience in M Social ❤️ Stayed in their Loft Premier room. The room is a little small but it was chic and very elegant ✨ We had a chance to experience their Bearbrick workshop. It was really fun and an enjoyable experience. Thanks to Ms May Xian Ong and Ms Anne Leyran 💖 They made sure that we are satisfied with our stay. You should not miss the foods and cocktails in Beast and Butterflies 🍴 . It was really good! Will always put M Social 🫶🏻our option when coming back to Singapore. 🇸🇬

title: M Social Hotel with Masion 21G
desc: As a frequent visitor to Singapore, I have had the opportunity to stay in various hotels depending on my budget and availability. Among them, I must say that M Social Hotel stands out as one of the best in terms of customer experience. During one of my recent stays, I had an exceptional experience in M Social Hotel with the Mason 21G perfume. What impressed me was that the hotel provided Mason 21G testers in the lobby, allowing me to try out various perfumes during my stay last month. Among them, 'Tea Time' captured my senses, and it became my favorite. Although I couldn't stay at M Social Hotel this month, I made a stop to purchase the 'Tea Time' perfume before returning to Korea. The guest experience manager, Anne Leyran, provided me with exceptional and kind support during

title: Beautiful hotel with great staff
desc: Second time staying at this hotel and it’s still beautiful and comfortable at a reasonable rate. Located near to a lot of good food and drinks. Restaurant downstairs, Beast and Butterfly is a pretty place with good food. The receptionist, Gaya noticed it was my birthday one of the nights we were staying so gave my friends and I complimentary breakfast and early check-in which I thought was a sweet gesture which made it so convenient for us. House keeping was also polite. There’s parking lots for cars. The only downside is there’s no mrt nearby but you can get a Grab easily and quickly. Oh, the lighting in the room is not so bright for makeup so gotta glam up when the sun is still out. Overall very cosy and was a great experience. Will definitely come back again!

title: Central, Comfy, and really welcoming staff.
desc: First time visitors to Singapore. Very comfy room on 2nd level with a small courtyard. Great breakfasts available at Beast & Butterflies! Located along the Singapore river bank, it’s in walking distance to all modes of transport. The Metro service is great for getting around Singapore’s main attractions.

title: First time at Beasts and Butterflies 🦋
desc: it was my first time at Beasts and Butterflies and I must say that the food was amazing and staff are very helpful, thoughtful and engaging especially Armando. He really knows how to treat his customer professionally and knows how to entertain them. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Stay at M Social
desc: From start to the end a lovely stay at the M social, convenient location, friendly staff, rooms are small but the high ceilings made a difference, chilled out atmosphere, good breakfast and Lei ever so polite, friendly and helpful young lady who serviced our room.

title: 10 days in Singapore.
desc: Went on business and had a great stay. Rooms were small but on the plus side the staff were great. We had issues with cancelling and rebooking out reservation and the front desk staff were excellent, Kalish and Anne the guest experience manager were so helpful and patient. Housekeepers Li and Ain were fantastic also, and went above and beyond to make us happy. Thanks to these people, i will be back and recommending the hotel to my business colleagues.

title: Top Notch
desc: An excellent hotel that is perfectly positioned in a mix of great bars and restaurants. The rooms and facilities are of top standard and the staff are helpful and friendly. Also a special mention to the manager Anne for her warm and exceptional service which made our stay at the M Social a 5 star experience. Highly recommend staying here to all!

title: Great experience! Worthy booking.
desc: Great hotel, friendly personel and convenient location. There is a bus station very close to the hotel. Breakfast is really nice, my room was clean and there was a mini bar. They cleaned everyday and put water to drink.

title: One of our favorite hotel in Singapore
desc: 2nd time to stay in M Social and it's even more amazing. This time we stayed in the Loft Premier room. Loved the buffet breakfast especially the robot that cooks the omellete. I can say that their rooms are perfect for couple travellers. A bit small but the ceiling is high which makes it more elegant. Big thanks to Ms May Xian and Ms Anne, they are very friendly and made sure that we are having a pleasant stay. M Social will always be our option when visiting Singapore.

title: Forget the Rest, M Social is Best!
desc: My second stay at these Singapore properties. I like the service and attention provided from the room staff to the front desk and management. Sean, at the front desk, secured my room ASAP as I had just arrived from the USA and a bit too early for check-in time. Kudos to Anne Leyran for her conversation to ensure my stay was enjoyable. I have two suggestions: 1. Brighter lighting so one can see to shave and for ladies to apply make-up 2. Why must the bathroom door weigh 500 pounds? So hard to open. I will stay AT M Social on my next visit.

title: Friendliest staff + Great hotel
desc: friendliest staff and great hotel!! Room was spacious and clean. A lot of amenities and restaurants nearby the hotel. It was my husband's birthday last August and their staff, Anne and Arman, made our stay memorable. Their professionalism and friendliness were truly exceptional. Again, thank you so much for assisting us! Highly recommend this hotel if you're looking for a short staycation <3 Will definitely come back

title: Really nice staff
desc: Waiter on 5th floor was a really nice guy (room 570). I did encounter some issues while trying to extend my reservation because you can only make reservation online even though I was at the hotel place… that’s to be improved. I would also love to have some snack food in the room. Breakfast was delicious (just add chocolate and Nutella please)

title: Great experience! Warm staff
desc: My experience at M Social was great! Sean and Armando were very welcoming and ensured everything went smoothly for me and boyfriend. Very warm and good vibes~ The swimming pool and gym, though small, were pretty good for a good getaway. Room was nice!

title: Excellent service and facilities
desc: Awesome service and facilities! Staff name Armando is awesome and friendly! We came here as a couple trip and had a great time! Will recommend couples to come here for staycation as you surely won’t regret it!

title: Business Trip Made Good !
desc: Great location, great staff, great pillows indeed ! The restaurant in the hotel is lovely also and with Clarke Quay just a 20 minute walk each way, that is a nice if warm stroll following a long day. Thank you to my friend who lives nearby for the recommendation!

title: Highly recommend the loft space for your next stay in Singapore!
desc: The premium loft room is excellent - both in being stylish and comfortable, and the staff ate very helpful and pleasantly professional. The location is next to all great restaurants, entertainment, and walking distance to public transportation.

title: Nice experience for M social hotel
desc: The chic loft and alcove features full height bay windows with a relaxation area! Especially their service is so good ! Thanks Anne! I also joined the workshop of customising MAISON21G perfume and diy fluid bearbrick ! It’s so interesting!

title: Service above and beyond
desc: M Social met all my expectations and then some. From the minute I made my booking and had a few special requests, as I was surprising family for a significant birthday, Anne were fantastic. I was always greeted with a smile, nothing I asked for was too much trouble and I was spoilt with little extra touches of local fruit and pillow spray to make me feel special and well(c)home….the sign that greets you at check in. My cosy alcove room was indeed cosy but a perfect size for my 4 night stay and has all the amenities needed. The laksa at the hotel restaurant was one of the best I have ever had and breakfast each morning was plentiful and varied. A great location for easy access to the MRT, big shopping malls and walks along the river to many other places to eat and drink. Will

title: Excellent location and restaurants
desc: This hotel is located near a large option of restaurants, market, gym and the breakfast is excellent! The accomodations are comfortable. Highlight for Mr. Abinesh, that was very careful during my stay there.

title: Great Stay
desc: The room was excellent value for money. Very modern, all the necessary amenities - slightly on the small side but no different anything else available in singapore. The hotel staff are great, Sean (front of house manager) was great is assistant us with what to do, providing travel cards and maps aswell as giving us a later check out time. Our room was clean and tidy after housekeeping had done their part - thank you abishek :).

title: Great stay at M social
desc: I enjoyed my stay at M social! Abinesh was very welcoming and did a wonderful job of keeping the room clean. The room design is very chic, with a solid concrete wall to keep noise down. The mezzanine bed is a ln interesting feature that gives the room a lot of space. Cheers from room #561.

title: Excellent room service
desc: Excellent room service and good hospitality. Had all the amenities and toiletries refilled everyday. Thanks to the M Befriender Mr.Abinesh for all the help during my 2 weeks stay at M Social Singapore.

title: Affordable price and good room
desc: Really enjoyed my short staycation at this place. Their pool is small though, I also didn't have time to visit the gym. Check-out time was also reasonable at 11 a.m. Huge shoutout to Anne and Aly for being so great and providing the best customer experience. I will definitely visit here again.

title: Excellent Service!
desc: Service from the start was top notch by reception staff Hazirah. She noticed it was my partner’s birthday and gave us a complimentary room upgrade which definitely made our stay better. The hotel pool is nice too, located at level 5. Downside is that it closes at 8pm. The hotel is located along robertson quay, nearby the cafes and restaurants. You guys should give the hotel’s restaurant, Beast & Butterflies a try as their food is delicious too! This hotel is a nice place for us to get away from home once in a while. Considering the price paid for the room, the services given to us made up for it. Thank you M Social 🤩

title: Good value hotel with excellent staff
desc: Good value hotel in a relaxed part of Singapore. Our room was small (studio) but we knew that before hand and it is well appointed. The pool is great after a hot day in Singapore and the staff are excellent. They are Very helpful and gave us a 3pm checkout and then let us lie by the pool and use the shower facilities before our late flight out of Changi.

title: Our home away from home
desc: This trendy affordable hotel became our second home during our week stay in Singapore. Anne and her team were amazing at making our stay trouble free and easy. The location of the hotel also made it easy to get around since it was central to everywhere we wanted to visit. It is also a stones throw away from the Singapore River, lined with bustling cafes and restaurants to dine in or takeaway from. Also do yourself a favour and dine at the hotel’s restaurant, Beast and Butterflies. The food there is delicious and the staff are so accommodating and down to earth. We dealt with Armando and he was such a delight and comedian! All in all, we will definitely be staying here again and again next time we’re in Singapore. We couldn’t recommend them more!

title: Love this M Social!
desc: Great experienced, good location, and such a wonderful greeting from Armando and Anne. We stayed here for 3 days and 2 nights, which was the happiness begins. Hope to see you guys next time, thank you

title: M Social Front Desk Staffs are Rude and Arrogant!
desc: Front desk staffs are rude and arrogant. They seem to be very entitled. They lack courtesy and professionalism. We checked in last July 30, at 1PM. On the other hand, housekeeping staffs are polite and approachable.

title: Friendly Staff and Cozy Room
desc: Was greeted by friendly and energetic staffs, Armando and Anne! They made the registration and check in process smooth and efficient. Really compliment their professional services and love the way they present themselves to their guests. The room that we were staying in was cozy and chic. The bed was very comfortable and the room had all the basic items that we needed. Overall, a very good experience. Would be coming back here again!

title: Loving the Loft Premier Room
desc: I enjoyed the Loft Premier Room I stayed in. The room's design is really nice and to my liking. I had such a good sleep on the cozy loft's super comfy bed. If you are quite sick of the one-level kind of hotel rooms, I think you would really like this loft because it feels more like a home than a hotel room. The bed being on the 2nd level is the win to me.

title: Dining at Beast and butterflies
desc: I can’t stop myself right now to give a review right away with this restaurant, the food is so lavishing and salivating! Everything was so awesome! Even the people there especially Armando served us exquisitely nice! I’ll definitely come back again here soon!

title: M Socila was great!
desc: M Social Hotel exceeded my expectations in every aspect, and I can't speak highly enough about the manager's exceptional service. The hotel's modern and chic ambiance made for a memorable stay, and the staff's friendliness was evident from the moment I walked in. The manager's dedication to ensuring a seamless experience for guests was commendable; they went above and beyond to address any inquiries and accommodate special requests promptly. Their attention to detail and personalized touch truly made me feel valued as a guest. I highly recommend M Social Hotel, and the manager's exceptional leadership undoubtedly played a significant role in making my stay truly unforgettable. Well done!

title: Good and clean hotel.
desc: Nice and speedy check in by Ms Pettrina. Will come again! Hotel had swimming pool and gym which runs 8am - 8pm. Breakfast 630am - 10am. They have a robot cooking omelette! How cool is that? One weird thing is the hand washing basin is located beside the television 🤣

title: Good staff
desc: Met a staff named Shan Ru who was very kind and greeted me on my way to the room. She also kindly provided additional coffee packets to me when I requested. Very good and friendly service all around the hotel.

title: Barbie and Ken
desc: The pillow are the fluffiest I felt… Check in was only slightly delayed but we got compensated with more than adequate late check out and complimentary drinks! Kudos to Armando! Great service. Everything went well! Hotel is clean too :)

title: Impressive!
desc: Armando & Anne are excellent!! Nice hospitality and sweet🥰 we got Singapore flag 🇸🇬 and tattoo sticker to celebrate Singapore national day!!! Hotel has nice swimming pool and delicate gym. Really nice to stay

title: BAD! AVOID AT ALL COST
desc: Ridiculous booked twin beds on their official website was told on arrival at 11pm that they were full thus could not accommodate. Forcing me and my colleague to share a QUEEN bed, not even a king, and asked us to switch rooms tomorrow. We are here on business meetings asking us to pack and unpack is 100% not acceptable and it’s utterly ridiculous to sell our room to someone else. The hotel had our contact number and email but never bothered telling us in advance. Supervisor on duty was finding ways to dodge and force us to taking the queen room with 0 compensation as if the hotel has 0 fault in this whole mess and basically just trying to shove us at what she thinks was the best. 0 star The room was small cleanliness was poor you see hair in the sink, wall needs painting jobs

title: Good food with amazing service from Armando.
desc: Good food with amazing service from Armando. He recommended us some food and drinks and it was perfect for the night. Super friendly and we were shown such good hospitality.The ambiance of the place is also super nice. Definitely would come again!

title: Great location, cheap! You get what you pay for!
desc: Check in was easy, room was clean. Hotel is in a great location, walking distance to nightlife, restaurants and MRT. If you're above 6 ft, you will not be able to stand in the lofted "study". Room 412 had a horrible whistling sound eminating from the pipes from other rooms using their bathrooms. I didn't plan on leaving a bad review however the nail in the coffin was the fact that my sheets were not changed during my entire 5 nights stay. Rest of the room appeared clean, but no clean sheets? That's basic service. The management were kind enough to offer a free breakfast or lunch or car ride for my troubles.

title: Third time is a charm at M Social Hotel
desc: Stayed here for the third time and this is the best stay so far. We love the service from the moment we checked in to the nice swimming pool and our clean room. I would like to thank Anne the manager for her excellent service, she was very friendly and even gave us National Day goodies during our stay. We love how this hotel celebrates event and make their customers happy. We also stayed same time as last year. Our room cleaner was great too ( 8th floor). Thank you M social and we will surely come back again hopefully before this year ends.

title: Satisfied Guests!
desc: My friends and I have enjoyed our stay at M-Social Hotel. The room was clean, cozy and stylish and they have a stable wifi connection that’s perfect for those digital nomads who plan to visit Singapore soon. The location is near to MRT station, making it easier for us to travel to our destinations. We also had fun swimming in their pool while enjoying a dreamy view of the river and the food was so good at Beast and Butterflies Restaurant and I was amazed by their Ausca Egg Machine. Everything was instagram-worthy! We also experienced their Build Bearskin workshop and was able to paint my own bear and brought it home as my souvenir from SG. We also had a chance to make our own perfume and learned how to create our own scent based on our personality. Sounds cool, right? These

title: Disappointed
desc: When we arrived they didn’t have our booking and had no rooms available in the room type we had selected/ paid for. We got put in a downgraded room the first night and then “upgraded” for the final 3 nights. Once in the upgraded room, there was an extremely loud noise coming through the walls night and day (to the point it was waking us up), we spoke to reception about it and they just smiled, looked at each other and ignored us- not helpful at all

title: Awesome Stay at Singapore
desc: Our stay in M Social Singapore was the best, will definitely return to this hotel. Staff was very accommodating and friendly, especially Armando and Anne of guest relations, they made sure that we our well taken care off. From checking in, and helping and assisting us out with our other concerns. They even went the extra mile for my birthday. The Room was clean and all the necessary stuff is complete. Bed and pillows are comfortable to sleep on. The hotel is well maintained and the design is very clean and modern. Highly recommend! If you’re staying at this hotel look for Arman and Anne!

title: Bear Brick Workshop
desc: Anne is very knowledgeable and helpful . It makes the activity more enjoyable. I will definitely try the perfume activity next time with my family and friends. This is a must try activity when you visit Singapore and M Social ❤️❤️

title: Loft Suite - Excellent Stay
desc: M Social (Robertson Quay, SG) was an incredible stay. The loft suite was perfect for remote work and a very comfortable room. The stay was made better by Anne my super supportive and helpful customer exp manager who ensured I was warmly greeted and well advised. 100% will stay again and hope to experience all the facilities I missed.

title: The best stay experience in Singapore
desc: We spend two wonderful nights at M Social Singapore. The room is comfy and clean, ideal to rest. We also enjoy the pool after a full day of exploring the hot Singapore. The breakfast is really diverse with the detail of a robot cooker. The breakfast is at the Beast and Butterflies where we also had a delicious dinner! The best of the stay was the two amazing workshops that M Social Singapore offers: Maison21 perfume and bearbrick! With the help of Anne, we create our unique perfurm fragrance and colourful bears to take with us. Was an amazing stay! We highly recommend it!

title: A much needed STAYCATION
desc: I have been frequenting M Social every time I get to visit Singapore, I guess it's because it gives me a very luxurious and homey vibe, I particularly love the fact that its pretty much aesthetic, and they really have rooms that are very much cozy and comfy. The hotel doesn't disappoint me, Very clean rooms, complete amenities and their breakfast is a mix of a lot of your breakfast faves mixed with local flavors you would appreciate. It definitely caters to all taste buds, including the little ones and the young at heart. Apart from that the hotel is situated in a very quiet side of the city thus giving you a very private feels to your trip. Amenities they have most of the things you need, from enjoying a quick dip in the pool, to having a run at the gym or even activities such

title: Super location super staff .
desc: Excellent location great hotel... especially Abhinesh deserves a mention for his ever smilling face and helpful nature.. he is prompt and courteous... Also the pool is amazing... the rooms are a bit small but thats singapore...

title: Alcove cosy queen
desc: The stay was very pleasant and nice, the hotel I book was the alcove cosy queen and when I first walk into the hotel it felt very atas and nice. And the room really surprise me the interior though might be abit small but the looks of it is very nice. Location of the hotel is very near a lot of nice places. To improve on, the call service of the hotel. Through what I experience I have called the hotel through their hotline to ask for some questions but nobody answered. And during the hotel stay when I used their device to call for service nobody answered as well, maybe they should improve on their answering of people service through the phone calls faster. But overall the stay was very pleasant and nice good stay and would recommend to others, will definitely come back again

title: Solo staycay
desc: Really cozy and clean room. Perfect for a solo staycaytion. Walking distance from havelock MRT. Would definitely come back here again. Special mention to Staff Aly for being helpful and accommodating. Housekeepers were also really helpful. 5 stars for service.

title: Kudos to the Team!
desc: The room is very clean and organized. The hotel staff are very friendly. Special mention to Anne who is very accommodating and eager to assist to all our queries. She never hesitated to extend a hand despite the busy hour; remained patient with all smiles. kudos!

title: Third time here
desc: It is my third time here. I like the atmosphere and the ease of everything. The only thing I wonder is why I need to do the full check in process even though I have stayed three times in three months. Great location, clean compact rooms. Will stay again.

title: Great stay at MSocial
desc: Great location and staff especially Abinesh who was taking care of my room. Pool is nice also and convenient for a refreshing moment. Very good and central location. Enjoyed my stay at MSocial and recommend it for short stay in Singapore. A lot of restaurants in the area too

title: Perfect for staycation.
desc: Cozy and aesthetic room! Love that there are good restos and bars nearby. Im house breakfast buffet is okay. Only downside is MRT being a bit far. Need to walk 10minutes. But overall, I loved staying here. Will definitely go back.

title: Awesome
desc: Friendly and Excellent customer service by Aly and Aashiqah. No awkwardness , and Would love to visit the hotel again. Enjoying the stay and can't wait to book here again. Love this cozy and spacious hotel

title: Review on Room services, Abinesh
desc: The perfect room services. The beds were always well laid and tidy. He is friendly and approachable. Always does what we need and never late. He is also helpful in times of need and understanding. Thank you.

title: Best customer service
desc: Best customer service from the receptionist counter by Aly and Aashiqah. Both of them have welcome me with a warm smile and let us feel that we are at hm. Will definitely recommend to stay at M social.

title: All services is good
desc: Hi m social have a great time to have a beautiful time and days in m social and Abinesh is fantastic boy to help me clean my room nicely good boy room good .food was nice in hotel thank u so much my house keeping Abinesh

title: Happy
desc: Thankyou for our stay, was such a convenient place to stay as it was so close to many restaurants, shops and the mrt. Was such a delight to come back to a very clean room every night after Abinesh had done his job beautifully, also with a warming friendly attitude, Thankyou Abinesh and Thankyou to all the friendly staff at the reception for helping guide us around Singapore. See you next time! :)

title: The best hotel experience!!!
desc: Shout out to Anne Leyran who made my wife birthday the most memorable. We really enjoy, especially our 17mths old daughter. I'm so touched and speechless of her customer service and humanity. Since check-in till we check-out, from the front-office, housekeeping, pool attendant have given a good service. Anne Leyran and her team have need a recognition for this. I'm speechless and no other words to describe. Will definitely come back for our next vacation.

title: We´ll come back!
desc: a perfect place to stay! location, friendlyness of staff, food, possibilities close to the hotel, good atmosphere. I definitely will come back! Visitors should also try Martini Espresso :-) and visit the small kiosk close to the hotel.

title: Great Stay in Singapore
desc: Stayed here for a short trip and we love the location instantly. The hotel is modern. We met Anne who was fast and efficient upon check in. She made sure we are comfortable and she was very friendly to us. We stayed in the loft premier room, the view was blocked by nearby residence but its okay when your room is clean and cozy. We did tried the breakfast for only 1 day and it was awesome. Nearby train is Havelock and many eateries around the area. Thank you for the wonderful experience and thank you Anne and team for the warm and good service. We will stay here again in our next trip to Singapore.

title: I want to compliment Aashiqah for the extremely friendly guest service, she was really helpful with my request and gave
desc: I want to compliment Aashiqah for the extremely friendly guest service, she was really helpful with my request and gave us high floor. Please go to her if anything, she is really helpful😀 thankyou for the pleasant stay

title: Great location, great service!
desc: Had an amazing stay at M Social this trip! Location is great, love the design of the entire hotel, room was always exceptionally clean! Thanks to Fepi and the rest of M Social team. Will come back again!

title: Thoughtful service staff
desc: Even before the stay, the manager, Anne Leyran, has been liasing with me to ensure a smooth check-in as I planned to propose during the stay. On top of it, she has gifted me a bottle of wine on the house. Throughout the stay, thoughtful planning and consideration have been given to us and we are touched by the service.

title: 5 Star Staff 👏👏👏
desc: Hazirah assisted us with the booking for 2 taxi to the airport early morning. She went over the mile and offered us water and charging of our phones while waiting. We love the hotel concept. Will come back 👍

title: F1 in Singapore’s M Social
desc: The housekeeper Jessica at M Social in Singapore was wonderful. It was almost as if I was at home with family. She made my hectic schedule easier and helped me with the room and my crazy hours. Well done Jessica and M Social Singapore!

title: My choice of hotel
desc: My stay over the busy F1 period was perfect. Didn’t expect much at first but i was blown away by the service. Thanks to Anne in particular. Her professionalism and smile made it extra special. When i returned to my room i received special F1 theme gift and a bottle of wine. WOW! Thanks M Social. Staff here are so thoughtful that i never felt in other hotel i stayed before. Location is near to Marina Bay circuit and getting our way around the area was no hassle at all. Glad to stay here and will stay here again.

title: Hotel stay during covid period
desc: The stay in M social is great. The entry procedure is strict but will make you feel at ease staying in here safely. I would like to commend this staff from the hotel restaurant. His name is Aramando. The service provided is professional and very hospitable and attentive to guest' needs quickly. The room ambience is great too and clean.

title: Review of M social hotel
desc: Great service and attention to detail. They even knew my birthday was coming up and offered a free birthday treat at the restaurant Beast and Butterflies. Room was nice, big and not particularly expensive compared to other hotels of the same size room. Perhaps the only down side is the small size of the pool but overall this is a very cozy environment. Food at the restaurant was also great with the breakfast serving food quality food even though it may not be a lot of variety.

title: Tiny but Interesting
desc: This is a tiny room. Would I want to share this with someone else...Not sure. The sink is in the main room. Yet after two nights, really started to enjoy my stay at M Social. The swimming pool, was very convenient, food not bad. I had to work from the Restaurant for most of the day, waiting for a flight after check out and found if really comfortable. For a business trip even a stop-over wouldn't mind staying here again

title: It's a Keeper!
desc: Fabulous place to stay, esoteric yet charming, with the most wonderful staff and, yes, probably the most comfortable bed I've slept in other than my own! The front office were superb in their prompt service and excellent advice and I would say they are, as yet, unrivalled in their friendly efficiency. It is conveniently situated along the river bank and there are many excellent restaurants within walking distance (Toby's Estate is the best for coffee). The art is fantastic!

title: Two visits: for my bday party and for a couple staycation
desc: I believe that was one of the best beds I have ever laid on- very comparable with the beds in high end hotels I’ve stayed in. Loft room can hold around 10 people for intimate gatherings. And the smallest room perfect for couples. Absolutely COZY, spotless, aesthetically pleasing. Excellent service. WOULD RECOMMEND 10/10

title: Great location, awesome place
desc: Stayed in M Social for a week and loved its location, hospitality, food. Best part is, it is so close to Clarke Quay and other awesome food joints. I particularly loved the small cupcake shop near the Hotel. Proximity to CBD, little India, China town is a big plus along with superb Wifi speed and an additional handset they give in case you need to navigate around the town. There are few downsides as well, it isn't close to any hawker center (in case you want to walk down and enjoy fresh satay's, in morning rush hours it takes 10+ minutes to reach CBD, room felt a tad too small although they showed me loft as well but that too wasn't too spacious for the price (I assume I am spoiled by swanky and spacious rooms we have in India).

title: great hotel and services
desc: Home away from home even just for a short stay. A mix of function and design, M Social Singapore will spoil you with its amenities and cozy rooms that will make you wish you're staying longer. Staff are always happy and ready to help. Hassle-free check in/out.

title: M Social Hotel
desc: I stayed in the hotel over a 12 week period from July to October for a business trip. I found everything to be clean and functional, but what really made my stay amazing was the wonderful staff. Everyone from Tomoyo with my bookings, Desmond on the front desk,(sorting out all of my requests), Armando, Carissa and Adam looking after me in the restaurant and Darshan checking in regularly that I had no issues, all combined to make my stay in the M Social such a fantastic experience

title: Mixed thoughts.
desc: I would rate this highly on the hotels style and aim to look, feel and operate differently. Overall the staff we professional, friendly and helpful during our week long stay. Check in was a horrible, sous, destroying inefficient and lengthy process that really needs to improve. It took about 45mins to finally get to our room, it was late and we wanted dinner before the restaurant closed. Check out not quite as but but would still benefit from improvement. Restaurant service overall was good, but at times in the morning for breakfast, the team seemed to struggle. Clean tables were often hard to find on arrival and breakfast items had frequently run out with coffee machines not working. As fun as a robot making eggs is for a laugh and endless social media videos it doesn’t

title: Fantastic hotel, just a wee bit far from an MRT station for Singapore standards...
desc: Great hotel in a great part of Singapore. Room itself was small, but well equipped and all you need when the purpose of staying is to explore the city. The only issue is that it's a fair distance to both Chinatown and Clarke Quay MRT stations, so make sure you align with their free shuttle (which was great!) or use Grab (UBER equivalent).

title: So disappointing
desc: I booked M Social for the location and based on good reviews . Location was perfect, the rest a huge disappointment . I was in a double terrace room which was the smallest room I have ever stayed in throughout Asia. There was no room for my suitcase unless I moved it each time I wanted to leave the room. The bathroom is so small the sink is in the bedroom . The bedside tables just fit a glass of water. The bed is comfortable . The terrace is fine but other people hang their washing on the trees on theirs... unattractive and it overlooks a driveway . The other thing to note is that I thought having a terrace would allow smoking but the whole hotel is smoke free and you have to leave the premises if you want to smoke . This was not mentioned anywhere on the website when I booked

title: Pretty cool place to be
desc: In a nice quite location by the riverfront, however it's approximately 10 min walk to the nearest MRT - Fort Canning. Taxis will be needed generally. We booked a room with a terrace, whilst it was nice all the terrace rooms are next to each other so you can see right across the next 10 or so rooms, not very private. Next time i'd go for a different room. Cool quirks like a robot servant and a great breakfast each morning. We got a pretty good price. The staff are nice and helpful.

title: M Social accommodation Singapore
desc: Just loved this hotel, very funky. When I arrived it was late at night and very loud as it is located close to the social scene of that area. But once in the room it was very quiet. The room whilst it is small is very functional. Probably too small for a couple but great for single traveller. Staff were great.

title: Amazing and impeccable services
desc: We booked the aclove room for a night stay at M social, and the front desk staff Ms Gretchen kindly upgraded us to premier room. It was a lovely gesture, and they even included free breakfast for us. The premier room is lovely, all basic amenities are included and the tap dispenses drinking water so that guests don't have to go out and buy mineral water. Gretchen is a gem and one of the loveliest service oriented person I have met. M social should give Gretchen recognition for her excellent services. Alyssa

title: Comfortable
desc: The room has a high celling which is pretty much comfortable. The breakfast was awesome. Automated egg frying machine and pancake machine. The my had a wide variety of food. A good get away staycation.

title: Excellent environment
desc: Even though the photos of the loft gallery looks much more spacious than it is, the room is aesthetically pleasing and cozy which makes the money worth. a great place to unwind over the weekends. Do try it out!!

title: M social Singapore
desc: I had a lovely stay at M social. I stayed one night before my exchange year started, and helped me out with everything I needed to be ready for an orientation day at campus. Will recommend this hotel for everyone. Btw, they have a robot-omelett-machine! Br, Birgitte

title: Design hotel
desc: Loved all the different design elements of the M Social hotel. There is always something new to look at. Room on the small side but with very high ceiling. Our room had a bit of funny smell to it that I didn’t care for at all. Lights in bathroom is connected to a motion sensor which made the lights stay on for a long time and the blinds between bathroom and actual room didn’t block out the light good enough so the lights ended up being an issue for sleep quality. Nice breakfast and the egg robot is a bit of fun. Loved the area which is a bit outside the more tourist areas and there are tons of nice restaurants around the river.

title: On higher price end in term of room size and location
desc: I must say they are pros and cons about this boutique hotel. I booked this place because of their almost perfect positive reviews (misleading), and paid S$420+/night. Pros : 1) Modern and Edgy interior design, for those who love to try 'loft' style room. 2) Friendly staffs, cute robots who deliver water bottles and a robot operated egg station. 3) Quiet place (located at the end of the road), surrounded by residential areas nearby (i like the feeling like being one the locals when you see them jog, walking the dog and kids cycling), by the river, many restaurants and bars nearby (behind the hotel). Now the Cons: 1) Small bed (queen size), 2) Small room (I have to find a solution to store my luggage during my stay (we only have two luggage), 3) Tiny bathroom (you can't even get

title: Trendy Hotel with innovative features
desc: I had heard a lot of good things about M Social from my friends and was excited to check it out. When I finally did, I was not disappointed. The room was cosy and very thoughtfully designed. It also came with all the amenities that I needed for a good stay. I was particularly impressed with the robotic assistant, which was a nice touch. I would also to commend the front desk staff William for his exemplary service and wonderful attitude. It was because of him that my stay was that much better. Furthermore, their sustainability efforts really impressed me and I hope that other hotels follow suit. I look forward to my next stay!

title: Perfect in every way!
desc: Effortless checkin - wonderful breakfast buffet daily with an Egg-Robot, Pancake machine and lots of traditional local and North American foods. Worthwhile to be room and breakfast together. Robertson Quay is in a high end neighbourhood but removed from the crowds of Orchard Road. Rooms are lovely with a nice view, the infinity pool is perfect for kids! The area has tons of great restaurants in walking distance, you can walk along the Singapore River and reach many key tourist spots! The front desk is extremely helpful and there is a currency exchange machine in the lobby, as well as Mac computers and an iPad to order taxis.

title: Superb experience
desc: Although the rooms are quite small the experience at the M Social hotel was superb. The reception was so totally accommodating, nothing was a problem for the entire team. The staff that managed the rooms, cleaning and stocking were truly amazing. Always willing to accommodate guests. Taxis are about a two minute wait and the staff are able to quote the approximate amount a taxis will cost to your destination. The hotel has a baggage holding facility and this is very secure. The entire 6 day stay was great

title: Excellent
desc: Service and location is very good. Got chance to travel here and stay 3D2N for business. Hotel is clean and cozy, Housekeeping provide really good service and Front Desk attendances are really friendly. great value and will stay here again when i come back with my family.

title: Nice Design but Standard Rooms to Small
desc: M Social Singapore got an amazing location on the river in Robertson Walk, but the standard rooms are to small for a couple with 2 luggage and better rooms becoming to expensive comparing to other hotels. Breakfast is quite poor as well! Swimming pool ok and Gym to small.

title: Better than expectations.
desc: My partner and I just finished up a last minute 1 night stay with this hotel and it really went beyond our expectations. It is a great location so close to main attractions and heaps of restaurants. The reception went out of their way to help us with any request or question we had; especially the two male staff members that we encountered (sadly we didn’t catch their names). We arrived at 6am and they were more than happy to hold our bags and let us use the hotel facilities, as well as letting us into our room early. The breakfast had a good range. The room was small, but we managed perfectly fine and when everything is to such a high standard it’s not much of a problem at all. We both had big suitcases after 6 weeks of travel but with some manouvering it was fine. The

title: Cool hotel, great team here, good food and service
desc: Very cool hotel, great location, food and service. Pool and gym are fine...not big but perfectly unsuitable for holiday use. The only drawback are the tiny rooms!! Can't fault the hotel except the room size to me is the only negative.

title: Cosy. Hipster. Comfy
desc: It’s a really hipster hotel as it was co-designed by Philip Stark. Many Instagram moments here. I had a loft in my room but didn’t use it much. Room can be a lil tight, unpacking may be better than living in your suitcase. Yummy breakfast spread. Excellent front desk and sales team. Very spot on room service assistance, provided help with disposable cutlery, ice and other amenities.

title: Grand prix
desc: We found hotel really good and very good location. Very clean very friendly staff. Loved the robots although the one cooking eggs needs a little more training. The room was very nice and we'll equipped if a bit on the small size. Loved the swimming pool. Not many sunbeds but we never struggled for one

title: Great stop over
desc: We stayed here for 3 nights on our way to Bali. Staff were lovely and welcoming and the pool was very welcomed after a hot day touring the city. Yes the rooms are small but you are only there to have a shower and sleep.

title: Nice enough place to stay
desc: Modern decor. Clean rooms. Located on the river with cafes alongside. Nice enough pool with comfy loungers. Refreshing water cooler in lobby and poolside. · The staff were very indifferent. No effort to welcome us at the desk or acknowledge us unless we asked a question. Seriously annoyed me. On check-in, they did not explain any of the hotel facilities. The phone would not be answered the few times we called from the room. Apart from cold water, there was no food or drinks service by the pool. We had to go back to our room to order the food and then they told me that I had to go down to collect. I said that was ridiculous and they eventually did deliver to pool. They seriously need to review this.

title: Quiet and comfortable
desc: Had a chance to stay 2D1N for some “me” time. Checked in on Saturday 1pm and got a room at the 9th floor. The staff at reception were friendly. On-job training was going on for my check-in but overall not too much delay. Still good. Since I brought only a little stuff for the staycation, the room size seems ok for me. But for 2 travellers, might have space limitation for luggage. The toilet and shower are within the same area where there was this heavy door which always have a “crack” sound when I opened or closed the door. I suspected the toilet light is on sensor as it will goes on and off whenever I enter or exit. Mysteriously, the toilet light came on at around 2am when I was sleeping on the bed. As I opened the blind from the toilet, the lights kinda woken me up when it

title: 'Too kool for skool'
desc: This is a boutique hotel on the Singapore River close to Robertson Quay. A good looking hotel and reasonably friendly staff. Good points: Good WiFi Mac desktops in the lobby for guests Great location Small gym and pool Robot delivery for room service Not-so-good points: The 'loft' room was small ie. no room to 'swing a cat' kind of small. The room was so dark due to the adjoining condo and there was so little lighting.. rather depressing There is blaring night club music at 8am in the lobby (Why would anyone think patrons want this) Service in the restaurant was so slow on a Sunday morning, that I had to go in to find my breakfast when my friends had finished theirs; mine was sitting waiting for attention (how long it had been sitting there... who knows?) Overall, not bad

title: Great stay -- friendly helpful staff, good location
desc: Funky hotel, Philippe Starck designs everywhere. Rooms pretty good, loft style upstairs with table. My breakfast was cooked by a robot, which was funny. Also had water delivered by a robot, however the staff were by no means robotic! Great place to stay.

title: Great Boutique hotel
desc: I stayed here for 10 nights for work, Its located in Robertson quay and within easy walk of many bars and restaurants, Clarke quay is a 10 minute walk away as well. They hotel is quirky and different from my normal corporate places. Rooms are very small even for singapore standards but well played out and the mess were comfortable. Bar and restaurant are really good. The pool on the 5th floor was very nice and a great way to start the day with a swim. I felt the room was a bit too small to do any business work in so often used the bar area as they have ample wifi coverage. I would definitely stay here again when I next visit Singapore

title: Great service
desc: Trendy hotel and staff was super attentive, kind enough to let us to check in slightly earlier as the room was already available and we had a lot of bags with us. Will definitely be revisiting this place again!

title: Excellent hotel -- friendly staff, outstanding service.
desc: Had a 2 night stay here at M Social and it has really wonderful designed room, public spaces and really excellent service! Beds are really comfortable, better compared to higher profiled hotels. The rooms are really cozy, great for couples to relax and have their peace and quiet from the hustle and buzzing of the city center. I would like to Commend; Yasmin the duty manager on shift for having a wonderful personality that comes with the service she provided. Cheerful yet professional, showing us the dedication she put into what she does in going the extra mile.

title: Pleasant Stay and interesting room
desc: It was my 2nd stay at M Social. Upgraded to Alcove with a loft and pretty cool experience. Was attended by a “Sociable” guest relations/Yasmin and indeed, she made us feel very welcoming and friendly. First time being attended by a robot that delivered water to us. Overall stay, a thumb up. As a traveller, we should give credits when it’s due on this platform!

title: M social staycation
desc: Loved the bed and room lighting, enjoyed the overall hotel, terrible (lack of) tv channels, good location and fast front desk service although it always seemed to be understaffed, food at the restaurant was quite good but would prefer the laksa to be served with the original noodle type.

title: Very high tech modern hotel in great position
desc: Staff were so pleasant and helpful...Jasmine and Wun went out of their way to help with new room allocation and were so friendly. Spotlessly clean and great food and cocktail bar. Rooftop pool marvellous Robot and automatic breakfast egg making machine sooo clever

title: Not worth the cool vibe of the hotel
desc: All in all, the experience was not what I was expecting. Having stayed with M Studio a few years back, I liked the concept of the loft room. So when I saw that M Social had a terrace room, i jumped at the chance right away. But i had a rude shock. First, the reception made me feel like I was checking in to a budget hotel, the self check-in is not for use (i was directed to wait to be checked-in by a physical person instead), no welcome and although I have listed that it was a stay to celebrate an anniversary, nothing was done to make our stay any special which just reinforced the feeling which I felt like I was staying in a budget hotel. The room and toilet is also way smaller than what it looked like in phones which made me feel misled. Room walls were thin, so I heard the

title: Quirky hotel excellent location
desc: Interesting quirky hotel, robots in lobby and in dining room. Excellent welcome, good information and continual interest shown by staff. Lovely location on river. Good swimming pool with excellent views. Comprehensive restaurant, breakfast 2 people for $35, very substantial. Room was on small side and we did not like the glass wall between shower and toilet and bed. There were black lines on glass, but did not like being in bed and able to see people about their ablutions. No hot water in any taps or shower.

title: Great hotel
desc: Trendy hotel, with a great buffet breakfast. Beautiful rooftop with infiniti pool. Friendly staff. Would stop there again. We were checked in by Davidson. Davidson was polite, efficient and made the check in process excellent.

title: Friendly staff with excellent service
desc: First visit to M Social over the weekend with my partner. I feel that the service provided by the staff was good. They took care of my needs and gave us a complimentary room upgrade as a welcome to the hotel. Shout out to Nuri from the reception for this. Location of the hotel is also fairly convenient with clarke quay nearby, there was entertainment, food and drinks all in one. I will definitely look forward to coming back and staying again at M Social.

title: Good Value For Money
desc: Singapore is an expensive city with space at a premium. Bearing that in mind, this hotel is good value for money. Yes the room is small, but we knew that in advance and we managed to squeeze ourselves and our four cases into what (I believe) was one of their most compact rooms without any real problem. We were using Singapore as a two night R & R location to recharge the batteries between a flight from the UK and an onward flight to Australia, so we were really interested in finding somewhere clean and comfortable at a reasonable rate and fairly accessible. M Social met all of our criteria. On arrival in the early morning, we were delighted to be offered an early check in by a very friendly and professional member of staff. We somewhat made up for this two days later when we

title: Amazing time and great service!
desc: Our 4th time having a staycay with M Social and it was as memorable as the first 3 times! Really love the aesthetic of the room as well as the breakfast buffet! Thank you Nuri for always checking us in and the great service! Will definitely come back☺️

title: Review
desc: Had a pleasant stay over at M Social. Will definitely come back and stay longer. Hotel ambiance was good and loft room was indeed cozy. Just that, pillow can be improved to a regular rectangular pillow rather than the current pillow that is being used. Over all, my stay was fantastic! Good job also to Nuri for the great customer service!

title: Tech hotel
desc: M Social is very different for those who like conventional with high standards. The hotel is very modern, with its grey concrete walls then contrasted by the hi tech features around you. From checking in you feel the young and new age theme the hotel is trying to portray. The rooms are small duplex with office on the mezzanine with tele and small sofa. I prefer the tele in front of the bed when travelling. I don’t believe this hotel is good for infants or even young children due to being cramped and duplex stairs very slippery. Food was ok and even had an auto omelette machine. Not nice at all to eat but, entertaining when seen first time. The location is very good with bars and restaurants lining the waterfront. However, not near the main bar areas. Gym is very small

title: Exceptional customer service
desc: The front desk staff were exceptional and genuinely concerned for my husband when he had a bad fall outside the hotel. They applied medical assistance immediately and organised for travel to the hospital. They followed up with me the next day on his welfare. The room service staff were also friendly and polite each time we saw them. The hotel is close to transport and many great restaurants close by.

title: Good hotel great location
desc: Hotel nicely located along the river with bars and restaurant. I walked in welcomed by friendly staff, gretchen was accommodating with smile despite its late evening. Will come back and stay for longer period.

title: Dissapointment
desc: My partner and me chose Msocial for this particular weekend as it is technically located at the outskirts of the city and we wanted it to have a well rested quiet weekend. It all went fine until unfortunately on the day of our checkout, Msocial staff Jasmine gave a call at 1300hrs to our room. Im dissapointed in the choice of words that could have been spewed out of her mouth. Are you guys getting more complacent and just because we are locals and you are just giving us a different kind of treatment? When she called, i EXPLAINED TO HER IN A VERY APOLOGETIC manner that Ive just woke up and could you give me abit of time to checkout. She said that after 1230pm there would be a half day charge. I reminded her that its already 1pm. She changed her words to 1245pm. I told her its

title: Super nice hotel
desc: Definitely recommending this hotel for anyone! Nice room, clean, stylish, comfortable bed! Nothing to complain and top of my list in Singapore now! Will definitely come back again. Great for any party, staycay, travelers!

title: Great hotel in Singapore
desc: We are super happy to be in MSocial in Singapore 🇸🇬 people is very kind and give awesome tips! Davidson and Ming were at the reception and they made our stay the best experience 🙏🏻😊 The swimming pool is refresher and after we did our checkout, they offer a free shower at the end of the day, before going to the airport! 👌🏼👌🏼

title: Short Birthday Staycation made better
desc: We had an amazing staycation here, made better by the delightful Mr Davidson who generously upgraded our room and added a sweet little birthday gift ! Room's fancy and comfortable, with a cute little loft and small terrace. Dinner at the in-house restaurant was surprisingly good; the roasted pork knuckle with thai sauce (surprisingly) goes well together. 10/10 will come back here again

title: Happy stay, great place for celebration
desc: Me and my girlfriends had a great Bachelorette party in M Social hotel. The celebration turned out to be even greater when Jasmine upgraded our room. Room is clean and comfortable, will definitely recommend my friends and family to stay.

title: Disappointed
desc: 1) The moment we checked in, opened the bathroom door, and we were greeted with sewage smell.... 2) the mini fridge is very dirty... Yellow liquid... Not sure what's that. But pretty sure the hotel maid did not even bother to check and clean the mini fridge... 3) toothbrush bristle is super hard. Not sure if they are meant for humans or horses o.O 4) both bedside lamps has different level of dimness even if it was switched to the lowest brightness -.- ended up having to switch off one of it... 5) although we are locals, but we thought that the plugs in the rooms need some upgrading. Many hotels already have international ready plugs. But M Social SG only have local 3 pin wall plug. Pretty outdated... Should probably upgrade. Despite the disappointments, counter staff on

title: A night break
desc: It was a comfortable room with TV. We were deprived of television for 17 days. Despite the drizzle we enjoyed the swimming pool to help cool us down. The food in the restaurant was to our taste too. The tiger beer we had was refreshing. All in all we had a good swim, beer and dinner here. We like to return in our next visit to Singapore.

title: Hotel Review
desc: Very good and staff was very prompt as it was my proposal. They assisted helping me to secure a early check in and I really appreciate that. Decorations was also made by them. Other than that the room is clean and spacious.

title: Amazing Short Holiday
desc: We had an amazing experienced at M Social Hotel, location is in quiet area which is what we are looking for. Loft Room: thanks to Gretchen for the room upgrade. Room is clean, bed is from Tempur which is one of the most comfy bed, love it!!!Housekeeping service staffs are accomodating, and generous with bottle waters bec we drink lots of water. Beast’s & Butterflies Bar: Special thanks to ARMAND!!! He is such a sweetheart, every night , we love sitting at the bar area cos he made sure that we are well taken care off, he explained well everything about the menu, drinks and super welcoming. I recommend to look for Armand whenever you want to have a drink or dinner by the bar. Bar is clean , service is on point! I enjoyed hanging out there. The restaurant side: Food is good,

title: Excellent Hotel and great location
desc: This hotel is wonderful! The staff are helpful and friendly. The hotel itself is beautifully decorated by Philippe Starck so it’s a nice atmosphere and difference than a “typical” hotel. We upgraded to a loft room, which, if it is in your budget I would definitely recommend. There is an efficient use of space as in the room, making it seem much bigger than it is. The hotel itself is right on the river with resturants and nightlife on one side, and close to Robertson Walk, which has resturants. A Seven Eleven is never far away so you can get provisions as needed. It is about a 15 minute walk from an MRT station (Fort Canning) and about a 1.4 miles from Maxwell Hawker Center, which makes Chinatown also close by. We did laundry there as well. It was 8 dollars per wash or

title: Rooms are quite small but comfortable
desc: We booked a room over the weekend for a short staycation and to celebrate a birthday. Picked the Terrace Room which is on the second floor because of its outdoor garden/balcony. Room is a little smaller than what I imagined. The sink is just opposite your bed instead of being in the toilet and there isn't a lot of space to move around. The room is still comfortable though, just that the lack of space is quite jarring for the price range. Location wise the hotel is not bad, located right next to the Singapore River, which you can take a scenic stroll along to reach places like Clarke Quay and Esplanade.
