There are also many eateries nearby, though more on the pricey end. Staff are also quite friendly during the check in and out process. In terms of amenities, there is a pool

title: Business becomes a pleasure at M-hotel
desc: Real amazing stay thanks to Nuri and Jasmine! They are Excellent and made me feel like I was at home. I highly recommend this Hotel. There is a big probability that you'll be as lucky as I was and find both of them at the Front Desk! Until next visit! F. C

title: Great!
desc: Beautiful room with terrace, had a great birthday celebration there over the weekend. Location is superb and the breakfast is not bad. There is also a convenience store within 5min walk from the hotel.

title: Thank you Davison, Duty Manager & all
desc: Had a very happi stay on 17-18Oct 19. Davison who checked me in he's soo friendly, service mind and emotionally connect with customers. One of Duty Manager in the morning of 18 assisted me for a taxi to Marina (I don't know his name sorry). You all treating your customers right, thank you so much! 🙏 Never forget M Social iconic fast-growing hotel! P.S. I LIKE the aura bot too!

title: Short Visit in SG
desc: I had a great stay with my sister and friends here in M Social Hotel... our room is clean, very comfortable bed and staffs are very accomodating and responsive. The foods & Staffs in the Beast & Butterfly restaurant are great also especially that robotic omellete maker... it’s so amazing! It’s my first time to see that in a hotel... at night we had some drinks at the bar and since it’s our first time here thanks to Arman who entertain us and make sure that we will have a great night by suggesting their best drinks to try and foods. We end our night with a wondeful experience not only in the M Social hotel but especially in Beast & Butterfly Restaurant. 👍👍 & Highly recommended place to stay in Singapore!

title: Air con / ventilation system is unmanageable from inside the room.
desc: If you like to sleep in a room refreshed as if you were on a plane, that's your place. If, like me, you can't really stand air conditioning / forced ventilation at night (because of the air getting too dry and affecting your health), a place to avoid next time. The air-con / ventilation system is unmanageable from inside the room.

title: Great location for a single business traveller
desc: Great experience and location. Very friendly staff and always ready to assist in any way. Breakfast is not the best but there are so many options around that this is not really a negative to any guest staying here.

title: Hidden Gem
desc: Although the room may be a little dark but everything else makes up for it. M Social is surrounded by plenty of nice food! The bed is one of the most comfiest and it was a well rested staycation. Thank you!

title: full of good vibes
desc: nice, friendly, cosy, trendy, young, energising, healthy, happening. This is not just an ordinary hotel, it is a meeting and gathering place in Singapore's river side in which the architecture and Interior design are simply outstanding and just perfect

title: Will Keep Coming Back !
desc: Stayed here for almost 21 days and find the service impeccable. Though the rooms are pretty small, but they are compact and sufficient for a couple if they know how to maximise the space like we did. The front desk allowed us leave our luggage after check out and gave us access to the swimming pool and shower rooms located at level 5 to freshen up before our flight. All the staff were friendly at the lobby!!

title: Superb hotel
desc: Situated right on the river it’s a pleasant thirty minute walk to Capita Green in the business district. Took pictures every day. What a great way to start and emend the day! There’s a good gym too and a rooftop pool. All this for great value pricing. I’ll stay here next time I fly in.

title: Worst check in experience!
desc: I ve stayed in room 723 in M Social for a night. I came to check in in the evening time and already tired of a long flight however i still have to wait in the queue for the “self check in” which invention that STILL have to get a staff there to assist with. After almost half an hour finally i get to check in. The system have lots of error and keep loading for a long time. It was a long wait rather than the normal check in i used to have. The “self in” also asked me for a different credit card for deposit. The worst is when i check out the rate that shows on the screen wasn’t the amount that i paid for the hotel lah! It takes forever for loading while I don’t need to pay anything and i have to stand there starring at the screen! When i asked for a printed invoice i was

title: Asia trip
desc: M social is a very good hotel with friendly staff members willing to help you anytime you needed them. The loft terrace room I stayed at was very spacious and tall with a comfy bed and a cosy place to watch tv upstairs. The pool and gym were also nice features. The only negative thing is that the hotel location is a bit of a walk from the MRT station but they have taxis which can be called on site. There is a really great cafe called common man coffee roasters 2 minutes walk from the hotel also for a late night out and clubbing head up the river to Clarke quay where all the locals and tourist go for a drink. Over all the hotel is great value for money and I very much enjoyed my first visit to Singapore.

title: Comfortable bed and excellent customer service
desc: This hotel is good for couple, small room but nice design and a comfortable bed, excellent customer service. They slipped a birthday card on my room and dining voucher, thank you for that :) Close to a Common Man Coffee Roasters (love their coffee), a bit of a walk to the bus stop (5-10 mins). I would stay here again.

title: Always the preferred choice
desc: Back here again for the second time and the stay was remarkable! Happy to be greeted by a familiar face, Davidson at the check-in counter who could remember me. His friendliness and outstanding service definitely helped to elevate the whole experience and stay at M Social. Keep up the good work! Will always recommend those who seeks a cosy hide-out in the city to consider M Social.

title: Great Experience! Will visit again.
desc: The hotel is very tastefully done, and the service staff are great! Was greeted by Gretchen upon arrival, whom was extremely warm and helpful. When we mentioned that it was my birthday staycation and she observed we had 2 kids, she kindly offered a room upgrade which was such a pleasant surprise. She gave us all the necessary info for us to enjoy our stay.

title: Alcove Cosy Room
desc: Great room decoration for my special occasion thanks to the staff of m social. Reception was very helpful and professional. Rooms were clean and great design as it was unique. Room view could be better but it’s due to availability I guess.

title: Average
desc: Compare with price, the room space is too small to accept. Staff service and cleanliness are very good. The location near by Robertson Quay is very good for me. If the room space can be larger or price can be more attractive, i'll visit next time.

title: amazing experience till check in to check out!
desc: i was there for a birthday celebration! Jasmine from front office checked me in and straight away acknowledge that it was my birthday and surprised me with a birthday treats! thank you for the memorable stay jasmine! of course staffs at butterflies and beast is great as well! i will be back

title: Perfect for a long weekend stay
desc: My meeting was walking distance to the hotel so I chose M Social. It is great location for morning run by the rive and plenty of restaurants and bars close-by. The service was attentive and the room was well-equipped. However, the closest MRT station is about a 8-10minutes walk but it's a nice stroll nice to the river. I would certainly come back and stay again.

title: Excellent hotel and friendly staff
desc: This hotel stay was memorable and service was excellent. The room is clean and the reception staff was thoughtful. I was served by Nuri. She is attentive to the guest needs and make sure that we are all taken care of! Thanks Nuri !

title: Excelent service
desc: The staff of the hotel is the high point of the stay. People are very helpfull and friendly. Check-in and check-out were very easy. The breakfast had a lot of options and was tastefull. The location of the hotel is great. The only thing you have to consider is the small size of the room, the bad lumination and the inconveniente door that gives access to the bathroom.

title: Thank you M Social!
desc: Had a birthday surprise/celebration a few days back, and indicated that when booking the hotel. Not only did they gave me an upgrade on the room, there were swans and rose petals on the bed + a birthday treat on them at beasts and butterflies (their in-house restaurant). Service staff at the reception were also warm and friendly. Thank you for making this birthday surprise awesome M Social, will definitely come back again.

title: M
desc: Hotel is nice, clean, with pools, gym.. Breakfast is very good. I will come again for sure if I come in Singapore. Location and price perfect, walking distance to the center of City and lot restaurants aroud

title: Great stay
desc: Staff was great, room was great, service was excellent. Only thing was the slightly long queue for the check out but decided to just drop the keycards into the express checkout box. But overall i really enjoyed the stay and will definitely recommend this place

title: Robots vs humans
desc: .. I can't choose between the high tech or the staff. Very pleased with staying at M Social. The staff is very friendly and really nice. So are their robot, Aura! I loved the little suprise I got, when I ordered coffee and extra shampoo - the little robot rang me and told me it was here and I should open the door for it! The hotel is located in a very quiet but also well visited area, with a lot of cafees and restaurants next to it. Even though I didn't ate at them, it was nice to know, that i was next door. Check in and out is very easy and it is very easy to order a cab by the ipad. Pay by taxameter or fixed price? Just choose. The rooms are very small - but with a bed size you cannot complain over! I was a bit suprised when I was the room size, but ok.. I ordered the

title: Great location, amenity and service
desc: Well priced for the level of accommodation. Nice roof top pool, quiet rooms, lovely river side position, nice breakfast (with quirky auto omelette machine) and helpful staff. Only spent one night as we were in transit but will stay at this hotel next time we are passing.

title: Terrible experience for Birthday celebration ever!
desc: 1.My boyfriend requested for birthday decoration because he saw the feedback and pic from one of the trip advisor which come with the swan and “Happy birthday” instead of this decoration we got! Fine.. 2.THE WORST SERVICE ever is this is what happen to my birthday cake! We asked to keep our cake in fridge just for few hours and this is what we got back! We pretty sure it was not damaged till we pass it to the restaurant. Hello, do you know how much my partner prepared and surprise me, just because of your untrained personnel my birthday was spoiled! The restaurant is not 24 hours so we have to go back to collect the cake before 11pm and keep inside the minibar in the room which PRETTY SMALL cant even fit!

title: First stop on our honeymoon
desc: This was a great little hotel, right on the river at Robertson Quay. The room we stayed in was on one of the top floors and was reasonable in size. It was a little noisy during the day as tradesmen were working on the balcony one floor down and opposite us, but the view was good otherwise. The service was great, all staff we dealt with were very courteous and helpful. We enjoyed the location, and being able to wander along the river. It's an easy walk to Tiong Bahru Market with plenty of cheap and amazing food there but otherwise taxis and other transport makes it fairly easy to get around from M Social.

title: Great for Singaporean Staycation
desc: Near Clarke Quay lots of food! Hotel is quite modern and techy. Good for young couples! They have a robot called Aura which will help bring stuffs to you. High ceiling gives you a prestige feeling. Rain-shower was strong too!

title: Cozy Rooms
desc: Cozy Room, swimming pool have good view, comfortable bed. Location a little far from MRT but it's ok. Near to the river where you can take a stroll towards Clarke Quay. Overall, a good stay. Recommended.

title: Modern & Smart Hotel
desc: Excellent hotel for couples. We booked a room with a very small terrace so we had the possibility to sit outside instead of being in a closed room. The room was very small but the layout is really smart, everything you need is there. The design is also very nice, all fits perfectly for 2 people. Breakfast is also very good, great variety of choice and ofcourse there is the funny robot baking your eggs. Checking in and out was easy and all personnel is super friendly. The position is great in a nice and quiet neighborhood on the waterfront. Surrounded by loads of restaurants and bars enough choice in all price ranges. Marina Bay and the other quays all within easy walking distance. I would definitely recommend this hotel if you don't want to spend to much but still prefer a

title: Ok stay
desc: Location ok, room was very small and lighting was poor. Bathroom was so small, sink didn't fit. Bed comfortable but pillows not. Rooms clean and towels changed every day. Staff polite and check in easy. Nice to wake up to a Christmas stocking on our door on Christmas day.

title: Probably one of the nicest hotel I've stayed in
desc: Amazing location, conveniently situated so many cafés, bistros and restaurants. Wonderful check in experience, with the cleaning bot that takes lifts (!?!?) Have you seen a robot making scrambled eggs!? Room was beautifully designed with sufficient space to move around. Bed was amazing with the blackout curtains. Almost missed my check out timing because of the amazing bed!!!! All in all, a wonderful experience?

title: Nice staycation!
desc: Chic decor, comfy lil rooms (ours had a sink outside the toilet). Bed was super comfy, with extra pillows too. Ask for the pool / condo view - some rooms open up to a high wall and can be a bit dreary. Wifi is SUPERB, streamed Prime vids with 0 lag. Bugget beakfast variety is adequate, else just order ala carte / hop out to one of the nearby cafes. Perfect location for a river-side stroll at night, there's also a free shuttle to nearby malls & Orchard. Would recommend!

title: Great Stay
desc: Cosy place and they do have friendly staff like Jasmine (Front Desk)! She added smile to our Christmas Eve. Thank you for the great assistance. Recommend to stay for short getaway! Accessible to Clarke Quay Area!

title: A Starck Experience
desc: Went for a stay with promotional rates. With the promotional rate, the stay is definitely worth it. The room is small and not luxurious but enough for a good stay. The facilities are also sufficient for a short stay. Good for a short getaway and business trip. Good location. Quiet but near to the active places.

title: Very solid hotel!
desc: This was the first hotel during our stay in Asia. Really liked it! Looks beautiful and clean, the room was on the smaller side but looked very cool. Breakfast was above average and they have and amazing egg-making-robot which was completely new to me :) Nice neighbourhood as well!

title: Comfy beds, delicious breakfast and high-tech service
desc: I was on a work trip when I stayed at M Social and the accommodations were excellent. Though the room was small, the bed, pillows and sheets were so comfortable that it was difficult for me to get up in the morning! The idea of the buffet breakfast with a good selection of veggies, fruits, bread and dimsum motivated me to get out of bed: another plus! Look for the unmanned egg station at breakfast and let the machine cook eggs for you just the way you like it. One more thing: housekeeping requests are likewise granted by an "automated room-service associate," the R2D2-like "Aura."

title: Pretty okay.
desc: Overall stay was okay. Staffs was friendly. Good location. Room was pretty small and sound proof wasn’t so good I guess, cause we received a few complaints about the noise. Good location for grabfood. Many options

title: Holidays
desc: Perfect place for 1 to nights. Great service! The entire stuff is very committed, and the hotel just have a great atmosphere. I will definitely be here again on my next visit to Singapore. The location is also a good.

title: Relaxing area to stay in SG
desc: Pros: 1) Very efficient online customer service 2) The location is excellent for a relaxing stay in SG. I love the quiet walks and vibrant restos esp during weekends! There are a lot of cafes for superb brunch 3) The hotel's own resto- Beasts and Butterflies serves very good bfast and dinner options. 4) The nearest MTR line is Fort Canning (blue line) which connects you to key points in SG 5) The nearest bus stop is 5mins away Cons: 1) Rooms are a bit on the smaller side 2) Not so much of an issue to me but might be for some, the Fort Canning MRT is a 15min walk which is quite far esp on warmer days Overall, it was a pleasant experience. By th way, the director of the hotel is top notch!

title: Good food & ambient
desc: The environment is really good! The food are superb!!!! Best diner in town! Thanks to Cariza and Armando for the awesome service! We had the pork knuckle, laksa and more. The appetizer is really suppressed me!

title: Wedding anniversary stay - still in house
desc: Checked in today, and while I do not like to complain unless I feel it’s really something substantial, this was quite ridiculous. First of all let me say, my check in experience was relatively good. The agent was fast, and the lady she called out Maria was really nice and welcoming. So thank you for that! I was not able to get a higher floor room but it’s alright I understand occupancy might not have allowed it. We came in and they had pre-decorated our bed with the swan towel and fake flower petals which I thought was a really sweet and thoughtful gesture as using fake flower petals would first up help people with pollen allergies still have the nice surprise and also it’s reusable (I would think). Then we sat to watch television, and my husband found a needle on the carpet

title: Birthday Surprise Staycay!
desc: This staycay was actually a surprise for my Husband's birthday. I think we both were surprise when we got free upgrade to Loft Premier room. The room is super amazing! So many cool stuff and the bed OMG was heavenly! They had also decorated the bed with flower patels and the heart shape towel. Truly touched by these.There is also pool view. The room is very clean and spacious. One of the staff was great and he suggested us to try the robot service where Aura (the robot name) delivered us 2 bottled water. You guys have to try it! Its super cute! We even tried the pool in the morning. Thank you making our stay a great one! We will definitely plan on coming back again 😊

title: Would recommend to family and friends
desc: Stayed here for 5 nights with my sister during our first time travelling to Singapore. We picked this hotel because of the good central location, 10 minute walk from the bus stops to get around Singapore's tourist attractions (Orchard Road, National Museum, Haji Lane, Arab Street, Chinatown). 10-20 minutes on the bus to get to those places. You are able to catch a glimpse of Marina Bay Sands from certain angles while walking along the Singapore River. We had Gretchen look after us during our stay. Knowing it was our first time in Singapore and because we got lucky that there was room availability, she upgraded our room to the Loft Premier Room. She was so friendly and accommodating. The other staff carried the same attitude. The Loft Premiem room was great in size, high

title: Singapore rest
desc: Mostly a rest period between destinations with some friends. Exploring the joys of Singapore’s easy transport and varied galleries and museums. Enjoying the rooftop pool to cool off after a days of challenging exploring and eating.

title: M Social Weekend Stay at Loft Room
desc: Wonderful weekend stay at M Social Hotel. Book the loft room for a unique experience. Room is clean and wifi signal is strong. Bed is very comfortable. Shout out to Gretchen for excellent hospitality and customer service. She really made us feel welcome! Take advantage of the free shuttle bus to town. Ask for a copy of the bus schedule at the check in kiosk. You must ask Aura (robot) to bring you some toiletries etc. Aura will fetch the items and deliver it to your doorstep! I gave Aura a five stars rating!

title: Acceptable stay
desc: If you are expecting complimentary parking for hotel guests, this is not the place for you. For the price of a premium loft room, could easily get a better place to stay at a much more convenient location.

title: Second home!
desc: We’ve been coming to the MSocial for more than a year and its always been a pleasure! The staff is welcoming and the two story rooms really feel like home away from home. The localisation is ideal, very central and the river side is very enjoyable for a morning run or to take the apero at night.

title: Top Notch Service
desc: Been staying here over 3 weeks now and found the hotel to be very modern and trendy. The cleaning standards were exceptionally clean and the front desk team were amazing. I would like to compliment Angel who was very helpful and gave us wondering service when we needed help from her in the morning. The breakfast variety I must say could have had more options. On some days there was stir fried vegetables and would appreciate if you could have it daily as more guest are moving towards vegetarian or vegan products. I would also prefer to have more healthy options during breakfast. I would also like to thank the white caucasian lady at the lobby who was very kind during my stay.

title: Had a great stay for our 1st wedding anniversary!
desc: I would like to express my thanks and appreciation for the service and care I received at M social Hotel. I took my wife on our first wedding anniversary and I wanted it to be perfect. Your staff did not disappoint me. Duty Manager Nuri ensures that the room is well decorated for the special occasion. Upon entering the room, i find that the decorations were attractive. Both my wife and i were delighted. 👍🏽 Every staff member with whom we came in contact was attentive and kind including Ibrahim, Who help us with our heavy luggage and escorted us to our room. And he also explained to us on the facilities available in the hotel. 👍🏽 We will definitely recommend M Social Hotel to our family and friends and also be back for our next vacation. Sincerely, Faiz

title: Awesome
desc: Overall its still a good place to stay at, apart from the distance. it's a distance of 20mins from the nearest train and bus stop, however it is really accessible to nearby malls through the bus and trains.

title: Choose the bigger rooms
desc: If you're tight on budget and would like to choose the smallest room, I would suggest not. It is pretty challenging to open your luggage freely as there isn't much floor space. Clothes rack area is insufficient for two as well. It is probably a better experience to book their bigger rooms, or spend your money on another hotel.

title: Hotel was good, however...
desc: Hotel is great & cozy, swimming pool kinda small, gym room was okay, and breakfast is good. However there are few areas need to improve: 1) No complimentary car park - If you wish to get free car park, they do not provide any of it. You may need to pay SGD 16 per day if you intend to park over night. Additional information, public transport such like MRT not near, you need to walk far (1.5KM). 2) Unreachable phone line - I have tried to called their number provided in website, however the line not reachable at all. 3) Promotion in the website not real & feel being cheated - Being told in the website during booking, they provide early check-in & late check-out by availability. However, as their phone line not reachable, we can only e-mail them to ask whether we can check-in

title: Definitely Coming Back
desc: I was in town for a week for work. Couldn't have been treated better by the staff! The style & amenities were great. Very modern and sleek. You MUST go see Vlad the bartender at Beast & Butterflies next door. Awesome guy and great drinks. And Aura, the room service robot was fantastic. Very 3019 haha. I would absolutely come back to M Social next time I'm in Singapore!

title: Enjoyed my stay
desc: I enjoy the cleanliness and classy design of the room. It's perfect for a weekend staycation. I'm impressed by cute Aura and her prompt service as well. Would definitely return for another stay. Thank you, M Social!

title: Great Location and good value for money.
desc: Great location with a modern feel. Breakfast is set in a spacious area with a nice view of the river. Rooms are a little small for a long stay but for a few days they are fine, great for stopovers or long weekends. Pool and pool side facilities are great. There are many restaurants and coffee shops nearby along the river which is a big plus point. Staff are friendly and unobtrusive, check in and out is efficient. Lastly and certainly not least, great value for money . Enjoy Singapore and your stay!

title: Great rooms, dirty glasses in the restaurant
desc: Rooms were great and clean, and the food at the restaurant was great but was totally put off when my husband got two 'fresh glasses' and there were lipstick stains and dirt on each cup - lost my appetite! but other than that, was a good stay.

title: Didn’t return my deposit despite paying in advance
desc: The hotel didn’t return my deposit as promised. Deducted from my card again, despite paying in full in advance. I want my money back. It was really inconvenient and they should state in advance that they require deposit.

title: M Social Hotel Singapore
desc: Great pool, small but working gym, very small rooms but all very clean. Cannot really work in your room unless you get a room with a mezzanine level. Very friendly and helpful staff and a really good location.

title: Not so valuable hotel stay in Singapore
desc: Booked a 3D2N stay during the CNY festive period and this is not a hotel I will recommend. Check-in - Was a total waste of time with the automated check-in system. Upon arrival, we approached the system for self check-in but the system could not capture our booking. So we got in line for the counter with a staff to assist. First - we stood behind a guest checking in and the staff was so rude when asking us to get behind the queue line. The queue line was not directly behind the counters and there was NO indication that we have to queue there. Second, instead of helping us, another staff direct us back to the automated check-in, it didn't work and she has to do some back-end adjustment for it to work. The machine need us to key in ALL of the information on our own and it is

title: Chic & clean
desc: Love the central location. Quite a private surrounding despite near the nightlife spot. The hotel is very modern. The robot for making eggs at breakfast is super cool although it would be better if they add halal & vegetarian spread. The room interior is chic and stylish.

title: Unique, centrally located hotel
desc: M Social was not the type of hotel I would typically book - as a business traveler, I like to keep all of my reservations within the same chain. (All about the points!) However, this was not an option while trying to book over Chinese New Year. M Social provided a unique loft room layout that was perfect for having a little separation of space if I needed to work while my accompanying family member was still asleep. The gym was adequate - small, but bright. My complaint here is that they ran out of sanitization wipes in the gym after my second day. I pointed this out, considering we're in the middle of a viral outbreak, and the wipes were still not replaced by day 9 when I checked out. The gym is the easiest place to spread diseases and I was disappointed that this small

title: Great Hotel
desc: Stayed here a few times. Great location. Robertson Quay is really nice and very accessible from the centre of the City. Nice feel. Good staff. Rooms small but quirky nice. Good breakfast but don't like the egg robot. Great for Instagram, but....?? Can't beat a good egg chef.

title: Nice hotel with nice restaurants nearby
desc: You would not find yourself hungry or bored around the Robertson Quay areas, with excellent choices of restaurants and a great hotel room, definitely can provide you a good sleep! The check-in and check-out is smooth and quick and everything is fine.

title: Great hotel to chill with friends
desc: check in & out abit slow..theres always a long queue..because of the usage of electronic check in and out machines but staff are all very friendly and helpful. Room is good and clean..love the loft room layout..great hotel to chill with friends and families.

title: Super Chill Hotel
desc: Very convenient check in and check out. Fast service and kind staff. The room design is very relax and elegant - Will definitely comeback and bring my family. The location is a 10 minute walk to Clark Quay.

title: It is a good place for vacation
desc: The hotel view is good, lots of shops and restaurant nearby. The hotel offers shuttle bus services to the city center. It is a good place for vacation. And the breakfast is good. The room is tidy and environmental friendly but the room is a bit too small, and it is better to put the sink in to washroom instead of the bedroom.

title: Terrible and worst hotel in the world
desc: フロントのスタッフは愛想や挨拶がなく機械的でホスピタリティやフレンドリーさはなかった Front desk staffs are no hospitality and friendly Room is so small 部屋はめちゃめちゃ狭いです 日本のビジホ並みです Breakfast venue is so crowded with guests 朝食会場は狭く大混雑していてたまりよくオーガナイズされていませんでした Check-out que is so long , and not well organized チェックアウトの列も20人くらい並んでいておなじくよくオーガナイズされていませんでした Hotel Location is quite far from sightseeing highlights, so you need to take taxi to/from highlights area. ロケーションも各観光スポットから離れていて、必ずタクシー乗る必要ありです This is budget hotel 全体を通じてバジェットホテルのクオリティーでした NOT recommended if you expect star rating hotel 星付きホテルの滞在をオススメいたします It’s better to stay in the hotel near the CBD area / China town area / orchard area. CBDエリア、チャイナタウン、オーチャードエリアのホテルに宿泊をオススメいたします

title: Good but No Surprise Stay
desc: This hotel was nicely design especially the lobby and restaurant. For the Guest room I stayed have an interesting layout with mezzanine level. But I found that the queen size bed was too small for normal standard and toilet also quite small which sharing with WC. Hotel Breakfast is fine for western tourist because if compare to other similar range hotel,most of them provide far more food selection. The location is not convenient because do not have direct MRT connection need to take bus or taxi most of the time.

title: Excellent service
desc: Very nice hotel ,good service, good food, nice quality, very clean room, good accommodation in the room, the breakfast very excellent. The restaurant good service , good price and many choices. Barmaid Vlad, very professional and very sympathetic.

title: Good design hotel
desc: Balcony of the room is amazing! Nice and special experience. This hotel is perfect for people who spend most of time outside and don't care about the room size. Also the price is cheap. Location is close to riverside but not in the busy area, it is nice at night for riverside walk.

title: Nice hotel
desc: Nice hotel close to Quays. A short walk to Chinatown and Marina Bay Sands. Not so big rooms but a great view (from my room) Good swimming pool. Spectacular breakfast (I loved) But I have a problem when I arrive at the hotel. My booking it's duplicate and the receptionist say "If you not arrange this problem with you travel company we will charge you both reservation" I phone Booking.com and they verified that it was a problem of the hotel reservation center. No explanation or apologize from the hotel until now.And they charged me the phone call.

title: Just OK
desc: Rooms are very small and quirky but are clean and adequate. The roof top pool was absolutely freezing but the staff are friendly and accommodating. This is a basic and nice hotel, if you have lots of luggage it won’t be suitable. The reason they get such a low rating is due to extreme circumstances. We were staying in Jan 2020 and felt uncomfortable continuing our stay with the Corona virus spreading and with the numbers in Singapore rising. China airlines are refunding our flight to Shanghai, so why couldn't you MSocial, refund us for the remaining week of our stay? So many businesses are refunding people to create good will but you choose not too.

title: First trip to Singapore
desc: The hotel is in an excellent location with plenty of places to eat and drink nearby. It is near to the main attractions and the MRT station at Clarke Quay. The hotel has a super boutique vibe and the staff are very pleasant and helpful. Breakfast is plentiful with a choice for everyone - the highlight being the 'robot' that makes your omelette! Rooms are small but adequate & there is a rooftop pool to cool off in. I would definitely stay again if in Singapore.

title: A must experience in Singapore!
desc: We would like to tell you about our great experience in the M Social Hotel We have been staying in this hotel for 2 months and it already feels like home The hotel is located in the most amazing location right at the heart of Singapore city center. The quality of the facilities is top notch, and the environment is always welcoming! As we felt that we have been attended in a personal level, we want to thank each of the crew members personally: - Elvine, the conductor of the restaurant orchestra, for the two boiled eggs with fresh salad and plain yogurt every morning :) - Almandro, the pretty face of the dinning room, for the LOVE and warming welcome every morning! - Nash, the professional pool player, who always stays with a smile even tough he wakes up every morning at 5 AM -

title: Modern and Chic Hotel
desc: I was here for staycation and the check in process is hassle-free. What I loved about this hotel is the cleanliness of the room. The furniture is in good condition. Some interesting thing is that they offer robot service which is pretty refreshing. (This means you don't need to pay tips). However, the only thing to pin point is really the breakfast selection. It is not tasty at all. There is an egg machine which kinda makes up for the lack. Otherwise, this can be improved! For travellers, there is a shuttle bus that brings you to orchard so you need not waste money. Make use of it! Having said, I would gladly return! :)

title: Worst service at a 4 star hotel
desc: We were served by Staff Nuri during check-in. The hotel was understaffed and staffs seemed overwhelmed and flustered. Check-in was slipshod, seems like they just wanted to get it over and done with. We knew that our room price only included breakfast for 1 therefore we requested to add on 1 more breakfast. Staff Nuri informed us that she has added on the breakfast for us and we could proceed directly to the restaurant the next day. However when we went down the next day, we were turned down by the staff as he said that our breakfast was only for 1. He told us to make additional payment on the spot. We did not have our wallets with us at that time therefore we went back to our rooms without having any breakfast. Staff was very unapologetic when i called the front desk to feedback

title: Tiny rooms
desc: Single person staying in 2 persons room and it was super tiny. Can’t Imagine having 2 pax. The bed is not even standard queen, think it was mini queen? Staff weren’t friendly and warm. Overall quite disappointed with this place.

title: Quirky and very comfortable
desc: I was very glad that I choose this hotel. It was in a lovely position, by the river and in a relatively quiet spot with all the amenities, shops, restaurants, buses and MRT reasonably close. The room itself was comfortable and clean. It was not overly big but for three nights it suited us fine. We had a room with a small patio area and it was nice to be able to open the door and step outside. The hotel is full of quirky details, including a robot to cook your eggs. The hotel interior is colourful and stylish. They are some many little details to look at and enjoy. The staff were friendly and helpful. All in all we felt it was a great choice and would return if we found ourselves in Singapore again.

title: Unpleasant welcome even frequent visit to your hotel
desc: Standard room - poor lighting very dim. Loft room is better , however, hair dryer was spoilt. Breakfast selection average. My last trip, room confirmation at Loft room, pre-check in at 12pm , requested to come back after 2pm as room is not clean, however upon return at 6pm- inexperience front office team- Yuki asked to downgrade my room in return for a free dinner?? This is unacceptable! When I rejected the offer, immediately she gave me back the Loft room which was actually available?! Very unpleasant experience even I’ve repeatedly staying in your hotel. No recognitions and not even welcome back.

title: Upgraded Motel rather than a hotel
desc: I often travel Singapore for business and always stay in decent hotel. This time I was referred M Social by a co-worker (later found he was staying at different hotel). I had worse experience during stay. Below are brief highlights. No universal AC plug inside room, don’t forget to have world plug if you are international traveler. Barely a person can fit inside bathroom, no ventilation available. Sink is located outside the bathroom. Lighting inside room is so poor that barely can see your face in mirror. Food has no taste, poor room service.

title: Unique rooms worth the money spent
desc: Had a short 1 night stay at this raved about hotel. The guest experience from check in to check out was seamless. I loved the modern and beautifully designed rooms. The 2 story loft gallery rooms was like no other. It added a unique touch my whole experience. Buffet breakfast had a wide variety of international and local food. They had this Super fun robot omelette machine which was pretty cool Shout out to the staff Mr Deshan, William and Yasmine. It feels good to be served by such friendly people who were smiling and friendly. At 4am I was freezing cold and although I was informed that the laundry was closed the staff managed to find me a extra blanket, not a hint of reluctance or change of attitude that you will normally get when faced with a request at this timing.

title: Very friendly and helpfull staff
desc: Excellent hotel, clean and modern rooms. The service was also fantastic from the staff at the reception. We've been attended by Jasmin and Abiv. Many thanks to them! Daphne and Martijn from The Netherlands

title: Coffee at Beast and Butterflies
desc: I would like to command the General Manager PJ and Zyane Security manager for M Social for the impeccable way of handling my parking predicament at M Social as I could not refill my card to pay the parking they waved the fee and opened the gate for me! They missed on 33 dollars of parking but they gained a client forever! A vision on the long term that would be great to keep in mind when we deal with clients and business in general - Be prepared to loose on the small stuff to gain on the big stuff! Kudos! Yours truly! Isabelle Miaja Miaja Design Group

title: Everything was perfect!
desc: The room is small but very well appointed. Clean and modern. Would definitely recommend. Breakfast was good too. 20 minutes walk to nearest MRT station , but well worth the stroll along the river. Helpful staff.

title: This hotel makes all the other yellow in jealousy
desc: Way above the expectations. Asked for yellow room because of fake allergy to all other colors: got it. Forgot my phone at the gym; got it back in 10 minutes. Awesome staff at reception and restaurant. Great brutalist design. Best location. Young and sharp travelers hot spot.

title: Nice and unique
desc: Overall room is good and clean. High ceiling room and unique concept. Has rain shower. However they did not replenish the towels. Had to call reception twice to get them. They also had a robot to bring your needs.

title: Hotel feedback
desc: I used to be a hotel manager before and would like to give some feedback about the hotel. Upon arrival there is a queue waiting for check in. I am not surprise as a hotel will have a peak period but what i am surprise is there are two self check in counter that is not useful at all.There is one counter that a staff assist with check in is more efficient than the self check in counter which the 2 staff there have to keep walking in and out of the counter to check the booking. I’ve been waiting i the queue for at least 30 minutes. While waiting i have nothing to do other than observing what the staff are doing. I am just wondering, isn’t a hotelier‘s main job is to serve the guest rather than serving the system? A self check in counter needs another staff to assist with check

title: good choise
desc: loved the room, although small. But the bed was very comfortable, and there was storage space, so absolutely fair regarding the price. Breakfast was not exciting, but there are plenty of choices around.

title: Comfortable stay and great service.
desc: We loved our stay at M Social. The bed was very comfortable, there’s a great pool, room was on the small side. The bar and restaurant was lovely and the live music at night excellent. Would stay again for sure!

title: Wonderful and Thankful hotel! Please go here
desc: 1. 시설이 좋아요. 전체적인 시설이 좋고 치약.칫솔.샴푸.린스.바디워시등이 기본 제공되는게 좋더라고요~ 2. 수영장이 정말 괜찮아요. 10만원대라 크게 기대하지 않았는데 수영장 뷰가 생각보다 괜찮아요! 바로 옆에있는 건물이 예뻐서 맑은 오후에 이 건물 보면서 수영하면 여행중에 힐링도되고 좋아요~ 3. 직원분들이 친절해요. 싱가포르 여행 3일차에 택시에 폰을 두고 내렸는데 그 택시를타고 호텔 앞에서 내렸어요. 그래서 호텔로비직원분께 도움을 청했더니 직접 cctv돌려보시고 택시회사에 전화햐서 폰 찾아주셨습니다. david son 이라는 분이셨는데 여행의 은인.. 직원분들 정말 다 친절하고 잘해주세요! 4. 주변 접근성, 야경 최고 숙소에서 내려서 로버트슨키. 보트키. 클라키로 이어지는 강을 따라가면 야경이 환상적이에요. 꼭 이 숙소에서 묵게되면 강가따라 길을 걷고 분위기 좋은 펍에 들어가보세요! 단점을 굳이 찾자면 숙소가 조금 좁고 기차역이 멀다는건데 숙소는 크게 불편함을 느낄정도의 좁음은 아니에요 ㅎ 기차역은 멀지만 버스정거장이 도보 5분거리에 있습니다. 버스가 어렵다는 말들이 있는데 구글맵키고 버스 탄다음에 gps보면서 가면 훨씬 편합니다 ㅎㅎ 가격도 저렴하고요. 가성비 갑 호텔이라 추천드리고 싶네요. 그리고 가장 좋은점 ㅋㅋ 아무 택시타고 이 호텔이름 말하면 알아서 데려다 줄 만큼 유명한 호텔이라 택시이용시에도 편합니다. 그리고 서양인이 많아서 호텔분위기도 조용하다는 장점도 있네요. 가성비 싱가포르 호텔 (20만원 안) 중에 갈거면 무조건 여기 가세요. David son.. i

title: eхcellenт ѕervιce and ѕтaғғ. coмғorтaвle вed.
desc: мy вroтнer leғт нιѕ вag ιn one oғ oυr тoυrѕ, тнey oғғered тo reacн oυт тo тoυr groυp laтe aт nιgнт. ι loѕт ѕoмeтнιng aғтer ι cнecĸed oυт. тнey ιммedιaтely reтrιeved ιтeм ғor мe wιтнιn 2 нoυrѕ oғ callιng. wιll deғιnιтely raтe a 5 ғor goιng aвove and вeyond ғor мe and мy ғaмιly.

title: Nice loft hotel with super awesome restaurant
desc: We got free upgrade by booking directly from M Social. We got the loft hotel room with bed on the 2nd floor. I think it was a good choice as we had more space to move around on the first floor. The room was clean but we noticed the bar hand soap was expired. I feel that the squarish pillows were a bit too soft to my liking. We had dinner and lunch at the hotel restaurant, Beast & Butterflies. The food was amazing. All the dishes (chili crab with mantou, scallop capriccio, crispy pork knuckle, Chocoholic, etc.) we had were delicious. But the variety for buffet breakfast was quite limited. Nevertheless, we enjoyed our stay at Msocial. :)

title: M Social Singapore
desc: I had my stay there for a night and everything was excellent. The lady at the reception name Abir was very friendly to us and was very professional in what she’s doing. Everything was convenient. Kudos to her team and her!

title: Very nice hotel
desc: Earlier had booked a standard room, however the room is too small,not even had a space to open 2 luggage. (just like other hotel in Singapore) yet the room interior and garden is nice. My advice: OK for people with small luggage Hence, we upgraded with a bigger room with loft sgd 70. Loveeee this room very much. Just like staying in a small condo. This, we got to meet Aura, the robot that came all the way sending us a new room key at the same level. The breakfast is great too.. with the robot hand to fry the omellete or sunny side up

title: Recognition
desc: Very average in welcoming back the loyal customer that has stayed almost 40 times in the last two and half years. Some amenities have been reduced. Nobody acknowledged nor appreciated saying welcome back whilst checking in. The regular two welcome drinks were stopped since the last few trips. There wasn't also anymore welcome back card from General Manager that used to be placed in the room in the last four to five trips. That F&B team was pretty decent in their service is the only positive note to take away from the last trip. Having said that, there were always people queueing up for the fried egg counter and a single machine doesn't do sufficient Joe at the peak hour. Perhaps one more helping hand is needed. And the bed sheets were crumbled in the following days of the stay

title: Great service and setting
desc: The location was great and the room was clean and stylish. The service my friend and I received was top notch, we were able to leave our bags whilst we explored the city before catching our plane. The pool was super nice as well.

title: Very small suffocating rooms
desc: The rooms were pathetic and the feel and texture of the hotel was very gloomy and depressing. The breakfast was ok, but the room service was pathetic I asked for bottle of water and it was not sent and no body answered for that in the end.

title: Recommended
desc: The hotel, although having small rooms was very comfortable and clean. The pool was lovely. The location was great and we found it easy to get around. Checking in and out was seamless and staff friendly and helpful.

title: Perfect, comfortable bed ,love it
desc: Modern design hotel with reasonable price love it,will come again and recommend for my family and friends ,love the bed and bedsheets,small bathroom ,everything is good,strongly recommended, thank you msocial hotel

title: Very nice hotel
desc: I like the design, the pool, the small gym, the perfect location, the surrounding and the loft rooms. The service at reception could be a bit better, but I like the taxi iPad for ordering the cabs yourself at the reception.

title: very nice service.
desc: Davidson is a very nice person. Help us to be good in our trip. And to solve everything we need. Breakfast is very delicious and healthy. The room is very clean and quiet. You can walk byside the river.

title: Very Good
desc: Amazing hospitality and service by the hotel staff. They were very friendly, and helping in everything that we ask for. Will definitely come back to this hotel next time when I visit Singapore. Good job.

title: Such a funky hotel
desc: After some bad hotel experiences on our trip, M Social Singapore was so refreshing. Amazing service from the staff at check in, the room was clean and new looking too. Plenty of space for suitcases without encroaching too much. The rooftop pool was a nice break from the Singaporean heat, especially with the free ice water there as well. Pretty cool to have the robot, Aura, bring water too the room when requested too. The breakfast spread was quite alright. Another cool thing is to have the omelette robot make your eggs. There’s both western and Asian dishes available for breakfast. Will be back next time in Singapore and more than pleased to recommend to my clients also.

title: Business Trip
desc: Have been going to Singapore for over 15 years and spending more money in accommodation that I needed to. Found M Social and with the pricing and the facilities, you cant go wrong, Great location to Clarke Quay and surrounding areas. Very quiet and clean. Will stay again!

title: One night stay at M Social Singapore
desc: I stayed there only one night. Staffs are very friendly and helpful. Lobby is pretty modern and great design. Room is a bit small but probably that is Singapore standard. I will definitely stay there again next time. Thanks. Nyi Nyi

title: Great hotel with wonderful staff!
desc: Room although small was very clean with good amenities. Free Shuttle service very handy and staff went above and beyond to help us in many ways. Would definetely stay again but will choose larger room with patio. Thank you

title: Nice and Stylish Hotel in a good location
desc: Very nice staffs, stylish hotel, good breakfast and easy to get everywhere from there :-) If you have more luggage, book a bigger room/ studio. And definitely use AURA to get your room service delivered.

title: Singapore break
desc: Nice to stay in Singapore for 3 nights - great setting along the river. Very friendly & helpful staff. Easy to walk to many nice eateries and even right into the centre. Taking a shuttle ferry another option.

title: Value for money yet cozy and comfortable stay
desc: This hotel is comfy and has quite an interesting design. I love the cleanliness of the room. The bathrobe quality is superb and it is really so comfortable to wear. Breakfast was included in my booking and the food served was fresh as the restaurant manager informed us due to the recent CONVID-19, food is served based on 3 different selections. This arrangement put me and my friend at ease as food is not left in the open especially due this hyper-sensitive period when a sneeze or cough trigger dead stare from anyone around you. Special arrangement and attention to hygiene definitely won me over. This also reduced food contamination and wastage. You also can check out the restaurant using a robot arm to cook sunny side, scrambled egg or omelette. It amazes me. The

title: Awesome staycation with friends
desc: My friends and I had a awesome staycation. The hotel was clean and the staffs are friendly. Thank you to the counter staff- Davidson who was polite and friendly. Thank you to the mixologist Vlad who made delicious cocktails for us. We love the dishes at Beast and Butterflies! The Hokkien mee and Claypot rice are a must try.

title: clean room
desc: room was clean and spacious enough. the food at the restaurant was decent too. receptionist was nice and friendly. the only problem is it is too far from train station and the shopping district. Had to walk very long distance to get to central point to get grocery. the pool looks cool

title: What a Stay!
desc: In my 10 years in Asia, i dont think i have ever come across a lifestyle property like M Social. Yes the design is cool and trendy, but what sets the hotel apart was the hospitality of the whole team. Check in was flawless (love the integration on the screens), the room (alcove loft if im correct) was immaculate and very welcoming as user friendly. The robot bringing you the water and asking you to rate your stay is quirky and very engaging, that was fun! The restaurant serves fusion food, being very tasty, the pool table is fun to use at night, while overlooking Robertson Quay. We stayed for only 2 nights for a staycation and i would be back for sure! See you soon again team @msocial singapore!

title: Dirty, Unprofessional, Slipshot.
desc: First i must commend that the interior design looks quite pleasing to the eyes although i did not like that there isn't a sink in the toilet and you must exit the toilet then wash your hands (hygiene issues). Location is a bit further than expected but still manageable. have lots of nice eateries around the area. From the start it was not smooth. Wrong info was given from your frontdesk regarding parking. At check-in the receptionist rudely proclaimed that we are supposed to tap the screen and fill in our information in the non responsive check in screen. No assistance was given. Ironically the package is called "We Welcome, We Care, We Clean", upon checking in, as we settled in, we realise that the fridge was leaking brownish water and had stained the fridge. The outdoor

title: Outstanding Leisure Trip
desc: I recently stay in M Social Singapore for 3 nights during a personnal trip to Singapore. The hotel staffs were fantastic, really nice and helpful. The room was super confortable and well designed, the overall hotel cleanliness was very impressive. The breakfast a large selection and variety of food, more than i could try and taste. Last the restaurant food quality for diner simply superbe

title: Modern Hotel with nice decoration
desc: It was our short weekend getaway. Nice lobby decoration with helpful staffs. We picked a loft gallery room. It was cozy and perfect for couple. The location is very convenient with plenty bars and restaurants nearby. Walking distance to Fort Canning MRT. Actually, our ac room had trouble on last night and had to change room which was bit annoying. The hotel tried to compensate us by offering free drinks voucher and free breakfast on next day which was very good.

title: Great service - photos don't describe the rooms very accurately
desc: Hotel was overall good. Service was great. Room was super functional with a very cool design. Photos make the rooms look bigger than what they are in reality - which disappointed us. Had a great stay. Thanks!

title: Dishonest housekeeping.
desc: Dishonest housekeeping. Went there for a goodnight with my girlfriend, left my new charger by the tv and forgot to take after leaving the room for checkout, disappointing to hear that it is ‘not found’ I used it once since getting my new phone, so i am certain.

title: Good
desc: Good stay. I stayed in the Premier Loft. Room was clean with fanciful design, staff were friendly and helpful. Price was a bit on the high side but the loft experience was interesting for people who has never stayed in a loft hotel. Overall a good experience.

title: A Delightful Hip Spot in Singapore
desc: This was our first time in Singapore and I loved the M Social! It is a very modern and hip boutique hotel. The atrium room was small, but well equipped with everything we needed including a mini-fridge. The little outdoor seating off our room area was nice for reading and hanging out. The restaurant was great and we had some snacks when we first arrived, SPAM FRIES!!! The walkability from the hotel was excellent as is the proximity to many restaurants and bars. We were able to walk all over and easily call taxis for places that were too far. The infinity pool on the roof was a highlight and we made a point of mid-day swims as it was quite hot. Swimming at night was also great with the lit-up skyline. There was also a washer and dryer so that was a useful feature! A great

title: Clean, modern and well located hotel
desc: I stayed at M Social in February 2020 and was very happy with my stay. The hotel is spotless, modern and has very helpful and friendly staff. It is well located, around 5-8 mins walk from Fort Canning MRT station. There are many many bars and restaurants nearby (but no noise from them). The hotel has a decent pool and a small gym both of which I used, both were clean. The hotel is 10 mins walk from China Town, 20 mins walk from the main shopping on Orchard road, 20 walk from the harbour and 20 mins from Raffles Hotel. It is well located by a small river, great for waking, running down. They also provide a shower room after check out, so you can shower before late flights. Overall, highly recommended.

title: weekday stay
desc: check in & out was unique by using computer but still requires manpower to activate some details. there is no complimentary parking in this hotel unlike their other hotel under the same group which was a disappointment as the parking there is not cheap either, which was quite the inconvenience + a factor to consider for many of us who drives. do not expect free upgrade for any special occasion, only a "cheap dessert to select from the menu" for any birthday treat as quoted by their own manager at the restaurant. breakfast taste was not bad but choices are not plentiful, neither is many of their service, nobody comes around to ask for last round and they start to clear away even when I was standing right in front of the food, the cleaner standing beside me would take away the

title: Very noisy neighbours and inefficient staffs
desc: Stayed in a room next to some kids throwing parties, making a whole lot of noise. Called the receptionist, then was told there will be a follow up. Made at least 3 calls in total but no action was taken and noise continued until 1am. Had a terrible sleep and stay. Thanks a lot!

title: A relatively great stay!
desc: Stayed at the Loft Gallery, and it’s a small Mezzanine room but comfy enough for two pax. We got the one with the bed on the lower level, so the TV was upstairs alongside a couch which honestly wasn’t the most ideal an arrangement. Cleanliness wise is pretty much alright. Staff were all very friendly. Breakfast buffet spread not a lot of variety but fair enough for a boutique hotel. Location is not the best though (five bus stops away from Town) - the nearest bus stop is a 10mins walk away too.

title: Chic & Edgy Hotel!
desc: Been here twice and it was a pleasant stay! Loved the room with balcony & loft gallery - very minimalist yet sexy ambience. However, recent stay in Feb was disappointing for the room next to us was having a loud party that stretched till 2am. Called the front desk and was informed that a security would be up but made no diff. Maybe management could control the number of visitors allowed after a certain time.

title: Friendly staff, clean and comfortable room
desc: We enjoyed our stay at the M Social Hotel in Singapore. Room was small but clean and comfortable and we even had a terrace. The hotel is located in a nice part of town close to the river and with various bars and restaurants nearby. Only downside was that the room was a little dark for the wife when putting on her makeup but this really is only a very minor quibble! Other than that, we could not fault the place. Also worth mentioning that the hotel has a pool on the roof, which is lovely for a cooling dip after a day in a very hot Singapore...

title: Nice hotel.
desc: The hotel is nice, very quiet, the people whose work are very kind and helpful, have a delicious restaurant and a worderfull pool. The gym is not so big. The hotel is near from all the principal atractions of the City so you can walk or take a bus or take the subway to go whatever you want.

title: Simple and quaint
desc: Had a staycation here for my 21st birthday. Breakfast was included, with late check out. I booked the Alcove room which was, truthfully, small, but very cosy. Swimming pool was simple, no frills, enjoyed that they provided towels. Wished they provided more bathroom mats. Do note that the sink and mirror are in front of the bed. TV channel selection was decent. Breakfast was alright, no complaints here. Enjoyed the free charging at the buffet area, very helpful. Quiet and soundproof; the room gave us a peaceful night.

title: Better options in SG
desc: I stayed for two nights in a loft terrace room. The hotel is average and overpriced. I feel there are much better options in Singapore. - The check in process is via a touchscreen in the lobby. It doesn't work and there aren't enough staff to help. The queue for the front counter is not clearly marked either. - The room was tiny. The bottom step to go to the loft was almost touching the bed. I tripped on it in the night and cut my foot open on the sharp edge. - The bar is tacky. TV screens in the bar top? Are you trying to be a classy cocktail bar, or a Phuket sports bar. The beasts and butterflies branding is also pretty strange. - No food/drink service at the pool. You have to go all the way to the lobby to order and pick up food yourself. - Our room wasn't cleaned at

title: Review
desc: Great room, great service, nice breakfast. Though clarke quay is an ideal location, the hotel is not too conveniently located near mrt / bus / main road. Overall everything is still awesome though. Thanks.

title: Amazing stay in a quiet side street
desc: This hotel offers you an amazing location, close to many restaurants directly at the river. If you want you can take a stroll along the river, almost reaching up to Marina at the Bay and Gardens at the bay

title: Rooms Small Good Location
desc: Definitely for the younger generation who don't need much space. Missed cleaning our room twice in a 4 day stay. Had too ask for toilet paper twice. On a positive good location and breakfast not too bad.

title: A 3.5 to 4 rating
desc: Had request for towel swan and flower deco few days before check in date, officer reply was fast. Also request for early check in but subject to room available upon arrival. but after check in, was told that the room will only be ready 30 mins later, which i suppose it should have pre-prepare ahead as check out time is usually at 12pm. counter staff ring up house keeping when i approach again to ask if the room is done, but it says not yet. perhaps officer who had agreed on the deco could sound out to the house keeping dept to take note on such special request compare to the rest which doesn't. self was gotten "cut"by the sharp edge of the bed while moving down from the loft, perhaps this can make a little more better and safer.

title: Lovely and cosy
desc: My family and i arrived for our stay. The hotel is beautiful and clean, matched with a unique ambience. Topped with excellent service received by the front reception, exceptional service by Gretchen, who is initiative and friendly! An excellent personality that would surely make me recommend family and friends to stay over at m social!!

title: Nice Staycation
desc: Stayed for one night over the Valentine's Day weekend. The queue for check-in was long but more service staff were deployed promptly to deal with the crowd. Unfortunately, we experienced a disappointing situation in which a paid-for Valentine's Day enhancement (petal decorations on the bed) was not executed and this ruined a surprise. Service staff Davidson was apologetic and offered to have the arrangement made immediately, but we declined since it was no longer a surprise. He handled the situation well and proceeded to process our request for refund, and extended our checkout till 3pm. I would like to commend Davidson for his patience, professionalism and positive attitude in addressing the blunder. It was just a shame since a Millennium member could also request for late

title: Birthday Staycation!
desc: My husband and I have a staycation here for birthday celebration. Good room, good location, good restaurant. Enjoy my birthday treat at their restaurant - Beast and Butterflies Enjoy and relax staycation experience!

title: Good value
desc: Pleasant stay, good neighbourhood location, friendly staffs and good service Will stay back. Clean room Room a bit small but enough space for a solo traveler . Well designed and comfortable. Staffs’ helpful and informative.

title: Great experience
desc: Although the room is not big, but it sure is super comfortable and relaxing! The room is quiet and has everything we needed. We had a very nice experience staying at M Social and would definitely come back again.

title: Nice & Chic Room but small and slow service
desc: Stayed in Premier Loft Room that was nice, clean & chic but it is small and lack of view. Service was slow. Called service desk but took a long time to pick up the call. Not sure why. Room service robot didn't work because it never came with the items which we requested. No complementary parking.

title: Look Spacious but Small Room
desc: The room ceiling is really tall m, with a full wide windows looking out; but walking space are narrow even the bathroom. You could connect your device to their TV through screen mirroring. You hardly hear the air-conditioning sound even you set it to the highest. At night the room is dark enough even with your window curtain open. The things I would complain would be some of the socket covers already loosen. I’m not sure why they design the rain shower like this, but apparently you can’t open the water tap after you apply the shower gel on your hand. The tap was so slippery and you need effort trying to open the tap back. There’s not additional way to clean your hand before opening the tap.

title: Great design, clean room
desc: Had a staycation at M Social. We stayed in the room with the outdoor patio. Plenty of areas within the room to sit and relax - though perhaps one issue I had with the room was that there wasn't a desk from which to do my work. Breakfast at Beast and Butterflies was delicious. My son really enjoyed watching the automated egg cooking machine.

title: Cozy and Stylish Stay
desc: We had a very cozy and comfortable stay. We absolutely loved the location as there were many wonderful restaurants, bakeries, breakfast nooks nearby as well as bars. It is also located by the river which is very enjoyable to walk along during the afternoon. Room was clean and stylish. A loft room style that created a cozy feeling. Staff were all very accommodating and the breakfast was nice. I would say, the only downside was that there was no room service. Food needed to be picked up by the guests at their resident restaurant which seems which doesn't fulfil the concept of room service. Another room for improvement is the day beds up at the pool, seem very old. Could use a change and TV Channels could be updated. Some channels did not even work. Despite all these minor

title: Cozy and stylish room, great location and 5star service! ⭐️
desc: Checked in at this cool and stylish boutique hotel this month for a staycation as i cancelled my trip overseas. I booked the loft terrace with balcony which is perfect! The room has a good space and a balcony to catch some fresh air without going out of your room. And yes, it is sparkling clean! Was assisted by their frontline staff Geraldine upon check in and it was quick and smooth, and she’s friendly. Went to the bar later in the afternoon for some cocktails and played billiards. A staff named Armando served us. He is super friendly and very accommodating, he recommended places to visit within the vicinity and good places to eat or hang out. He is very fun to talk to and his smile is contagious. You can see his passion and enthusiasm on his work; definitely one of the very

title: Great hotel
desc: The staff is very willing to help, and the facilities are very new. Enjoyed the stay there. I also like to design of the hotel cause it's very modern. It is also located at a very convenience location in the city

title: Disappointing
desc: Slow check-in. Staff tried to guide us through self check-in, tried super long but didn't work. Had to do manual check-in in the end. Room looked old, walls looked dirty. Minimal interaction and service from staff. Definitely not the place if you are looking for some good service to brighten up your stay. Tried to ask for a vase or container for my wedding bouquet, quickly rejected, staff didn't even try a bit harder to help (asked us to try asking the restaurant). TV on second level (but bed on first level) in gallery loft didn't really make sense. Pretty design but not practical.

title: Unfortunately Cancelled Booking
desc: Due to the COVID-19 situation, we had to cancel this booking, however M Social totally refunded the amount with very little fuss (compared to another Singapore Hotel also booked). I would definitely book with them again for future trips.

title: Cramped and Unpleasant
desc: There was a terrible odour coming from the mat below the mattress. The space was cramped - different from what was shown in the pictures. The shuttle service only catered for morning and afternoon travels ( in 1 hour intervals) which was highly inconvenient given that the hotel's location is fairly inaccessible and it was at least a 15 mins walk to the nearest MRT.

title: Loved our staycay!
desc: Had a great Anniversary celebration at M Social, room's brilliant, bed's great, pool's decent and food/drink deals are amazing! :) Shout our to Nuri from reception, she was always cheerful and always willing to help with something. Great team at M Social and great loft! Love em, and we will be back!

title: Nice get-away
desc: Nice room! Enjoyed the loft experience. We got upgraded to the Loft Terrace but don’t take that. You won’t have a view and the Terrace is dirty to enjoy a night outside. Overall, nice place. Would love to do it again.

title: AWFUL
desc: - Check in had about 20 groups in line, we waited for 45 minutes till it was our turn. Half of the time we were waiting outdoors. - Service staff (lady) manning the check-in queue was great and friendly. She made sure that all our temperatures have been checked, that we were comfortable and well-hydrated despite queueing outdoors. But I’m afraid the good stops there. After 45 minutes, it was finally our turn. Imagine how we felt at this point. The check-in staff took 5 minutes typing away and did not say a word. We were then told that the room we booked (Loft Gallery, with stairs) is NOT AVAILABLE. The reason given was that I booked TOO LAST MINUTE (1 week prior) and “there are too many online booking systems, and there was a problem with our system that led to the

title: Service
desc: Doesn't have basic service. Have to go borrow the wine glasses and wine opener from the restaurant below. Was suppose to have a free upgrade of rooms and looking forward to you but hotel is unable to do it. Won't have booked this hotel if there wasn't free upgrade of rooms provided. Hotel does not deliver its promises

title: Wedding anniversary
desc: Everything was nice and cool. Just that our room had a few lights blown and they failed to execute the floral arrangements that I had ordered prior to my arrival. They gave us a cake for a substitute but I guess it’s fine haha

title: First Staycation experience! :)
desc: Love the room. We got the alcove terrace room. It was sleek yet cosy and very clean. Some may find the toilet a little cramp but I am good with it. Appreciated the little “balcony” space to read and chill in the morning. (Be ready tho, for possibility of close “next door neighbours” We had company for 5 min before the guest next door decides to return to her room) I really like the vibe of the hotel, the cleanliness, friendly staffs. Breakfast is quite decent and seatings (@ Beass and Butterflies) are very comfortable (we had a real late bfast tho) Some improvements would be- Swimming Pool could be better maintained and stricter enforcement by staff on no-smoking on the pool premise. Also, check the updated shuttle bus schedule at the entrance of the hotel. They have not

title: Weekend Staycation
desc: My husband and I had a really pleasant and lovely stay for the second time at this hotel. We managed to get an upgrade and a high level floor as we were celebrating our 1st year anniversary. The staff were absolutely helpful and friendly especially NURI at check in. The food at Beast & Butterflies restaurant is really good too and I had a fun time using the robot that cooked the eggs in the morning for breakfast. Will definitely recommend this place to my family and friends to stay at.

title: Unhygienic room, really could use more effort.
desc: So i actually stayed here a few years back and everything was great then. Rooms were new and staff were competent. But this time it was a different story. When we checked in, my friend and I found a torn part of a wrapper (bright blue) that looked like part of a condom wrapper. Surfaces were dusty in the room as well and we even had to do some cleaning of our own. Cleaning staff were unphased by the condom wrapper and didn't make any effort to sanitise the place other than just picking it up. And during a time like this when the coronavirus situation is escalating, the hotel did not make much effort to ensure that rooms are properly cleaned and ready for occupancy. The whole stay was so disappointing, perhaps even disgusting.

title: 3D2N Loft Premier
desc: Service of the hotel is disappointing. The people were kind and friendly but the service pulling their rating down. The television could not connect to phone's Netflix due to an unknown. Hence we called up the reception for help. Technician was kind and friendly. However, he could not solve the problem and snapped a photo of the error, saying that he would follow up with this on the next day. However, nobody followed up through the rest of the stay. On the second morning, we requested for 2 additional pillows (large) at the reception. The receptionist told us that the pillows would be sent to our room and we acknowledged. Again, nobody followed up with our request. So we made a call from our room to remind them of our request of 2 additional pillows (large). Upon arriving back

title: Lovely 7-day stay in the Loft Gallery room
desc: I had a really enjoyable stay in the loft gallery room - Would like to thank Darshan, the duty managers and the staff for the great service! The loft room was nice and well equipped with everything I needed. The staff were kind and friendly, and brought additional items that I required, and all my food deliveries very promptly. Only downside was that the WIFI could have been a bit faster; I had poor connections when doing video calls, but for normal surfing it was fine. I also had to cut short my stay from the initial 14-day booking, but they were flexible about it and allowed me to change at short notice. Would love to be back here again for a staycation!

title: Amazing Staycation! Thank you Geraldine!
desc: We stayed at this wonderful hotel on the 28 March and was greeted by Geraldine. She was very helpful and attentive to all our requests. My boyfriend and i appreciate the complimentary late check out extended. She is a gem of the hotel! Thanks M Social and thank you Geraldine!

title: Great stay!
desc: We had a wonderful stay at the M Social Singapore during our honeymoon. Staff was friendly and helpful, and the price was great for the area. The room was on the small side but beautifully furnished and exceptionally clean. We'd absolutely stay again!

title: Great location
desc: Small alcove room but really inexpensive compared to other hotels in the area with similar amenities. Great pool. Clean rooms. Friendly staff. Def caters to a younger crowd but we were there during COVID so def not very busy. A short walk to Killiney Rd for breakfast and Orchard Rd for window shopping. Along the riverfront walk which was just great to get to and from other areas. Near public buses although the Grab app is a must in Singapore. The robot that makes omelettes was neat but sneak in and grab a pic instead of paying so much for breakfast at the hotel.

title: Fab hotel
desc: Lovely modern hotel great food,and service will recommend to family and friends one of the best in Singapore ,and the price is very competitive, compared with hotels in the same location. Fab place to stay

title: Birthday staycation
desc: Would like to thank the amazing staff at the restaurant for being so kind and warm, it made my birthday special to have them there, from helping me with breakfast and then preparing a lovely sweet treat. Thank you so much

title: Not as good as expected
desc: Hotel room was very small and hard to even walk around - had to squeeze in between the bed and table are. Bed was definitely not a king size. Sofa at the balcony/terrace area was extremely dirty. Would not come back again.

title: Clean Room with Modern Vibes
desc: Thankful for an early check-in as the room was ready for me. Check-in process was pretty quick but I think that the level of customer service can be a little better? Staff can be a little friendlier actually, especially when I called the front desk for housekeeping, I felt that the attitude was a little cold? Room was overall clean but my main gripe about the room was that 3 of my sockets were spoilt (the plastic protections were coming off the wall) and that doesn’t feel (electrically) safe for any guest I would think. Told one of the ladies at the front desk when I checked out and nothing much was done to assure me except an apology and that “we will check it out”. Other than that, it was an overall good stay.

title: Stayca at M Social
desc: We loved the unique design of our room! The highlight was the loft bed and the super high ceiling. The Nespresso machine was also a nice touch. And the bathroom was nicely designed, albeit a little cramped. The only downside was having to wait for more than an hour for our room even though we checked in around 3.30 pm (check-in time is 2 pm). But the management did try to make up for it by giving us free drinks at the hotel restaurant to make the waiting time go by faster.

title: Was a pleasant short staycay
desc: The room was beautiful and close to the river. However, it is quite far to MRTs. But there are many convenient stores nearby. Would recommend to wear shoes/in house slippers in the room as the floor is abit sticky!

title: Amazing stay
desc: I have no words for this property! Yes it may be quite a walk to the subway, but it is beside some lovely and amazing restaurants and views! The hotel restaurant itself is also frequented by many locals. Will definitely return to this hotel! Rooms are clean and always stocked. Bed was very comfy too. Please extend my appreciation to Geraldine from front desk who has made our stay the best. The pool area was fun for a quick lap. I will definitely get M social on my next return to SG!

title: Value and convenient for one night stay
desc: Good location and could walk easily along river from Robertson to Clarke Quay. Reception and welcome excellent and they had room ready so we were able to check in early. Bedroom was fine, clean and had toiletries, slippers etc. The Air Conditioning could have worked a bit better though. Did visit Pool Area however crowded and no space so did not swim as planned. Modern hotel and ideal for one night but have stayed in better places in Singapore for service, breakfast and character

title: Amazing Hotel
desc: I stayed there with my family, and I loved it ! Ideally located by the quay, beautiful design and perfect service. The rooms are so cosy and comfy, and the room service is made by a robot, so amazing !! Absolutely recommend it

title: Great hotel !
desc: We just spent a few days in M social. We had a loft gallery room and it was just perfect. The room (as the hotel) was well designed and very clean. We loved the Robot, i think his name was Aura, delivering amenities to our room :) The restaurant terrace was the best spot to have a glass of wine @ Robertson Quay. Hotel Staff was very nice & helpful. We’ll definitely come back to M Social!

title: Amazing experience
desc: We have spent an amazing moment with my partner and the service and cleanliness we impeccable. The food as well and sitting at the terrace was very enjoyable. Staff is very professional and the check in was very gast. Definitely recommended

title: Beautiful and Super Functional
desc: Loved the experience at the M social, feom the check in, to the breafasts, to the stunning room design and cleanliness, pool, and staff. Great location in singapore with super nice bar and restaurant. Definitzmy recommended
