title: Excellent all the way
desc: Excellent location by the river with lot of restaurants around the hotel is at prime location. The hotel has an excellent restaurant worth checking. The hotel is very design you even get amenities delivered by a robot!!! great room spacious and clean, great bed. The staff was very friendly. I'll most surely will visit again 😊

title: Brilliant
desc: Absolutely amazing studio lots styled hotel really near Clarke quay! Room service was done by a robot! Really cool! Assistant manager Gretchen was really helpful! We even decided to extend our stay twice! Highly recommended!

title: Good location, clean rooms, modern facilities, great staff
desc: Overall a very good stay. The hotel is very well maintained, clean and has all the amenities you’d expect. The staff is friendly and helpful. As mentioned in other reviews, the “Alcove” rooms aren’t sized too big - however, we did not find that to be an issue, as we did not spend too much time in the room itself besides when sleeping. If you’re planning to spend more time in your room, consider going to for the larger room category.

title: Clean and convenient
desc: A 15 minute walk to Clarke Quay MRT. Room is small as expected with not much room and the single beds are smaller than an average single bed with square pillows. Would recommend for short stays if you don't mind smaller beds. There was daily housekeeping and bottled water for guests. Overall the room and bathroom was clean.

title: Lunch at Beast and Butterfly
desc: The venue and food is great, coupled by the fantastic service rendered by Armando!!! Cheers to the wonderful service 😉 Do try out the local food here. Claypot rice, chicken curry and the laksa here are worth having.

title: M social
desc: One of the Best hotels I’ve stayed in Singapore. The service of the hotel staff is better than any of the five star hotels around. The room is not too big though but given the price, it’s exceptional. We will definitely be visiting M Social again and it’s gonna be the only place where we gonna be in. Thank you all in M Social and keep in up. MJ

title: Not coming back
desc: One of the worst experience ever. Small rooms and no bath towels provided (which i didnt bother to ask). Strange room layout with wash basin in the room instead of in the toilet. One of hotel staff actually opened our room door and walked in while we were in our room!! To top it off, for the 1st time, guests had to pay for parking - for locals, avoid. So not coming back anymore.

title: Very minimal perks
desc: I would say the hotel is good for 1 pax. The room is quite small. Like your bed is facing the sink and mirror itself. Room is clean with nice pillow and bed sheet along with basic amenities. No free parking in the hotel. Is something I don't understand. I paid 17$ for a night stay. Like which hotel don't offer free parking? Breakfast wasnt worth it too the only 3 protein was ham bacon n sausage, u get toast, eggs and salad. For about 25 I would say there are better options around.

title: Alcove Terrace Room
desc: Amazing room and cleanliness. Nice outdoor balcony to chill and smoke too. Convenient to travel around town either by grab or public transport. Overall great stay and amazing staff! 👍🏻👍🏻 Book it guys !

title: M Social, GREAT Experience 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
desc: One word, Superb!! It was a very beautiful experience. The experience is compared to any five start hotels. The service staff, the front desk were very friendly. The check in and check out experience was so pleasant. We are definitely going back that again.

title: Awesome location, great design
desc: Location is just great - right in Robertson quay with all of the great cafe and restaurants all around Hotel is stylish, rooms are petite but well designed- linen is good quality and there is everything you need Check in with the screen is too complicated especially with extra virus checks. Apart from this everything works well

title: Poor service - online and at hotel
desc: Have given review via website. Have yet to receive response. Probably never will. Did not deliver as promised. Shabby check in. Staff unsure of room entitlements, and didn't seem keen to help resolve. Thanks, but a real disappointment and spoiler to our staycay.

title: Nice modern hotel
desc: Nice modern cosy hotel at perfect location with great prices. Decent basic breakfast, room a bit small but clean and modern bathroom with comfy beds. Friendly and helpful staff. Lovely pool with nice views over Robertson Quay.

title: Checkin in
desc: Overall stay was good. Hotel room is clean and nice. Using hi tech equipments but checking in was delayed by an hour. Arrive at 2.30pm and room was ready at 3.30pm. I was with a 5 year old month baby and by i was hoping to get a room to feed my baby comfortably. But instead me and my wife had to feed my baby at the seats outside the hotel with no aircon. No seats available around the checking in lobby.

title: Lifestyle Hotel Along Robertson Quay, Downtown Singapore
desc: Located by the river along Robertson Quay, M Social Singapore is a vibrant lifestyle design hotel, created by renowned French creator Philippe Starck. With a total of 293 rooms, the hotel thrives on an interplay of friendship, community, and new experiences. It was built with the millennial mindset by giving the best while being affordable to the mass. We had a staycation at this property and here’s our review of the hotel. The check-in process was quite a unique experience as there are self-help counters that you can check-in on your own, without the need for assistance from the staff. The rooms are conceived to offer a comfortable and timeless elegance to the modern and avant-garde millennium tribe. Warm colour tones, luxurious pashmina throws, and thick carpets, ensconced

title: Like an art piece – beauty is subjective
desc: With the recent restrictions to traveling anywhere (like majority of the world’s population – my travel plans were in disarray), staycations are our next best bet. And the industry knows it too, based on scores of advertisements and promotions, you find hotels in your own city you never knew existed. Spoilt for choice, I was lured in by M Social Hotel’s selling points – “a lifestyle boutique hotel… captures the spirit of adventure behind every stay.” And it delivered… in the beginning. The hotel is located in a quaint section of the ‘atas’ Robertson Quay and its unassuming exterior hides its chic and artsy interior. Stepping into the lobby, it reminds me a lot of W Hotel – chic, artsy and very European. You can self-check in (and it is rather easy) and even if you face

title: Room was not ready on time
desc: Reached hotel at 2:30pm but have to wait for the room till 4pm because it was not ready. Really pissed because my 5 kids was restless waiting for so long. The room space and pool was ok. Kids enjoys it. But the room got a little bit of bad smell when we enter in. They should give the complimentary carpark for guest. The carpark is so expensive.

title: good value hotel
desc: 1. Location: there are a lot of eateries nearby, but not very close to mrt. However, it's good to chill and relax. 2. Room: It was smaller than I thought it would be but very clean. 3. Service: The staff was friendly but it takes too long time to check it..

title: Nice place, but bad service staff
desc: It was a nice and simple place, and a reasonable price. But the staff on duty at front counter are n the evening of 5th March, around 855pm had terrible attitude. I had asked if they (she) had a lighter I could borrow as I wanted to celebrate a birthday with a small cake. She however did not even bother looking at me and just told me "no" with a tone as if why am I even asking her.

title: Excellent value and wonderful stay !
desc: This hotel was excellent. Everything. The hotel, the staff, the room, the breakfast - everything was superb. The staff was helpful, very welcoming and professional. Room was very clean and the bed was really comfy. Was a perfect place for a couples weekend away, thank you ! We would stay again !

title: Stayed from April to July
desc: Thanks to Lionel from MSocial for an awesome customer service. An exemplary staff all hotels should have. Helped with my accommodation and a great communicater and also friendly person. Thanks very much...

title: Room was very nice clean and comfortable
desc: Staffs was extremely friendly overall I enjoyed my stay .Food and service was good too .The atmosphere is so special that it really felt like home to me. All respect for the manager Darshan and Geraldine who does a great job here; a true sample of excellent hospitality!

title: Proposal staycation
desc: Brought forward my booking because of the COVID-19 outbreak and the staff were really responsive and accommodating despite the short notice. Special mention to the staff William and Angel for ensuring everything was perfect from the onset. I had checked in earlier to set up and decorate the place and Angel suggested that she staged a fake check in again in the evening when I went with my gf so she wouldn’t suspect a thing. All in all, a memorable stay. My first time staying here and I’d definitely pick this place again for sure.

title: Very good hotel
desc: hotel location very good, two-level rooms, daily cleaning, swimming pool and gym for body regeneration after an eventful day. very good hotel service, various food in the restaurant also. Hotel recommendable.

title: Amazing rooms!!
desc: It is a great place to stay! The rooms were very well furnished with modern yet minimalist decor. Furthermore, housekeeping for small items such as towels and water is done by a robot which was a surprise for us! Definitely one of my most memorable stays!

title: Room was awesome but staffs service can be improved.
desc: Room was awesome, however staffs service can be improved. The caucasian girl working at the reception was nice & helpful. Other staffs were quite unfriendly when we dialed the front desk from our room for assistance.

title: Would come back to stay :).
desc: Had a short staycation at M Social, was originally supposed to stay at M Studio. The room was clean, nice done up and I enjoyed my stay even though it was short lived due to the virus. I would definitely come back.

title: Dark, dirty and hot
desc: Not a recommended, the hotel room is small, roon air conditioning are not working, mmfeedback given, no action taken for first 2 days, given reminder several times. Respond is slow, was told have been rectified, the temperature still warm. Walkway very dark, dirty and so terrible. The sink in the room was not design properly, difficult to clean those stagnant water in the sink. Bacterial can be grown easily.

title: Good, cooperative staff
desc: Rooms are very small, iron & board to be kept. After requesting iron board kept, was very old difficult to iron. Elsewise very good staff, cooperative, food & room service very good. My room getting direct sunlight.

title: Best service at Beast & Butterflies
desc: Earlier today, we had lunch at Beast & Butterflies. Food was great and service was exceptional. Special thanks to Armando, who was our waiter. He was attentive, fast and friendly. He made sure that we had a great dining experience. Awesome service! Thank you!

title: Home stay notice
desc: Overall is good and room facilities + services also good and no issues.keep it up with a good job. environment friendly user such as,in house internet wi-fi is strong , TV channel and movies are good that all.

title: A stay to Remember
desc: I traveled to different parts of the world but my stay in Singapore really stood out. The friendly staff at the front desk made me feel so welcome. The room is impeccable and spotless. I love that the room was thoroughly cleaned and really reflected the high standards of the hotel. I met one of the managers in the Room, Alvin and he was very professional. He was very helpful. The rest of the team are all amazing. I look forward to go back there, my favorite home in Singapore.

title: Awesome hospitality
desc: My mom had a two weeks stay and the team were extremely patient and helpful with all her requests, even when she had one too many requests. Definitely recommended for it’s great hospitality and Arty interior. :)

title: Wonderful
desc: We have decided to return for a staycation like all Singaporeans this weekend. The staff made our stay that much sweeter. The rooms are decently sized, cleanliness was great and the attention to our anniversary was an unforgettable one. The restaurant service was a little slow and the new menu could have been better. We will nevertheless return next time but may look at other dining options. Thank you Darshan, Maria and Geraldine! Never fail to impress us always!!

title: Overhype under perform
desc: I guess is an ok location but overpriced. Compared to Yotel, i believed it offers better design, better cleanliness and good location. M Social is horrible when comes to bathroom design, bed comfort and the garden terrace is horrible. Whats the point of having one and you can use them ? Such a waste on GFA.

title: Best Staycation Ever
desc: Although there was a lot of protocol to follow on arrival, but it was all in our best interest. Salute the front liner of the hotel who will still cheerful and friendly despite facing a large group of staycationers like us. The Indian manager met us on arrival and arranged us a beautiful room facing the swimming pool. We also like the young lady named Wen on arrival. Cant wait for another staycation. See you guys.

title: Cosy room but great service
desc: Room was a bit small but clean. Bed and pillows were comfortable. Location is great, lots of cafes and restaurants nearby. Service was great and staff were really friendly. Lots of measures in place due to covid so no worries about health and safety. We had a good stay!

title: Excellent Stay, Service is superb.
desc: We had our Staycation for our daughter birthday celebration. The pool is just nice with kids friendly, location is convenient which is serounded by all the eateries. Room is clean, especially for the loft room that come with extra space. We truly enjoyed the facilities. Thank you M Social and we will visit again soon.

title: Very pleasant stay
desc: Staff was very welcoming and provided the best customer service experience I've had in a long time. The room was very clean and sanitized so I felt very comfortable during these rough times. Looking forward to returning and staying again.

title: Compliment of excellent service
desc: It has been an overdue vacation that our family has been longing for. The room is cleaned and pleasant. The staffs are very friendly, and I like to specially mention one of your Housekeeping staff, Alvin, that work with a lot of passion and comes with positive attitude, great smile and a very good customer service. It is something which the hospitality industry is missing out and yet we found it here. Good job Alvin and team! We will definitely be back to the hotel again in the near future.

title: Great staycation at M Social Singapore
desc: I had a pleasant stay at M Social Singapore. I arrived at 12 noon and was allowed for early check-in. The loft was neat and tidy. Design of the room was great. It was raining throughout the day and the hotel staff loaned us unbrellas so we could go have lunch and dinner at the nearby bars, cafes and restaurants. Overall, I had a pleasant stay and will return in future.

title: Staycation while home under renovation
desc: One turn off to local guests is the lack of parking in the hotel premises because the carpark ownership belongs to another property of the same residence. My recommendation is park alongside of those URA designated parking spaces which is more economical. The rest of the staying experienced, Fabulous to the max! Trust me, if you’re a tourist in Singapore you are going to find plenty of food and beverage choices ranging from drinking pubs to coffee lovers, Asian cuisine to western menu all at one location, Clark Quay which is not too far away. MRT (local train station) may not be nearby however the breezy walk along the famous Singapore River is a bonus to this hotel which allows you to stroll to most of the tourist locations such as the iconic merlion fountain statue and the

title: Overall good
desc: The room is really nice and clean, but we try to extend another day but was not able to due to full house and also not able to extend for late checkout. Over the hotel was good staff was friendly and place was clean and spacious

title: Staycation
desc: My wife and I really enjoyed our short staycation at this hotel. The staffs attentive and service was great. The rooms were clean and comfortable. Though the buffet breakfast were not served due to the Covid-19, everything else the hotel offered was a wonderful experience for us. The hotel is situated right were many eateries and restaurants are along the riverfront were most of the activities happens. Yes, would definitely comeback again to stay!

title: Nice area for a break
desc: I booked a stay at M Social under the promotion for healthcare workers. The total cost was higher than what was reported in the newspaper, but still reasonable. The room with a loft was comfortable, and the hotel is located in a nice quiet area by the river with plenty of eateries (I didn't want to be too close to town). Breakfast was a la carte buffet - not a huge selection, but food was decent and made for a good brunch.

title: A getaway
desc: We love the hotel ambience. It sort of gave us the chill and relaxing feeling. The services were great, the staff were very helpful. Cleanliness of the hotel and the room is 👍🏼. The toilet was rather too small. Yet, everything is just great. I would come back for another staycation.

title: Couple Staycation
desc: Hotel location was good, walking distance to clark quay. many food and drinks around the corner. room was good. pillows and bed is comfy. but the toilet door is hard and heavy. unfortunately, there is no free parking.

title: Good Stay @ M Social
desc: Overall positive experience despite the hotel undergoing some maintenance works such as the lift. Would have been better if we were advise if there was or wasn't turn-down / house keeping services available. If not available, perhaps more water in each room would have been better.

title: Awesome stay in cosy and lofty room
desc: Had a great staycay in M Social Premium Loft! It was both my partner and my birthday’s birthday and the staff and the lovely well designed room really made the experience memorable :) would recommend premium loft to my friends

title: Stayed for a staycation
desc: This is the second time that we've been with this hotel. The first one was a few years back when they just launched & we had good impressions then. This stay was ok, nothing spectacular but they did miss out our bath towels & there was a tick on the floor however, they assured it was safe to stay in the room (I sure hope so). The next room patrons were really noisy too as they had like a "gathering" till 4am but can't fault the hotel for these patrons.

title: 1 night staycation
desc: The hotel is not really easily accessible via public transport, but there are a few motorcycle parking lots outside the hotel. Limited car parking slots outside but there's a carpark beside the hotel. Loved the hotel ambience! Sorry I didn't get your name but the Filipino front desk staff was very helpful as she helped us to check-in despite having the self check-in machine for guests to use ourselves. Stayed in the Alcove Cosy room on Level 3. As expected, the room was small, but cosy and perfect for 2 people. The high ceilings make it look kinda spacious. Having the sink in front of the bed was weird, but the lighting is really good. The double bed seemed smaller than usual queen size but it's fine as the pillows are super comfortable. First time here but definitely

title: Great place for a short staycation!
desc: The staff were really friendly and the place was great. Very worth with the buffet and mixology class! The location was good too as there were lots of places to eat and walk about. All in all a great experience and worth it!

title: M social review
desc: M social singapore is better than what i have expected. Hotel is clean with excellent services, especially Mr Armando from the cafe. He had a splendid service and is very welcoming. He totally made me and my husband felt that we were having a holiday in our own country during this covid period. His energy lifted the spirit there and especially, he made the creamiest coffee brew ive ever tasted.

title: Disappointed
desc: Had a night stay and although check in was pretty smooth, i was utterly disappointed at my check out timing. Ive booked the hotel stating that the check out timing to be at 12pm but was notified by the frontdesk that mine would be 11am due to the covid situation and cleaning has to be done to prepare for the next guests. This is totally unacceptable and worse still, it was suppose to my anniversary with my partner and im ok that no late check out was given, but a short change of an hour? Thats just not professional and although the breakfast made up for it, i wont be returning.

title: For the price I paid which was over $350, really not a good deal
desc: there are good things, I like the staff and the high ceilings of the room, the room was small, but still within expectations. the major problem, no room service........so no food, no ice, no wine glasses, no wine or bottle opener! They tell you that you have to go and get it yourself at beast and butterflies, which you have to get out of the hotel to get to. This was really unexpected as I can expect that of a 3 star hotel and if I am paying $100 plus, but this is really an unpleasant surprise as I booked their most expensive room, the loft terrace. They told me that this was in force since before covid, so can't even blame it on covid. better off staying at home k, for a staycation, you are really expecting service and you pay a price for that, but this really does not make

title: Short staycation at M Social
desc: Alcove room for $132 SGD prepaid on Agoda. Fairly bureaucratic checkin process with an extensive online declaration required, but fortunately not too many other people checking in at around 4:30pm. 19sqm room with tiny bathroom (rain shower but no bath). Queen size bed only (quite small for 2 people). Very high ceilings. Room in good condition (quite new) and quiet: only minor noise from doors in corridor slamming. Friendly and helpful staff. No spoons provided. 2 small bottles of water provided free. Small amenities pack (1 mask & hand sanitiser provided): no 2nd mask though. Very good location near river. Free wifi worked well for Netflix. Small lap pool on level 5. Late checkout to 1pm permitted.

title: Beast & Butterflies Great guy
desc: My friend and i went in the morning to get drinks and this awesome man assisted us with his most extravagant service! very friendly and gave us great drinks too! Thank you for starting our day with this gesture! You are such an awesome person!

title: My visit to Beast and Butterflies
desc: Came to the restaurant at M social my friend and I on the 30 August 2020 to redeem the free drink given by the hotel. The server, Armando, was really friendly and awesome. The service was really good.

title: TV keeps restarting on its own
desc: The room is clean, the hotel is centrally located, the staff members were friendly. My only gripe is that the TV that I used to mirror my Netflix kept restarting on its own. That and the nearest MRT/bus stop is a good distance away.

title: Lackluster service, did not adhere to email confirmation
desc: Booked a 2 nights stay directly from their website under their “ we clean we care we welcome staycation “ package before they amended their T&Cs stating that the 24 hour stay benefit is subjected to availability. Even wrote in a few days before check-in to confirm my check in and check out time and was told that it will be indeed a 24 hours stay. Arrived at the hotel and was told to check out at 12pm. Staff was not very friendly, and repeatedly told me that they changed their policy on the 24-hour stay before I checked in. Told them I had an email with their reservations team and they told me to show it to them. Told me they will escalate this to their manager and will let me know the next morning. Next evening came and there was still no news. Had to contact them again and

title: Staycation
desc: Could have put a slightly bigger and brighter light at the balcony. Balcony chairs have to change cause when it rains, sofa get wets and takes a couple of days for it to really dry. Other than that, all is good.

title: Check-in process was a disappointment
desc: My stay in M Social was definitely destroyed by the disappointing check-in process. Prior to my stay, I had personally e mailed to clarify a need for scheduling my check-in to which M Social said was unnecessary. In the current climate, most local hotels are staggering check-ins due to increased sanitation standards and segregation of teams which may delay or lengthen check-in procedures. M Social painted a picture that the check-in time of 2pm was the norm and arrival anytime after that would allow a swift check-in. On my arrival at 2pm, i saw 5 groups queueing to check-in. I decided to let the crowd settle and returned an hour later at 3pm. I was told there was still no-prepared room, that I would need to wait 30 minutes as another couple was already waiting ahead of me for a

title: Great Staycation!
desc: Great Staycation at M Social Hotel. The team was very professional and with lots of nice attentions. The room was very nice and very clean! Thank you M Social Team and special thanks to the GM who took care of us.

title: StayCation
desc: Dislike: The place is too compact Like: Customer Service All friendly Theme of the Hotel Nice and good for photoshoot Room Too compact, and only fit around 5 pax depend if more then that too sqeeze.. Facilities Normal Breakfast Normal, but during my visit the Nasi lemak was hard and other then that all fine.

title: Compliment
desc: I’m writing this review to compliment 1 of your staff by the name of Mr Alwin Bamba from housekeeping department because he is really helpful and friendly during our stay. Please convey our appreciation to him and thank you.

title: Short Staycation
desc: The room still have slight smoke smell even though we booked a non-smoking room. Feedback to the hotel and it was settled within an hour. Overall it was a good and pleasant experience. Check in and check out was fast too.

title: Imperial Professionalism
desc: Was having a staycation there. So on the morning of 19 August at about 4am we decided to call it a "night". i was the M Social roundabout, all my friends have left, so i took out my phone to book a private hire. I was in utter anxiety and stress because my phone decided to "die" on me there and then. clueless, i decided, lets just ask the hotel staff if they can get me a cab. so upon my approach to the lobby, i was greeted by a staff, i believe her name is YASMIN, probably the duty manager that night, asked me how was the night and if everything was alright. told her my phone died and without hesitant, she dialled in a cab for me. imagine what would happened to me if she wasnt there - stranded, lost, but because of her swift response, i managed to get home safely that night.

title: Cosy staycation with exceptional services and hair products :)
desc: Upon check-in, Davidson was warm and welcoming, which was a fine addition to the cosy ambience at the hotel lobby. He had also proven to be knowledgeable about the hidden gems in the nearby vicinity and even went the extra mile to help research my preferred Japanese food. Furthermore, he was prompt in responding to our need for an additional bath set, just because we girls have long, long hair!! The bath sets provided were also gentle for our hair, which was a strong plus point to us. The Alcove room itself was also pretty with a partial pool view and high ceiling, providing a novel experience for a hotel stay. A pleasant and seamless stay from the start to the end, and hence highly recommended :)

title: Staycay
desc: Went for a weekend staycay with hubby. We got the loft room. Room was generally small but it's ok. Bed was below, the tv is on the top floor which was a bit weird bc I like to watch tv in bed before sleep. Pool was not anything fancy but basic n good for laps. Generally, hotel was not crowded at all. We only saw about 3 to 5 other couples and 1 family? But the next day when we requested for late checkout, the staff checked her comp for a quick few minutes and she went, Oh sorry we are fully booked. I mean, it's ok if we can't checkout late but look around. We can see how "fully booked" u guys are. Even when we went for breakfast tt morning, there were like only a few people in the restaurant. We had the whole pool to ourselves that morning. It's ok if u don't let us checkout

title: Excellent service
desc: Great place to stay! Excellent service by the front desk by dashan. Enjoyed out staycation here. Good job! Keep it up. Stay safe Will definitely visit again in the future. Thanks again M Social hotel!!

title: First time stay
desc: Pleasant, clean and comfortable stay. Check in and out was fuss free despite the additional measures implemented. Pillows were so comfortable! Cons: bathroom light a hassle, kept switching off due to its automatic sensor.

title: Samll room but excellent service
desc: To all the service staffs like Mr Darshan and a few ladies staffs, thank s for wonderful service and the birthday cake surprise . Although room was a bit small as our family was transfer from Copthorne Kings Hotel due to their internal booking error . Still we enjoy our stay especially the kids. Thank you once again!!!

title: Will not visit again
desc: Customer service was bad during check in and check out, there was no standard procedure. Some guest do not require room deposit and others were required. Check out timing was staggered as early as 10.30am due to covid situation. They should then allow early check in. We went for the breakfast buffet and wasted 1.5hrs waiting for the food to arrive due to shortage of staff and also one of the staff served another table our order. The design of the room was okay but for the price paid, we could have stayed somewhere better and with more food options nearby. The showering amenities was a little flawed but small issue. It was our 1st time staying over at M Social, and the experience wasn't a pleasant one hence nothing to rave about nor recommended. They have to improve their service

title: Poor service at Beast & Butterflies
desc: Worse visit ever so far. This is not my first visit but definitely my worse visit so far. I was there for staycation after the circuit breaker. Planned to relax myself after the much neede lad break but it was totally ruined by the service at the restaurant. Was there on my 1st night for dinner and second day for breakfast. 1st night - Forgotten to serve our dessert even though I asked for it to be served. Reminded them the second time and the total duration for them to serve 1 dessert was ard 30 mins. 2nd day - ordered coffee with milk, no milk came. Asked for the milk again,forgot abt it AGAIN! Asked for the 3rd time before they finally served it. Asked for butter and jam, forgot abt it again. Asked for the second time before they serve it. Asked for a cappuccino, forgot

title: Great service recovery by Darshan!
desc: It was crowded and rather hectic during the check-in time as many people came at the same timing. After queueing for 20 minutes, we were told that our room was not ready and we were offered a drink coupon at the hotel’s restaurant. We waited 1.5 hours but did not receive any phone call. Confused, we went back to the reception and Darshan (front-desk) patiently helped us get a room ASAP amidst the chaotic lobby. We really appreciate his service and how positive/calm he was during the peak period. The room was clean and cosy, definitely recommending to my friends and family!

title: Best Employee Ever
desc: We encountered Dharshan during our stay there and that was the highlight of our stay! He was friendly, humorous, helpful and reliable! A great example of first class customer service! Thank you Dharshan!

title: Unpleasant experience
desc: Very poor customer services. Truly unhappy with the way the room services just barged into our room to set up the toiletries. We had to wait up to 1 hour to get our room due to some cleanup Services. Super horrible experience would never recommend.

title: Excellent!
desc: Kudos to Padashan for his excellent hospitality and service! Another Kudo to Angel for entertaining my late night request for cutlery. Overall great ambience and atmosphere. A good place to seek inspiration for interior design of small spaces

title: Quiet and Relaxing Hotel with nice location by the river
desc: Stayed one night on National Day. Location might be a bit of a distance from Clarke Quay. However, it is located near the Singapore River and the quiet area of Robertson Quay with nice sidewalks and near convenience store. The alcove room room that I have booked is small but cosy with nice mirrors and floor to ceiling window. Not much of a view but probably better views if one goes for the loft rooms. Breakfast at Beast and Butterfly was good. Limited variety but quality and filling breakfast. Appreciate the efforts by the hotel to keep guests safe during this covid period especially with the personal care kit given to all guests. Polite and pleasant staff at all fronts, especially the friendly front counter staffs.

title: Unique Boutique Hotel Experience
desc: We signed up for the Bottled Up Happiness Package with the hotel. The experience was a fun and memorable one, as we played around with the scents and identified the unique combination that we were fond of. As it was a Friday evening, the hotel was also having their $1 oyster promotion (while stocks last). Unfortunately, we missed the promotion as we returned to our room for some rest after the perfume workshop. Nevertheless, there were other hidden food gems around the hotel's vicinity that are worth checking out. All in all, it was a good experience and the hotel staff were friendly and helpful. Would consider another stay in the hotel in the future.

title: Staycation
desc: Good place to staycay, good breakfast and nice pool. The location was very close to Clarke Quay and Central so food was easy to find too. The aircon and fridge wasn't cold tho... We don't recommend buying ice cream to keep in the room.

title: Great service and ambience overall
desc: Perfect for young couples! Great food and drinks in the vicinity - just chill vibes. Awesome service staff! Room was cozy but alittle small. Sink was in the common area. Nonetheless enjoyed ourselves tremendously over the National day long weekend (2 nights)!

title: Great hotel, good location
desc: We came here twice, each time was a great experience. Location is good, stuff is friendly and breakfast is yummy. We will defenetly come back for the third time! I can summarise it in two words - fantastic staycation.

title: Live in the Heart of Robertson Quay
desc: Love the location - right next to great bars and restaurants. The Loft Terrace was cosy, bed was comfortable but it’s a little on the small side. Terrace was a little dirty, could be maintained better. It was unfortunate that the house bar/ restaurant does not offer any promotion on food or drinks for in-house guests or I would have spend more time there. That said, it was a great stay overall and I would return to M Social for future staycations.

title: Lovely Loft Room
desc: We only stayed for one night, but the loft room was fantastic. Incredibly comfy bed, quiet at night, clean room and great space with the loft to chill out and watch TV. Quick and easy checkout. Fantastic location!

title: Overall very pleasant stay.
desc: Check in check out was swift and the room was cosy. Staff was very friendly and helpful too. Prepare all information needed to at the temperature taking area for quick process to enter the lobby so you don't need to stand out in the heat.

title: Intriguing, Modern Boutique Hotel With Comfortable Rooms
desc: Introduction Located about 30 minutes drive away from the Changi international airport in Singapore, the M Social Singapore hotel is a trendy, modern, 4-star designer boutique hotel. Aimed at the young, millenial, and hipster crowd, M Social Singapore offers the epitome of get-away vacays / staycays - comfortable but tiny studio loft living, secluded away from the bustle of city life. Ambience Ambience at M Social Singapore is chic, vibrant, and eclectic. Famed French designer Philippe Starck sought to showcase an explosion of creative energy in the design of the place, including warm lighting, quirky patterned floor tiles, sleek solid coloured surfaces, artistic drawings and word scribbles as decor, smooth concrete walls, and even the soft glow of neon lights. There are

title: Nice staycation
desc: We needed to change air and it meets my expectations! I already stayed in this hotel and decided to come back. It was as good as the first time. Very good hotel and their restaurant on the river side is even better than last time! Amazing cocktails ( i mean really, the bartender Vlad is a killer) cold cuts and cheese were awesome. We enjoyed our stay!

title: Great time
desc: I had a great time, good service, really clean rooms, clean pool. Would definitely return if given the chance! Only thing was that breakfast really wasn’t too good. Would skip breakfast in my next booking.

title: Relaxing Staycation
desc: We were presented birthday treat vouchers when we checked-in to our surprise. As I had initially requested for a birthday cake in the room, but that was not an available option, but I was offered other options, but I did not reply the email in the end. The staff who checked us in was really friendly and professional, it made make a really big impression on me. The rooms were really clean and chic, since we stayed in the premier loft, there was also a really comfortable sofa, which we thoroughly enjoyed using, while watching TV. Will definitely come back again for another staycation if circumstances permit.

title: Highly recommended
desc: Chanced upon M social via Agoda App and was in love with room with the loft. It was my first time staying with M social. Clean environment, staff was very friendly and attentive. A good place for couples to relax and enjoy a short staycay. Thank you! Would definitely go back again!

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Couple of things I wish to highlight here during our stay here. Firstly, the check in process feels empty, meaning there wasn’t any communication. My wife and I were at the entrance where we did a temperature check and showing our safe-entry log in using our mobile phone. Then we were standing there without any directions given. The staff just keep typing on her laptop on the ad hoc desk and ignored us. Queues started to form behind us and we are all just stuck there. Only after 10-15 minutes later another staff came to us and directed us into the hotel for the check in. I felt that the first staff Could have at least notify us to enter the hotel or say something to us while she is processing our information instead of just focusing on her work blindly. Checking in process is

title: Total letdown
desc: I dread penning a bad review as it empties my well of good energy and robs a potentially great holiday memory. This was our first holiday post caged circuit breaker days. And did I pin high hopes on the Premier Loft Room indeed. How wrong can you go wrong with Philippe Starck? At $320, it is the most expensive room in the designer hotel. I did my homework, I did my research. This is it. It’s got the killer looks. I booked it through the Millennium hotel site as it promised a host of parity benefits such as 10% discount and check in anytime. Plus 24-hour occupancy as a Millennium member. So we turned up at 12 noon. And were fed with empty promises that the room will be ready in 15 minutes. And another 15. And another 20. At 2.15 PM, we finally had our loft. It was stunning.

title: Clean And Comfy
desc: The room is very clean and comfortable. My room window facing the pool. Wake up in the morning can drink coffee and chill while looking at at the pool. Bed is super comfy and big. They do provide instant coffees and tea. Food can be delivered to room so you don't have to go out and join the crowd in this situation!

title: Pleasant Staycay!
desc: Was really fascinated by the interior design at every part of the hotel, the staff are really nice and friendly too, room was also clean and comfy! Kudos☺👍 Will love to visit again! Thank you once again for having us😉

title: Disappointing, Underwhelming, Poor Value
desc: I made the reservation with M Social more than 2 months in advance, it was planned to be my surprise proposal to my gf, disguised under the pretext of staycation. Naturally I wanted it to be perfect, hence I started making arrangements with M Social in May. The response from M Social (Mandy) was unusually lukewarm and ambiguous, with regards to our request for higher floors, late checkout etc. To summarize, the hotel could have informed us that high floors with nicer views are unavailable, and not to keep us hopeful and waiting (asking me to check on that check-in day itself with reception) since it’s obvious all the higher floors are assigned to foreign Bangladeshi workers. Our floor also have foreign workers staying as well, which is regrettable but we felt we could have

title: First Visit
desc: Stayed here for 1 night and overall experience was fine except for the following points: - A little disappointed the check-in staff did not realized it was for my birthday celebration upon registration as it was on the exact day. - Called to request for a LCO if it’s possible but was informed that latest is 12pm (surprised to hear that staff said standard check-out time is at 11am when it’s actually 12pm). Hotel was on high occ but still able to get LCO only if you pay. - Check-out experience was extremely long due to the peak check-in hour and there was only 1 receptionist on duty. Upcoming stay in a different category room and we are hoping that the experience would be much more pleasant.

title: Room is great! Breakfast is average.
desc: Great ambience and comfy sheets. Booking through the hotels website, I got the cocktail + breakfast and stay option. Cocktail making lesson was fun and taught by the bartender Vald at its restaurant, Beast and Butterflies. With a complimentary pair of cocktails, it was an excellent start to the Staycation. I booked the Alcove Cosy Room. At 14 sq meters, the room was not too claustrophobic yet cosy with a queen size bed that could fair fit 2 pax. Toilet was particularly small with the basin outside. Amenities of the room, thou standard was sufficient and clean. Despite the latter and the cosiness of the room, the room appeared to have mild stains on its wall, curtain and hair on some areas of the carpeted floor. The toilet had slightly rusty hinges. Nevertheless, the room was

title: Surprises...
desc: From the past reviews, there were issues with the newly implemented processes post covid, but it's good to see the improvements. 1. Though queue to enter is long on a Sat, there's 5 staff facilitating the check-in process (1 at entrance, 4 at check in counter). It's quite fast. Professional team at work. 2. As it's a stay to celebrate my partner's birthday, I have personally emailed the reservation team to see what services I can get from hotel. Darshan and Mandy has promptly responded to my query and informed us services they have like deco at xx$, also offered complimentary dessert voucher. While that being said, the actual day caught me off guard as I didn't take on the deco package but found it done within the room. Instead of dessert voucher,we were offered two welcome

title: Bad service experience
desc: First i saw this M Social advertisement in all the social media, looks cool! Tried to call to find out more because everything is so unsure during this pandemic. None of my call being answered. So i drop an email and at last i received reply, felt welcome, sign up for member and booked the room! We checked in from the 9th-11th September. It is school holiday for the kids. We had a very bad experience during this trip. I would not complain about the long wait for check-in as it was for travel declaration and safety purpose for everyone. During the counter check-in, they forgot about my request to have room far from elevator, yet they managed to change for me. Once we reached the room, there started all the nightmares. Cracked mug, no toiletries provided, some shorts curly

title: Weekday Staycay!
desc: Love the overall outlook of this hotel! Staff upon check in was lovely, we were also served by the kind manager, Ms Geraldine, during our stay, and she was really helpful, we asked for assistance in directions and also regards to the facilities for the hotel and she was always so eager to help. I will definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family. Will return again soon!

title: Poorly cleaned and poor customer service
desc: It was a staycation on 5 Sep in the Premier Loft Room and I cannot recommend this hotel to anyone. Check-in process is long, room was not clean despite being SGClean certified, customer service is poor. There are much better hotels to have a staycation at, and I will not recommend M Social at all.

title: Returned stay for a bestfriend's Birthday! Thank you again Geraldine!
desc: Visited a best friend of mine for her birthday in September and was greeted by Geraldine again! Really amazing that she recognized myself and my boyfriend from our last stay. She greeted us with excitement though it was a busy day at work for her. We were given complimentary drink vouchers and a dessert from the restaurant by Geraldine. We could not thank her enough for taking good care of my bestfriend on her birthday. What stood out most about the service here is the "attention to detail", on point! Once again thank you very much to Geraldine and the team! A true star player!

title: Disappointing cleanliness and room
desc: I visited M Social and was thoroughly disappointed in a number of items: - After checking in, we found that our room was extremely stuffy, very dusty and we could even see food from the previous traveler left behind. So we asked for it to be thoroughly cleaned again. This is VERY shocking and disappointing as I was under the impression that being SG clean, M social would put more effort into disinfecting and sanitizing the room. - there was no chair in the room despite it being a business hotel and when we asked for one, we were told it was designed to be this way. That’s really inconvenient as we had to work from our beds or floors... - our door lock spoilt and locked us IN the room, and the next day it locked us OUT because of the battery issue. M social came to fix it

title: Post Covid Staycation, poor management
desc: Loft Premier Room - kinda small but cosy TV was too near when seated at the sofa seat. Toilet for bathing kinda squeezy. Checked In on Friday (Thankfully)! Our staycation was 3D2N. Breakfast - it was super understaff and waited for 45mins for our food to be served. What horrified us was the lack of and poor management - We went out during Saturday's check-in time, there was a long queue. Long story short, we heard that the longest waiting time to check in was 4 hours. During the late night, we needed some room service to deliver some items - called for almost an hour, but to no avail. Hence we went down and realised that there was only 1 person at the floor. Overall stay aside from the breakfast, all good as we also had a complimentary cocktail making lesson and the room was

title: Warm hospitality WILL DEFINITELY VISIT AGAIN
desc: Upon arrival to the hotel, Davidson explained through the hotel facilities and made checking in a real breeze . He was very welcoming and I appreciate his warm hospitality even during this peak season. Davidson offered me and my bf a free upgrade of the room as it was my bf’s birthday. A nice gesture to the start of our staycation! Thank you so much for the effort!

title: Need More Attention to Details
desc: Through my short stay with M Social Singapore, I believe they really have a huge room for improvements. Firstly, I was given keycard access upon check-in when my assigned room was not ready. As I had to start my work online, I dialled to the reception multiple times with no response. In the end, I had to resolve issues such as blinds not shutting properly and the lack of toiletries at the front desk. Secondly, it could have been due to the room hasn’t been fully ready but, there were dust in various corners of the rooms. Thirdly, when I did my booking, I left a remark that it was my birthday and, being under the Millennium group, entitled me to a birthday treat (voucher for dessert for M Social), which was missed out during my check-in. However, on the bright side, the

title: Wasn’t a great stay
desc: Decided to stay at the M social for our honeymoon after we got married last weekend. To celebrate the occasion, we paid for an upgrade to the Terrace Loft (212), however the room we got wasn’t complete. There was only 1 bathroom towel, no face towel provided and the in-room phone was disconnected and no phone was replaced. We called the reservations team from our own mobile phone to inform and only the towels were delivered to us. Till we checked out, no technician came to the room to replace the phone even though the FO ensured that they’ve keyed into the system. The towels at the pool were stained and looked like it wasn’t cleaned well. On our second night, we went out and switched on the make up room light. We came back to only have the beds cleaned and towels

title: Comforting Stay
desc: Checked in on 21st and staying until 24th Sept. The hotel is situated along the river and had many restaurants nearby. It’s away from the hustle and bustle of the city which was what we were looking for in this stressful period. The staff was friendly, especially Davidson whom we met at the door, he gave us a warm welcome to our stay and we saw him greet every guest going in & out. He helped us to our requests, to make up our room etc. Would definitely come back and stay again.

title: Please DO NOT waste your money booking this hotel
desc: Horrendous experience from day 1 till the end, check in stated at 2pm on the website, thinking that it might be crowded since it’s holiday period we reached the hotel at 240pm. Still long queue was sighted outside the hotel with people waiting at least 45 minutes to be checked in, thinking it was during this period and stricter measures are being put in place for guest safety hence the delay, but nope. Only 2 check in counters were open. In the first place why not allow guest to check in at staggered timing instead? No prior notice or whatsoever was posted on the hotel website. We ended checking in 2 hours later. Fast forward to second day, we asked for housekeeping while we were out. When we came back at around 8.30pm, we found the room not cleaned. Only saw a new set of

title: Staycation Aloft Premier
desc: Reading the review from Tripadvisor stating that there is long waiting check-in of up to 4 hours. I was pretty worried however it came as a surprise, it was much faster than I thought of. I would like to compliment one of the staff Davidson Tan from the front office. He greeted me with an awesome service showing his professionalism even though he is very busy, and most importantly, he will do the extra mile for the customers. He tried his best in providing solution which really impresses me. I called the service hotline for 2 bottles of water, it came up less than 15minutes which is really impressive.

title: Service is seriously lacking . Furnishings look modern but lacked practicality
desc: Booked a 4 night stay loft room. 1. Check in was late. Told to wait at hotel cafeteria and they'll call my mobile once room is ready. Waited for 1.5 hour , went up to recep. > Room was ready but they forgot to call me up. 2. Room This is a loft where the bed is on ground level, while TV and a coffee table and a couch is on the loft. > You got it - No TV in bed. No proper work chair. Hotel says they cannot provide a chair with a back. > smelled like a smoking room. Called front desk but no one answered the phone for half and hour. Assistance is non-existent. > no USB charging ports. Bring all your charger adapters 3. Safety measure- OVER the top Hotel reception is separated from hotel restaurant by a small public alleyway. With Covid safety measures, hotel

title: Good Place but WORST CHECK IN
desc: I know we are in the middle of the pandemic but Singapore recently open hotels for staycations. I often go to different hotels recently almost every week but this one is the worst. You have to queue for 4-6 hours just to get a room. You will approach the reception and they will advise to go for a walk or coffee and wait for their call. So be better prepared to spend like $10 for coffee just to wait. Then when they call you still have to queue for one to 2 hours. I finished my check in at 6-7pm, I arrived in the area at 2pm. WORST in Singapore to think that this is Millenium Hotel brand? Other smaller chains are better organised.

title: Helpful staffs
desc: Covid period is not easy for the hospitality industry for sure. We had some small issues of delays (1hr!) with our in room dining and a long queue during check in. I added on the 'Lovely special touch' during my booking on the millenium hotels website but it was not done up when we checked in. Despite all that, Jeralyn from the front desk was extremely helpful and was all smiles (albeit wearing a mask) while helping us with our queries. Highly commendable! Thank u very much Jeralyn! Really made our stay a much better one 👍🏻👍🏻 (Staff name may be spelled wrongly, sorry!)

title: Clean and Comfortable
desc: Booked M Social for a weekend staycation. Heard about the design aesthetic of the hotel and was indeed quite impressed by the modern chic look when you go through the main lobby. The hotel seems very popular among young couples, which led to a long queue for entry and check-in. However, check-in is pretty efficient and the staff are courteous enough to grant last minute requests and changes. Service by the front desk staff was good! Booked the Alcove Cosy Room. Room size is small, but is good enough for 2 persons. I’m generally not a fan of hotel rooms where the wash basin is outside the toilet, but it seems to be norm in a lot of boutique hotels nowadays. The overall design of the room is modern and chic. The room was also clean and comfortable, although there were

title: Waited 3hrs in line to check in to my room
desc: This is the worse hotel stay experience I ever had. Thinking to support our hotel industry due to this pandemic period where every business is dying, including the hospitality trade. I booked a night stay at MSocial, spending SGD255 for a Loft Terrace Room for a staycation with my kids since it was school holidays. When we reached the hotel, a long queue was formed for at least 30pax with many couples, families and some are friends. Thinking the queue was to take temperature and doing declaration but unfortunately that’s not the case. All of us waited in vain outside the hotel entrance to check in to our room. There is only one counter open for check in, each check in took more that 15mins. I am in the queue from 2.30pm to 5.30pm. When finally it’s my turn, to my HORROR,

title: This one is for the non-fussy
desc: We stayed in this hotel for 1 night and to be fair,it is okay considering the amount we paid. When we arrived at the hotel, we were surprised to see the long queue for check in. Thankfully,the wait didn't stretch for hours as the staff did their best to ensure the check in process was fast. Their lobby is pretty small and its understandable why there was a queue during check in. I think people wanting to stay here have to be patient,its a small hotel so don't expect the service standard to match the ritz carlton's or any other big chain hotels. But one thing to note,the staff ade polite and professional. My room was downgraded due to the fact that some water pipe burst and it was full occupancy so we had to take the alternative room. Excellent service recovery by providing

title: Bad experience
desc: I would like to feedback that the check in procedure at M social was terribly slow and inefficient. We took 2 hours to check in yesterday (8/9/2020) and during the wait, there was no social distancing in place. Instead of staggering different timing for guests to check in, we were told that guests may feel shortchanged if told to book in at a later timing. But, don't we feel shortchanged too when we checked in at 4pm (instead of 2pm because of the queue) and even irritated as we had to stand for a good 2 hours? I do not understand. We were also unable to get through the front desk to request for towels and had to go down to the lounge area to make the request. Furthermore, I left a lavender jade ear stud in the room after I checked out and desperately called the hotel to inquire

title: Friday night Oysters and Cocktails at Beast and Butterflies
desc: For the last 5 Friday nights my husband and I have headed to M Social for our date night. The staff are always great and they make fantastic cocktails even one tonight with our photo imposed on it. Erin looked after us tonight and she was very attentive :)

title: A dusty n unclean hotel
desc: This hotel was under the SGClean thingy, so decided to book a night staycation with family. Checked in on the 10-Sep-2020, Book the Loft Gallery room, once settle down, walk around to check the room as usual. 1) Plastic bag left behind fridge from the 07-sep. 2) dusty tissue box. 3) tough white stain bottom of cup. 4) dusty window frame. 5) hair beside the bed pillow 6) best of all, oily phone! Report these issue to their duty manager, after she came, hear my issues with the room I had, decided to change us to another room and give a free breakfast. An hour later, new room was ready, shifted our stuff there, only to find out new room slight better but still with dusty coffee machine and stuff and the duty Manager still promise us that she oversee the cleaning of the room.

title: Waited 4 hours for check-in
desc: Was told to arrive at 3pm for check-in, arrived on time and there was a long queue outside the reception. Waited 2 hours in line before we finally got to the front, only to be told that our queue number is 64. Waited 1.5 hours more, by that time it was already 6.30pm and there were still over 20 people ahead of us. What was the point of checking in at 7pm without even a guarantee of a late check-out or discount on the booking price? Booked this hotel to celebrate my fiance's birthday and the whole day was ruined just standing in line and waiting around for hours. So ridiculous and never experienced anything like this before in my life. Only good thing was they waived the cancellation fee. Would not recommend this hotel at all. If you are not ready for the crowds then don't open

title: Staycation
desc: A bit upset when arriving on 9sept.been in there since 2pm and got our room key at 3pm very super long queue for check in.when we reach in our room 414,there is no bath towel.call the service line nobody pick up.then went personally to the housekeeping cleaner for 2nd time then inform the towel will arrive from from washing 6pm.we wait almost 7pm then it been to the room.sorry before that I got no choice to take n use from pool towel 1st.everything is great staying there.cocktail mixology class Bartender vlod is marvellous.

title: Alcove Terrace #242 | 17 September 2020
desc: M Social, The level of cleanliness in the room was extremely disappointing and very upsetting. HSKP needs to put in more effort in ensuring all rooms are cleaned thoroughly especially during this pandemic. I would like to thank Geraldine from Front Office who genuinely tried her best in handling the situation and providing solutions. It was Geraldine’s effort in diverting a bad experience into a more positive one during our stay in M Social. Regards, Jo

title: Staycation
desc: This is my first time staying in M Social Singapore. When I arrived at the hotel, I saw there is a long queue and I was quite shocked. After I provide all my details, they told me I have to wait for 45 minutes even the check-in time is 2 pm. I understand the situation and I willing to wait for it as I working in the service line as well. Maybe some people do not understand what is the procedure during this period so they are showing their impatient attitude to the hotel staff. After 30 minutes of waiting time, I get a call from the manager(I think) and mention is my turn to do the check-in, really appreciate their hard work. Upon check-in, Davidson from the Front Office team assist me with the check-in. He is very professional and friendly during check-in and also provided me a

title: Will be our choice of staycation!
desc: We had a night stay at M Social at was delighted by the level of service we receive. The service at the reception by Ms. Geraldine is both personal and professional. It being the COVID situation, no buffet breakfast allowed but yet we are allowed to choose a great selection of breakfast choices and taste great too! Our stay was great and with the great staycation offer, we really had a fantastic family time. We will be back soon!

title: Friendly staff and great service
desc: This was my first time at M Social, and we took up the Bottled Up Happiness package to celebrate my partner's birthday. The front desk supervisor, Davidson, was really thoughtful in helping us arrange a birthday treat voucher as well as to assist us in getting a later check-out. We truly enjoyed our stay with M Social. Will be sure to come back again.

title: Affordable and Relaxing Staycay
desc: Checked-in on the evening of 25/10 for a night of rest. Everything was settled fast and efficiently thanks to the help of Davidson. He was very friendly and enthusiastic. Great customer service. Great place to stay for an impromptu getaway. The only bad point I can bring up is that the air conditioning need some checking. The temperature keeps fluctuating. But all in all would come back again in the near future.

title: Great Location and Friendly staff
desc: Booked M social for my friend’s surprise birthday, she really enjoyed the room where it was clean and comfy. The swimming pool had a great view. Loft premier room was surprisingly bigger than we expected. Special thanks to the receptionist Shafiq, who checked us in made our stay memorable for us. Definitely coming back soon

title: Nice and chill place
desc: Booked a package through klook that included a cocktail workshop at Beast and Butterflies. Walked in to a friendly service by Davidson and checking in was really a breeze. Cocktail workshop by Vlad was really fun and we really enjoyed it.

title: The Room's Great But Service Can Be Better!
desc: It was an overall relaxing staycay with my girlfriends. The loft rooms we stayed in are great - pretty well maintained, lovely and clean, fluffy bed although it can be bigger (my girlfriends and I don't feel like it's a queen size bed, more like a super single?). We love the sofa too! Perfect for couch potatoes like us! We checked in on a very warm day and the AC cooled us down really quickly so thumbs up for the powerful AC! Truth be told, I didn't really have anything to complain until the 2nd day which was our check out day. It started off with the breakfast service. While the food was delish, the service quality should be improved. We arrived at a timing which was not as busy because the restaurant was less than half occupied then and we saw a good number of staff on duty.

title: Girls night
desc: Thank you for the great service, Kumar! You have made our dining experience a fantastic one! Will come back again! Great good and drinks! We enjoyed the oysters promotion and will definitely be back again!

title: Cleanliness issue / Small bugs
desc: Room having cleanliness issue / fingerprint on all shining surface / Small bugs / gnats crawling in the toilet . Suggest the management focus on the cleanliness issue after COVID lock down and was used a SHN hotel .

title: So much LOVE for this hotel!
desc: This is in fact my second stay at M Social Hotel (first time, I booked the Alcove room and for the second time, I booked the Loft Gallery Room). I was here for a 3D2N stay to celebrate my partner's birthday and I must say, it has been a wonderful staycation! Great rooms, great pool and a nice restaurant! The lofts are exceptional - room was clean, well-maintained and amenities stocked-up. Two thumbs up to their housekeeping department! We had breakfast & dinner at their restaurant - food was good throughout and the service we receive from the restaurant staff, lovely! I can go on and on. To summarise it, from the moment we entered the hotel till the moment we left, we could not fault a single thing, be it the service, its surroundings or the rooms. So much LOVE for this

title: Great place for staycation!
desc: To be honest, I had my doubts when choosing M Social for a staycation. However, upon arrival, I realised that the photos of the room on websites did not do it justice! It looked so much better in reality compared to the photos taken by previous guests and other reviews. Check-in: The queue WILL be long due to its popularity and extra measures implemented for COVID-19. Hence, I'd suggest coming 1-2 hours after the check-in timing if you would prefer not to queue 45 mins to check in. Washroom: It felt very modern. The glass wall between the room and washroom made it look very chic. I also liked how the blinds for the glass wall are built into the wall so it doesn't get wet. Unfortunately, there wasn't a bidet for the toilet. Shower: Rain shower head and handheld shower head, no

title: Proposal
desc: Dear M social staff in charge, I would like to thanks this two staff ms gretchen and Ms novelia who made my day most enjoyable. On 23 oct I stayed two nite with m social it was amazing, I have put up an request with gretchen as I told her I would like to check in early as I need to set up my proposal. She willing to help me on my request. On Friday I finally check in and meet gretchen and novelia both are very friendly and well train and made me feel welcome. Nothings much I can do but send and feedback. Hope my feedback find u well. Hope u see u all again. Just one last things beside the rooms abit small and pillow not Comfortable other then that is fine. Best regards Alex tay

title: Great staycation experience
desc: slightly small room, but the exceptional service level of staff made up for it! Our front desk staff Davidson made check-in very quick despite the long queue. he was also really friendly and hospitable with our enquiries. will definitely come back again!

title: Disappointed stay
desc: Firstly, our room was not ready till 4pm, I don’t expect an early check in,but room not ready at 4pm on a Friday afternoon? Come on.. Secondly, this stay was to celebrate my fiancé’s birthday on the day itself, priory to our arrival, staff committed there will be cake or some voucher. Guess what, there’s nothing. Not to mention there isn’t any greeting despite they did registration for him too. Last but not least, when I was asking for a bucket of ice, the answer I got was I have to go down to the restaurant to pick it up. Aside from the service level, the size of the room. Be prepared.. I guess during this challenging period, hotel is short of staff but, management, please take care of your staff’s moral. Only if you take good care of them, your staff then can take care of

title: Excellent service
desc: Accommodation is well stay and comfortable Excellent service credit to Davidson and angel for their prompt response and actions. Hotels nearby have a fews good restaurants to try. its the best Hotels i stay so far this year.

title: Nice service
desc: Staff was nice friendly and helpful and allow me us to late check out I would like to thank Davidson for his nice and professionally service towards me and my friends will definitely come back and stay with m social

title: 2D1N Weekend Staycation
desc: Would like to commend the manager in charge, Geraldine, for her good customer service and hospitality. She attended to us very well. Room is pretty cosy and decent. Location is fairly convenient. Unfortunately, the only problem we faced was that the hotel per se does not have any complimentary parking spaces for us guests when we arrived. Yet when I booked on their millennium website directly, it did state that there was a free parking space. However, Manager explained apologetically to us that it was because we did not book online through M Social instead but millennium(which would have stated it does not have foc parking). Extremely misleading on their part.

title: Weekend staycay back at Msocial
desc: Just ended our staycation at Msocial today. It was a home away from home for the two of us! We stayed on Sunday-Monday to celebrate my birthday. When checking in, there was a long queue and I realised that it was the same when I checked out too and the other guests were checking in. Maybe what the hotel could do is to open up more counters / install self check in kiosks to facilitate the overwhelming queue in the future and that the workload of the front desk personnel could be minimalised. :) Our initial booking was for the loft room but due to technical difficulties on the air conditioner my partner was given the information an hour prior to check in. However, I have to say that the manager Gretchen handled the situation with upmost professionalism! We didn’t get to stay our

title: Beautiful hotel
desc: I stay more than a week to this hotel lovely stay and food supply daily 3 times and bed comfortable too hotel quite big and spacious thank you for beautiful hotel government give we hope we can come back again to stay

title: Wedding anniversary
desc: We went for the staycation due to Covid period. Very pretty place. We spend around $230 for a loft terrace room. Check in queue was long but very fast. The staff made sure that we are all safe to enter. The hotel was near to great world city. We just have to walk around 15 min to reach there. The inside of the room was really nice but pretty small. My room came with a tree resting place which was located outside. The bed is located on top of the loft. So no disturbance from tv. Just sleep. We had dinner at Beast & Butterflies. Which is the best for the day. But it is a bit pricy. We took a stroll after our dinner and end up in Great World City to get the awfully chocolate. The stroll was filled with people. And a lot of dog lovers. We enjoy the after meal breeze walking. Overall

title: Not worth the money
desc: There is a lot of work that needs to be done. Bad air con. Air con tec had to do air con servicing while we were in the room. Even after that is didn’t work. No mini fridge to chill your drinks. Long curtains are pretty however when I moved it I could feel dust fall onto my face and eyes. Complimentary ice is till 10pm and must be self collected at the restaurant beside the hotel. Basically it’s not convenient. Hotel level corridor stinks of food gone bad and staff do not do their rounds to freshen up the area. Housekeeping literally opened my room door. When we had just checked in. There was no proper info was passed front office to housekeeping. Clearly mentioned we were celebrating a birthday prior booking. Hotel staff mentioned there will be a dessert voucher

title: WE DONT WANNA COME BACK!!!!!
desc: Yes! we dont wanna come back to our home! 😂😂 Because we had a GREAAATTT TIME here in M SOCIAL! People are Very polite and kind! We had lunch and breakfast in their reataurant and foods are awesome! Please try the pork nuckle! Staff in the reataurant have great service and very POLITE! it is sad we didnt get their names! Thank you guys for the experience! credit to the chef as well! Receptionist are great as well polite and kind! sad again we didnt got their names, the Filipina outside that day of our check in..21/10/2020 around 11am. We stayed at room 355 and my daughter keep on saying.."I LIKE THIS ROOM" credit to the house keeping team who keep it clean and tidy with full amenities..and we met them at the corridor and they greeted us "Good day" with a smile thank you guys!

title: A VERY GOOD NIGHT’S REST
desc: We have booked the impromptu 1 night stay as our house was under painting works. Arrived around 4pm on 19th Oct to check-in, and thankfully no long queue (which was greaaaat!). Received the room keys after registration , and within minutes we were in our Alcove Cosy Room. It was the right decision booking M Social, as we had such a good night’s rest. The night curtains worked wonders in blocking out any morning light and the bed/pillows was just very comfortable for us. Air condition was just right too. We woke up feeling really very fresh , we did not realize it was morning already as the night curtains blocked out any light from the room. Luckily, we made it on time for breakfast at Beast&Butterflies as we woke up only at 9:45am, and breakfast ends at 10am. Breakfast was

title: Disappointing for a big name hotelier
desc: Stayed in the alcove terrace room. Regrets... Shocked to the see that the wash basin is outside of the toilet and in the room itself? Imagine doing your business in the toilet and yet you have to come out of it into the room to wash your hands? The room is small so prepare yourself to have your toes get hurt hitting the sharp legs of the bed every now and then! The outdoor chair could have a proper wicker sofa instead of the cloth because when it's raining, there's no way you can sit on it until it totally dries up. There were also only one robe in the room, and when I asked for another one for my partner at around 11pm, the front desk mentioned that the housekeeping department was already closed and I have to head down to the front desk to collect myself. No toothpaste

title: Highly Recommend, Perfect stay & Experience
desc: It was an amazing experience staying in M social. We took the 3D2N Alcove Cosy room with Perfume making + Cocktails making package. Check in was smooth, took less than 20min and the room is quite spacious for 2. There is also gym and swimming pool facilities if you need some outdoor activities. On our first night, we had cocktail making session by Vladyslav. Vlad was very friendly and knowledgeable. He taught us the steps on how to create a cocktail and types of alcohol by smelling. We get to choose our base and a few other juices to match it. Shaking a cocktail also have technique! The whole workshop was about 95min. But YAYYYYY we created our own free customised cocktail and get to drink it! Cheers ~ Breakfast menu was quite simple. Due to Covid, it’s ala carte menu not

title: Staycation 101!
desc: Decided to support our local hotels and found a good deal on Agoda for an alcove cosy room. The room was not big but was as described, cosy and stylish. The staff were friendly and not as described in some other reviews and they seem they were trying their best to manage the situation. There was a queue of about 10 people when we arrived but after completing the declaration form and safe entry, we proceeded in to collect our keys and were off to our room. If there was anything to gripe about, The pool was rather small. All in all, a good staycation!

title: Sweet Staycation
desc: Me and my husband has an overnight staycation with a cocktail workshop inclusion. Reached the hotel at 3:20 pm, check in was a breeze and very smooth. We were assisted by Ms. Geraldine at the reception. She was very kind and nice. She even helped us booked our cocktail workshop. Room was normal size for a singapore standard. Clean and cozy. Wish there is a bidet 😊. Cocktail workshop- we had a 4 pm time slot. The mixologist, Vlad, was very entertaining. We really enjoyed our time there. He is very patient. Thank you for the take away shaker. This was actually the highlight of our stay. Dinner- we ordered a dinner from Beauty and Beast restaurant. Food was definitely good. Breakfast- we would like to commend the very accommodating staffs at the Beauty and Beast Restaurant. We

title: A comfortable & restful weekend away from home
desc: Checked out this morning and had to leave a review of our wonderful first stay with M Social! Service: read about the long queues and long waiting time to check in but I guess we got lucky because the whole experience was such a breeze from entrance to room. Greeted at the door by very friendly, very cheerful staff (but you can tell they are quite exhausted and jaded - probably from all the poor guests’ attitudes meh). We booked a klook deal so dude at check-in even ran to grab the heavy Bruno hotplate box from the room. While we appreciated his rushing to see us through the check-in and collection process quickly, we hope that the staff wouldn’t have to endanger themselves in the process. Last thing we want is for someone to fall down and hurt themselves. Service at Beast &

title: Everything Good! Ok Check in Q is really bad ...
desc: Everything’s great ... the staff , the food, everything .. Except the check in Q. Holding area for check in is outdoor ... it was a holiday ... so we were expecting a Q indoor.. with proper ventilation... That said .. we love our loft room... with this bed upstairs.. the pillow is firm .. we Eliot like a baby.. Our triple treat dinning package, which we had to go to 3 different restaurant in 3 different hotel is totally value for money ... A unique experience...

title: Nice room, disappointing customer service
desc: I stayed in one of the loft style rooms which was clean and had a layout that was conducive for working which I appreciated as I was on a working staycation. The bed was comfortable. The room was quite dark but had a large window that helped to offset that issue. However my overall stay was not positive. My shower was freezing cold despite me setting it to the hottest temperature and giving it extensive time to heat up. Due to COVID room service was not running. You have to order your food off of a QR and then collect it from the restaurant and it takes an hour minimum for the food to be ready for collection. Additionally, only a small part of the menu is available to order from your room and no beverages at all. I had specifically check to see if room service was available

title: Anniversary staycation
desc: Stayed here for the 2nd time. Actually love everything on this room EXCEPT FOR THE BED. 1) bed is small for 2 person???????? 2) only have 2 freaking pillows!! Thats the only thing i hate about m social. I love the hotel but dont like the bed. So........ ya.

title: Rooms are too small
desc: We booked 2 rooms for one night. The rooms and bathrooms are very small. We didn't use the facilities. It would have been better if they let us book the facilities.
