Instead, we were told to change and go to the lobby to try our luck as the pool can only accommodate 20 people. There was a small welcome pack in one room but not the other. There were towels in only one of the rooms. We called the front desk and it took 13 mins before someone answered the call. I was told that it would be around $17 for overnight parking. I parked at the parking lots at the hotel entrance. I was shocked when I tried to exit.The parking was $71.50. When I asked the hotel staff, I was told that those parking were for the condo. I didn't see any sign. Anyway, the hotel staff were very cold

title: Poor Service
desc: Prior to arrival, I asked for early check-in as I needed to setup the room for a surprise. Understood the policy of standard 2Pm check in and early check-in is subject to availability. I arrived at 11.30am, the kind receptionist outside put me on queue list, telling me that they will call me once the room is ready. At 1.30pm, I went up to the another gentleman at the reception to check if my room was ready, only then he went through the system to find a room for me. After check-in, I needed some hand towels to fold towel art as part of my surprise hence I went to the attendant in the corridor to ask him for 6, to which he only gave me two as he said he didn’t have enough, telling me to call down for more. I called down and ask for 4, the Runner handed me 2. As I was in a hurry

title: Budget Hotel at best
desc: Extremely small room, 19m² to be exact! Room is also very dimly lit plus it's so close to the apartment opposite that you can see exactly what laundry is hanging out on their balcony once u draw back the curtains! Thus for privacy sake, curtains had to be drawn throughout stay, making the whole experience claustrophobic. Many of the sockets are giving way, couldn't even properly charge the phone or plug in the iron. Far from public transport yet no free parking. Parking is expensive so if you drive, be prepared to pay. Not worth the money at all. For the price, just top up a bit and you can get a much better option elsewhere. Definitely will not be staying at any of the Millennium hotels again

title: Staycation
desc: Was greeted by a very friendly staff called Geraldine who was Super helpful and friendly. Emphasised that she wants us to enjoy and have fun :) she created a very good first impression of Social M. Thank you Geraldine!

title: Average staycation
desc: Stayed in their rather small loft. There are small bugs/flies in the room and toilet. We thought we were staying in our very first hotel which doesn't provide hand towels, only to realise they do provide after day 2's housekeeping. Staff do not understand the concept of Do Not Disturb (DND) sign, and will knock persistently and even tried to open the door when the DND sign is on.

title: Great staycation
desc: Had a great staycation at M Social on 1 Nov. Check-in was quite smooth and quick. The bed felt rather small for a Queen size bed but otherwise everything in the room was perfect. The highlight of our stay should be the Mixology workshop with Vlad. He was extremely entertaining and knowledgeable, advising us on good combinations to improve our drinks. It was the first time i managed to design my own cocktail and it was fun.

title: Memorable Stay
desc: 2nd time coming back to this place. Planned a birthday surprise and celebration at this place and we had an amazing weekend. Special thanks to Davidson, Hazel and Grace for the wonderful assistance that made this celebration smooth and memorable. Thank you.

title: Average Staycation
desc: 3 days/ 2 nights stay. I must say that the location is great ! Explored around Robertson Quay & there’s a lot of food options. However, service can be much improve/ house keeping staffs are friendly but counter staffs are all very transactional. We requested for an upgrade if available via email earlier due to my anniversary however, staff didn’t acknowledge that during check in until I asked. She mentioned that all the rooms are fully booked & I understand it’s subject to availability but I would appreciate if staffs could take note of these details during check in and not ignore the requests. Rooms are small but functional. & do not expect too much services for what you pay. And they would not accommodate your late check out at 3pm (most of the hotels do so during covid

title: M Social
desc: Overrated. I keep seeing people rave about this hotel, thats why I booked it. But the design is just okay. Room and bathroom is small. Bed not comfy. Not many amenities. Expensive and not worth for the price paid.

title: Patient service amid long queues
desc: When we arrived an hour before check-in time, the queue has began to form. Yet throughout the check-in procedure, we found the staff friendly and patient. The bed and pillows were great for a comfy sleep. Like the idea of the wash basin built in the Alcove Cosy room rather than in the squeezy bathroom. Wish there was some form of door-stop available as we need to keep holding the door everytime we go in and out of the toilet. A la carte buffet breakfast was great as there were ample enough variety. The kaya toast was my favourite. Clearly, the restaurant was short handed and some of the food we ordered did not arrived and we have to re-order. Yet, the female restaurant supervisor continued to provide friendly service overall. The outdoor pool is nice for a cool dip but lacked a

title: Cleanliness can be improved, strict visitor policy, long check-in
desc: Stayed on a weekday in December. Hotel was surprisingly crowded, not sure if it was because it is holiday season and Singaporeans are just desperate for a short getaway. Check in/our: Check in time was 2pm. We came around 3.45pm and the queue for check in was still stretched into the outdoor car porch. This took 45 minutes total which was a total bummer/bad first impression already when all we did at the counters was verify our IDs, sign for our room keys and make payment. All that could’ve been done electronically (minus the issuance of keys) to cut the wait time in my opinion. Otherwise, check out was fuss free. Just unfortunate that we could not check out later. Room requests: We made our booking 2 months in advance with requests for our bed to be on the upper level.

title: Nice stay but there’s room for improvement
desc: Mixed feelings about our stay. Nice touches: - bathrobes provided - care pack of hand sanitizer, mouthwash and 2 masks - unique tea choices - motion-sensor switch for bathroom - mini fridge with see-through door. At a glance, we know if we left anything behind in the fridge. Can be improved: - long check-in queue (similar experience to some other reviewers) - somewhat disappointed that our reservation does not include breakfast - no one picked up our calls to M-bassador & front desk when we needed to change a spoilt light bulb. In the end, we told the front desk on our way out in the morning. Thank you for changing the bulb while we were out. - a shelf and additional hooks would be useful for the bathroom - for some unknown reason, the tv switches off by itself - the shower

title: 10 years anniversary nightmare
desc: Worst decision ever made in the year 2020 - choose M Social Singapore hotel for our 10 years anniversary staycation. Got slapped by this power shutdown exercise notice few hours after checking in. We were not informed at all before booking this hotel. Headed over to seek solution with duty manager (named Maria) and she said the only thing we can do is to check out immediately. Well played, really well played M Social Singapore . There goes our game night. For those who are thinking to come here for staycation, think twice. They can suggest you to check out any time. Now i have to worry about how to sleep without air con in a confined space tonight

title: Terrible experience
desc: I often go on monthly staycations in Singapore as a local. M Social happened to be one of those hotels that I have yet to experience. I should have listened to my gut instincts. Stayed for 1 night from 20-21 Dec, on my birthday with a friend. Because of the recent govt initiative that provided locals voucher incentives to explore Singapore attractions, including hotels, the long waiting time made news. During the pre-registration check-in given via email, I selected the 11am-12pm registration slot. Arrived at around 11am at the registration table at the entrance & given a ticket & was allowed to store our baggage. We were pleasantly surprised to be given a call at 12.30pm that a room was ready. Returned at 2.30pm to discover a 7m line of people waiting. But with the ticket, we

title: Very good hardware, but frontdesk service has room for improvement.
desc: Stayed at this hotel for 2nights staycation. Plus Points first: Very good hardware used in the hotel, good furnishings, from bed to shower. Very good. Special shoutout to Housekeeping staff: Mr Ken Rock for being so friendly and helpful despite his busy schedule to make up the rooms for the next batch of guests. Now the bad points, bear with me: Frontdesk staff is cold and lack basic customer service skills. The choice of words and the way you say it makes a lot of difference. E.g. It was drizzling and we need to borrow umbrella, we approach the frontdesk, she said can take it "over there", pointing to the entrance, could have walked us there or smile and say it. When we approached the umbrella rack to borrow, we told bluntly : one room, one umbrella. You could have said

title: Wonderful experience
desc: Im so happy with my frens stay in M sosial,this is my 1st time stay here,the swimming pool also very nice.overall is good hotel, i strongly recommend this hotel.Service room also excellent,i like to thank housekeeper paramas after i check in few minutes she come and ask is everything ok in the room.so sweet of her.

title: Staycation near X'mas
desc: snagged a 3d2n deal with klook and were lucky we didn't face any major problems. arrived at 1++pm to check-in and thankfully the queue wasn't that long. it was an okay wait time to get our keys. alcove cosy room is really cosy - small but it was good enough. a little odd that the sink was outside the toilet haha. location is great - lots of cafes nearby. breakfast was okay. menu for ala carte buffet is limited. the first breakfast we went near 9am and had to wait quite awhile for food to be served but didnt have to wait to be seated. didnt use the facilities but overall enjoyed lazing in the room. the cocktail workshop was a nice additional experience! would return again but book a bigger room next time.

title: Quite upsetting :(
desc: I enjoyed 99% of my staycation in SG except this one. The service is just so bad and I am so sick of businesses making covid as an excuse for bad service. I did not enjoy my time there as I was always pissed with the slowness and the inability on meeting my simple requests. I will not check in at M Social till I hear good things about this place again. Spend your money somewhere else.

title: TERRIBLY POWER OUTTAGE WIHTOUT PRIOR NOTICE GIVEN UPON CHECK IN
desc: It was a couple retreat cum birthday celebration, yet a big surprise given at 1am and there was a power shutdown till 4am and all of us woken due to suffocating room. I believe it was a memorable moment, and thought the shutdown could happen in between 1 to 4am and what make no sense that if you are going to be performing such power outage shutdown it doesn’t make any senses that to bring in customers to suffer for the night, and why at the first place you are selling your hotel rooms during the date of power disruption? How will hotel allow such mismanagement that tarnish with bad reviews. There are no replies on the action that they supposed to answer and we are demanding compensation and would not recommend to stay at this hotel anymore if I such review is not heard by the

title: Better deals elsewhere
desc: Stayed there last Friday’s night. The queue to check in was very long. We were disappointed when we learnt that there were no complimentary parking. The room is small and the bed is smaller (not even a Queen size). The pillows are square shaped. Not comfortable to sleep in. The check out time was 11 am which was earlier than many other hotels. For the price of $200 plus, there are better valuable options elsewhere.

title: Great stay, no free parking
desc: Absolutely enjoyed my stay, the room was very cosy and small but not suffocating, comes with a balcony. Very high ceilings and long panelled windows to allow ample sunlight to shine through. TV is a smart TV that allows both apple and android phones to connect and mirror. You can even watch netflix on the TV using chrome cast. Only downside of the hotel is that it doesn't come with free parking, and parking overnight will cost a bomb. So i suggest to just grab there.. Breakfast at beast and butterflies was simple, I would love to have more selection than the current menu. Overall very good experience with M social, and its inexpensive. Would stay there again 👍

title: Stay experience
desc: Last week I stay at M Sosialhotel,I need extra bath towel many time cal front desk nobody answer, than I open my door see anyone outside suddenly I show 1lady her name is Paramas from hskp,I ask help with her,so kind of her she help me,same more she ask anything u need ma’am,she spoke very friendly and happy face greeting me,I really very disappointed after Front desk never answer my call,,after I spoke to Paramas really I feel relax,,because she give me good service,I really appreciate her,,,I really want come back again n stay,

title: Nightmare of a check-in
desc: Everything else was not bad, but it’s hard to give a fairer review after the check-in we had to go through. It took us about 2 hrs in a queue that stretched outside the hotel and almost out the car park. Some of the guests before us didn’t even have their rooms ready. From the other reviews I see that this has been an issue for a while - why has there not been a solution? Is this actually a COVID-safe practice when you are cramming pretty much your entire guest list for the night in the one space?

title: Horrible check in took forever
desc: They dont care. They only want to cut costs. 1 super long queue to check in. Unacceptable. Avoid like the plague. They are not interested to serve you. There was simply not enough staff to serve you in spite of the fact tt they have had the same problem for weeks.

title: No comp upgrade & Difficult Communication
desc: We were happy that we got the early check in/late check out. We love the room and cleanliness however we were looking forward to stay in loft room since we brought our 2kids at the very last minute. Also, it was quite difficult to get through their operator or front desk for room request. We either had to wait 20minutes or to keep calling just to request things we need in the room. Overall, its a good place for young couples and friends but not for family traveller.

title: Relaxing Premier Loft Gallery
desc: Second visit to this hotel. Stayed in the Premier Loft Gallery for the first time. Well-designed loft room with nespresso machine and capsules. The loft was spacious and thoughtfully layout. Sofa was comfortable and wide enough for watching television. I like the ease of use of Apple Airplay to mirror the screen from IPAD to the tv. Understand the design of the table but the material meant that it is easily scratched and scratches are evident on the table legs and top. One should also be careful when climbing up the stairs to the loft as the bottom steps can easily be missed if one is not careful. Overall, I am impressed with the room and the service especially the smiling housekeepers who came to check on my room to find out if everything is okay.

title: Anniversary Yachtcation trip
desc: Booked this package for our 5 years Wedding Anniversary. Initially wife was abit upset as she thought some of the things were not communicated properly like parking, check in and also items in the package. However, the effort and service from the staff more than make up for it. The staff were friendly( even when faced with a daunting long queue of customers waiting to check in), kept their cool and professionalism. One guy was going along the queue offering cold water and ice cream to those in line! Granted I waited about 35 mins to get to the check in counter which could be improved ( maybe with an app for people to pre-populate guest info, credit card, etc or staggered check in times for different rooms/packages. ) Thanks Andrew for the friendly check in and follow up

title: Terrible service
desc: I am currently here waiting for our queue to check in. Currently, it's 421pm and the queue is very long. We've been waiting for more than 30 minutes already and we assume it will take us another *atleast* hour to reach the counter. The queue is almost not moving. When you check in at a hotel, first impression starts during the check in. It should be as smooth as it could be. This is clearly mismanaged and slow service for customers who would like to have a staycation. No one would even offer you drinks or something and we are all standing. Our feet will then be very tired before we finally get to "relax". Really terrible.

title: Used to love but disappointing this time
desc: Poor cleanliness this time during my visit. Picture 1) short n medium length hair underneath the bed sheet Picture 2) blood stains on the quilt Picture 3) yellow stains in the fridge Quite surprised to see the cleanliness standard has dropped. :(

title: Overhyped and not worth the price
desc: We booked the hotel for a 3D2N staycation during the Covid-19 period. The location of this hotel is very far from the nearest MRT station. At least a 15-20 mins walk under the hot sun. It take about 30 mins walk to Clarke quay. There are a lot of restaurants along the Singapore River, so food isn’t a problem. Check in was rather time consuming. Our rooms stank of cigarettes and we had no idea why because this hotel is supposed to be smoke free. The rooms were tiny but luckily the ceiling was high so it wasn’t that bad. The toilet was extremely small and the sink was outside with the bed, which was very strange. I can’t imagine how dirty the toilet door handle is if everyone had to poop and exit to wash their hands in the room. The pillows were square pillows, not very

title: Staycation feedback
desc: Great environment for a staycation! Very relaxing, great pool environment, and overall a very pleasant experience. Even though it was for 1 day, the environment really made ne put all my worries and frustrations away 👍

title: Staycation!!
desc: Such a cosy place for a staycation. The staffs were so friendly and helpful. Thanks to Mr. Shafiq for the highest floor room and wedding anniversary F&B gift voucher. Also, thanks to Ms Gretchen for the very smooth checkout with a smiling face🥰.

title: Very disappointing services
desc: I am annoyed by the servicecrew before I checked in. He insisted that i have to stay at the lobby and wait .totally disappointed. He mentioned that my friends cannot visit my room as a guest. No valid reason is given to me.

title: 2D1N first staycay 2021
desc: Location wise, CBD area so the price quite ex for a room that small. Room itself was small but got that cosy feeling and comfortable enough to chill. Not typical design for the room as its high arch style, mirror design beside the bed which was kinda different too

title: Great place for Staycation
desc: We stayed for one night in the Loft Premier Room. Pros - Room was really modern and comfortable. Front desk service was great, special thanks to Jasmine for helping us with a room upgrade and complimentary breakfast! Cons - I feel like the overall customer service is slightly slower than other places, which might be because they're a smaller hotel. We asked for one set of cutlery which took 30-40 minutes to arrive after they said they would send it to our room. Overall, we enjoyed our stay and would come back again!

title: Very enjoyable Mix-and-Stay package, but it's time to do some serious maintenance...
desc: It's my first staycation of the year, and I had been eyeing M Social's Mix-and-Stay package for the longest time! Really looked forward to this whole staycay, though right from the start, it appeared the hotel was running late and my room wasn't yet ready when I checked in at the stipulated time of 3pm. Had to wait another 40 minutes for it. Regardless, I got my Loft Gallery room right at the end of the corridor -- Room 213 --which I believe gives me an extra bit of window around the corner that faces the Robertson Quay street! And as much as I truly enjoyed myself, there are some points I think the hotel staff should note. Because on close inspection, the room really could do with some serious overall maintenance. That bit of extra window at the corner I talked about has

title: Cocktail making session
desc: We booked a Mixology Rate which included a cocktail making session with Vlad the Bartender. What an interesting guy. Now when I hear the name Vlad I think of cocktails instead of blood. The session was eye opening, providing some basic knowledge of how bartenders mix cocktails. I was pretty pleased with how my mixture turned out and enjoyed it after the session was over together with my dinner. The cocktail shaker that was part of the package was out of stock on the day we stayed so that was a bit disappointing. I was informed at check out it would be mailed out when they have restocked but after almost two months, it still has not arrived. Will it be mailed out soon? Apart from this, the rest of the stay was enjoyable. However, the room and gym were both a bit small though.

title: Pleasantly Pleased
desc: Front desk staffs were very friendly. And I'm very grateful that they allowed late check-out until 1pm. Thankyou so much. Room was clean and beautiful. Would deff be back to stay again with my family and explore different rooms.

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: “CS Shafiq from the front desk was really kind and willing to attend any request. Appreciate his thoughtfulness by giving my wife a complimentary birthday treat” Alongside good amenities and general comfort of the room, an efficient staff that excels at personal attention is a must-have for all hotels. Thumbs up👍👍

title: Perfect getaway!
desc: The counter staff were approachable and friendly. Our Loft Gallery room was very well-furnished, and the shower was great. This was a steal, and the complementary breakfast at Beast & Butterflies was worthwhile as well. Great choice for our staycation overall!

title: 3D2N stay with Cocktail Workshop
desc: Shout out to Geraldine from the front desk. She was really sweet to us during our stay and the general hotel staff was very professional, helpful and cheerful, always greeting us with a smile. The restaurant staff were all very on the ball and servicd oriented. The food was pretty good too. Our cocktail workshop conducted by Vlat was a brief and short workshop (about 1hr) but was extremely fun and engaging. The room albeit a little small but the high ceiling expanded the space and cleanliness was on point. We opted out of house keeping and gained a late check out. Will definitely come back again!

title: Premiere Loft was beautiful
desc: The design of the place was just so cozy and my girlfriend and I had a really great time. It is located in a really good spot with a lot of bars and other attractions fir for young couples. The staff were also attentive and welcoming and guided us with all the checking in and out. They even extended our stay till 1pm. All in all we enjoyed our stay and we’d come back again!

title: Good in service.
desc: The design of the room is good as picture. Their workteam are helpful and cheerful. Thanks for the peaceful night provided. Strongly recommend this hotel to youngsters who love party or stay alone for long weekends.

title: Driving into rhe carpark was already a bad experience
desc: Wife booked a staycation to celebrate V-Day. Was excited but first impression driving into an unlit carpark was already a downer. The lights were out and the lots were narrow with multiple columns. Took the lift down to lobby and was with a scene from a refuge center with a long queue and makeshift tables for check-ins / outs. There were no clear signages and or staff on hand for crowd control. We had to ask around where to check in. We are still in the queue after 30 mins and it does not look like we will get checked in soon. There is no arrangements at all for the elderly in the queue or any offer of water or drinks. Very unpleasant even before we checked in.

title: Bad Customer Service Ruins Whole Experience!
desc: I booked a stay at M Social for Valentine’s Day since due to COVID-19, travel is permitted. As Singapore is a really small country, most couples would have opted for a staycation to celebrate the day but somehow the hotel can be unprepared for this day as check in took more than 2 hours! We had to wait in line outside of the hotel lobby while 2 staff check us in at the door. Instead of just giving us the keys to our room, they were only allocating room numbers. We then had to queue again in the lobby to the actual front desk to get our keys. At the front desk, I was then informed that my surprise was not done in the room. I requested 3 weeks ago for rose petals and an animal towel to be placed in the room for $15++ which I agreed via email. The staff who replied me, Daphne,

title: Awesomeness
desc: We had a great staycation experience from check in to check out. Guest Relations Manager Mariia was very patient and assisted with all our queries. A complimentary room upgrade was a special gesture that made our stay more memorable! My last minute request to arrange a bottle of champagne for my friend's special birthday was done with efficiency. I received the link to make a payment and the room was ready with a birthday card. It was overall a nice and fantastic stay!! Thanks to Mariia and her team :)

title: Msocial Hotel perfume workshop
desc: Had a great time finding my personalize scent with my wife. A quick 1hr session with a whole array of scents to pick, Novelia was super helpful and friendly, and an expert in finding the right combination for you to love. Went home with my own bottle, ready for my next date night! Will recommend!

title: Stayed on 27 Feb 2021
desc: Was quite upset with the concierge service. During Check-in: - Queue was super long and not sure if they will do late check out for us. (Only 2 counters open for check in) - Arrived at 3.30pm but I can only get my room at 4.25pm which is almost an hour! - Booking confirmation shown to the PRC lady (concierge) but still ask who did the booking~ Duh? During a few hours of my stay: - Rooms are pretty good - My room card cannot be tapped into the Swimming pool/Gym, went to the concierge again to ask for the access. Access was given to the pool/gym but...... I am unable to go back to my room level.... - I am not sure why the guy at the concierge ask me again how many guest I have when my guest are all registered. This is a birthday gift from my friends but I am experiencing a

title: Good for first time
desc: I like one of the Malay guy staff who assisted us upon check-in. He were so friendly, and humble. Easy and fun to talk to. He makes our checked-in process smoothly, and happy for a start! This is our third time staying in this hotel. Looking forward to stay here again anytime!

title: Something has gone wrong here
desc: Having stayed here before covid and then just a couple of months ago, we had good experiences so far. Until this stay. After checking in to our room, to discover that robe were not stocked, and the room had NO TOILET PAPER! Wow, for a reputable boutique brand that was unbecoming. Then morning breakfast was a surly staff followed by tea served with teabag thrown in (with the string and all) and hot water just poured on. See attached photo. Seriously, occupancy is not that great right now, so such ridiculous lapses should be far far from happening right?!?

title: Went for extra mile :)
desc: Stay at M Social during the school holiday period to celebrate my wife birthday for 2 nights from 15/3/21 - 17/3/21 in room 212. I called the hotline on the actual day asking for a simple birthday decoration. Room Reservation Defanie answered and greeted my call nicely and she put me on hold to check on my request. However, as per her colleague told her that I must request the decoration to be 3 days in advance. Nontheless, Receptionist Syafiq gave me a call back and full-filled my request to inform the housekeeping to set the last minute decoration and he played along with me upon checked in to not asking for the decoration charges $15++ infront of my wife as it was meant to be a surprise. Thank you Syafiq and housekeeping, for the decoration. Another thing was the room comes

title: Great staycation!
desc: Was a great staycation for us and M Social were pretty much different compare to other hotels/resort as they do offer some workshops you can sign up for during your stay, which pretty much added some colours to the typical staycay. You get to learn and have fun! We chose the 3d2n inclusive of perfume and cocktail workshops which was really bang for the buck and also get to try something new! Novelia was our perfume workshop and she’s very nice and patience and was also professional at her work when she helped us out on giving suggestions and options of the scents we may like! All and all it was a good experience first time being there!

title: Contemptuos staff behaviour
desc: This is my first ever complaint at any service establishment; I feel that it is necessary to alert the management to the particularly intentionally contemptuous behaviour of one staff member I had the displeasure of dealing with. I have no problems with M Social and the rest of the staff were pleasant and welcoming. I had my second stay at M Social Singapore from 24-25 March 2021 in room 468, for my birthday staycation. I had ordered food delivery and I called the front desk to request for some cutlery. A lady answered and told me that the cutlery would be sent up. After 25 minutes the cutlery hadn't been received and the food had gone cold, to which I called the front desk again. Shafiq Bin Senen picked the phone up. Upon hearing my request, which I put across politely, I was

title: Lack of hospitality
desc: My partner planned my birthday staycay which happened over the last weekend and experienced such bad customer service from the reservation team to swear he will not be back. Better if you choose its competitor which also offers loft room. As he engaged a vendor to decorate the room, he asked the team about check-in procedure. But kept receiving generic / robotic responses which were not helpful at all. After many back & forth, the team finally suggested him to check in at around 1+pm on the day, which is understandable as it depends on the hotel's occupancy rate that day. But when the vendor checked into the room at 1.30pm, my partner was shown photos of an uncleaned room (sink was filthy amongst other areas). When it was time for me to check in, there was long queue at the

title: Lack of personl touch
desc: We had chosen M Social for a 3 days 2 nights staycaution. In the orginial booking booking we had only booked 1 night however we decided to book another extra night. As it was a last min booking for the friday night we can't get the standard loft room and I just book a Premium loft room, thinking we can sort it out later. Upon checking in , I spoken to the front desk on the issues I had with the booking. As both type of rooms wasn't too far of the price range, I was hoping for an upgrade on the Thursday night. I was rather surprised that he offer to charge me extra $23 instaed of the $30++ for the update. This is a special discount cos it is my birthday. I was speachless for the above special discount I gotten. I wonder, if he will had advise me to check out and check in

title: Maison 21G Perfume Workshop @ M Social
desc: Good experience at the perfume workshop. Novelia was detail orientated and friendly throughout the whole process ^^ despite the wide variety of scents provided, Novelia very patiently helped us to look for the ideal scent that fit me. Overall, a fun and pleasant experience.

title: Perfume workshop
desc: Went with my girlfriend. It was great fun being able to mix from a huge selections of essences into a bottle of perfume to my preferences. Guide Novella was helpful and engaging and helped us through the experience when our noses gave up and couldn't distinct the different scents anymore.

title: Great service!
desc: My husband got burned by a hairdryer in the room and went to the front desk to complain. Hazirah, who was on duty immediately apologised and offered medical assistance but my husband refused as it was not that serious. We were worried for our daughter in the room so Hazirah gave us a room upgrade and even a late check out. She was quick in her actions and deeply apologised for the incident. We are really thankful to be given such hospitality. New room was great but the terrace seems to not be well maintained. It was fine as my daughter loves it. Everything else was great! Will definitely come here again.

title: Very bad
desc: Booked the loft room and did not expect it to be so small. The TV area was at the 2nd level, small and can barely fit 3 person. The sofa was placed side ways and sooo near to the TV. Called the reception for almost an hour before someone pick up. And guess what, I requested for Ice they tell me to buy from 711 then I requested for cup they tell me there is no room service here. Excuse me? Is this 4 star hotel service? Never coming back!

title: Will not return, feels like a 1 star hotel instead
desc: Bedroom were not clean at all but couldnt bother to inform the recep anymore because we have requested for mineral water and etc but non has been delivered. Upon calling recep it took us 927687 times only got a person to answer a call. Requested wine glass and have been instructed for self collection at lobby. Requested for ice bucket and ice and the recep asked us to walk to the 711 to get it ourselves. Was wondering was this even a 4 star hotel, it is more to a 1 star total self service hotel.

title: Mrs Briana
desc: We commend M staff Gretchen for the excellent service she gave.. She is very helpful and flexible, she knows very well how to consider customer’s requests. She knows how to unjust to accommodate further requests.

title: Would not return
desc: Booked this staycation using the SGRV. A few hits and misses about this hotel: Let’s talk about the good things first: - Early check-in – Take note to book your check in slot online. There is no notification from Klook to do so. Happened to view the M Social website and saw the check in reservation link. Booked the check in slot for 12pm, and the room was ready when we arrived at 12pm. - Room was generally clean and the bed was comfy but small (see misses below). - Standard hotel items e.g. hair dryer, bathrobes, bath slippers, and toiletries were provided. Tea and coffee were also provided, with a kettle. - Value for money – after utilising the SGRV, we paid only $118 for the room, so cannot really complain but thought I should give me honest feedback on the ‘misses’ so

title: Don't recommend it!
desc: when I was booking a short stay, I looked through reviews and it seemed like a nice place. To my surprise, the room was very dark, and most importantly not very clean, there were stains on the bed, the bedsheets and pillowcases were tearing apart, the shower had hair and mold all over. It was quite noisy as well, seemed like a bunch of teenagers booking the rooms to have parties. Not a nice to place for almost $400 for 2 nights, overpriced, won't recommend it at all.

title: Perfume customisation making workshop
desc: Attended this perfume making workshop. It was interactive and interesting workshop which allows you to smell different kinds of perfume. You are allowed to mix and match to ur preferred smell. If you need help to decide on your choices, the coordinator is most welcome to assist you. I have a hard time deciding on my choices and the coordinator help me by asking more on me and customize it based on my description. Kudos to the coordinator. The workshop is confirmed worth to attend

title: Birthday stay
desc: Booked m social due to the perfume workshop available & was not disappointed at all! Novelia was so patient with us & we had our customised concoctions in no time! Although the process of getting to the pool was a tad tedious, good stay overall I would say

title: Great location for a proposal!
desc: Gretchen and her team made my proposal possible with their flexibility and attentiveness to detail. I had some doubts about how the decorations will look and Gretchen's replies are not only prompt but also detailed, coupling descriptions with pictures. She and her team also accommodated to my request for receiving the flowers and placing them together with the towel swan/rose petals decoration. My proposal was only made possible by Gretchen and her team. Thanks guys! i will definitely be here again :)

title: 2-nights stay at Premier Loft Room
desc: Had booked directly with the hotel website, and was able to select the check-in timing this time round. Opted for 1230pm check-in and the queue was about 15-20 minutes as opposed to the 45 minutes queue for 2pm check-in that I experienced last year. Tried the Premier Loft Room where the bed is at the mezzanine level of the duplex. Upstairs felt cramped as the entire space was taken by the Queen Bed. Was initially worried as the air-conditioning vent is directly facing the bed. but did not encounter any issue. Sleep quality was good. The toiletries in Premier and Loft Gallery rooms are the exact ones in Alcove rooms. Perhaps it is time for the website to be updated as it was stating "Luxury Toiletries" for Premier Loft Room. The mini-fridge in the room is not that cold hence,

title: Average Stay but Great Activities
desc: The loft concept of the room was great. Not quite sure why the main wall was very grey with many holes. The top area was very comfy with the TV, but it would have been helpful to have blankets there. And I was just unlucky to book during heightened alert, so meals in the room. And the bathroom is tiny. Even though I’m petite, I kept hitting the wall with my elbows. However, great plus side was the perfume workshop. It was run by the lovely Maria and we have a wonderful time picking out scents and creating our own perfume. That plus others on their team like Geraldine, were what made my staycation at M Social worth it. :)

title: Short break
desc: My return visit to M Social for staycation. An advice: to book it on weekdays to maximum the pool facilities and lesser check-in queue. The first visit was full of crowds due to weekends. The front office team (Shafiq) were extremely accommodating and friendly. It was my partner 28th Birthday he gave my partner a box of Macarons upon check-in. Many thanks to Shafiq for his meticulous and humble hospitality service There were some hiccups, the minibar fridge wasn’t cold and dust in the toilet. Nonetheless, would definitely recommend a friend there and return for the reasonable room rates. Cheers!

title: Always a Joy!
desc: Stayed here in May 2021 in the midst of Covid. Despite the busy day, the front office staff Shafiq never fail to cheer our day up with his friendly persona and even offered us late check out. His attention to detail is a plus point. Breakfast was delicious though it was done in a takeaway mode. Will be looking forward to our stay here real soon!

title: Funky hotel
desc: Small room but nice interior. Philip Starck designed hotel . Weekends are busy with a lot of staycation guests. Only a maximum of 4 rooms for pool at each hour . Gym is small. 2 rooms per hour. Area surrounding the hotel is pleasant. Good base for one or two nights and we went for cafe and restaurant hopping

title: Terrible experience
desc: This is the worst staycay. 1. Check in time is 2pm. Arrived at 1+ to have lunch first. Super long queue OUTSIDE the entrance just to register. Was told room was not ready, which is ok as we wanted to get lunch first anyway, but was told room would only be ready by 3 and we would be called. 3pm no call. 3:15 still no call so we asked, still not ready and asked us to keep waiting. We waited a while longer and still nothing. They then gave us two drinks voucher. Room was only ready at 3:45. 2. Check in was super unsmooth. They called us to say room is ready and just need to collect key from the counter and no need to queue. Yes we didn’t queue, but the front desk staff had no idea who we were and what room type we were getting. Also told us to pay using credit card upfront because

title: M Social-ising
desc: Booked a package which included 2 workshops with Klook. Check in is outside the main door of the hotel and thankfully, there was only 1 couple in front of us.  After that, we could enter the building to pick up our keys to our room. The Alcove cosy room is really cosy and since the room is not very big, there was quite thoughtful arrangement of fixtures.  The washbasin is beside the work table and to us, it was good that there was no need to wait for anyone using the bathroom to come out before we could wash our hands.  The toilet is separate from the shower and there is a knob on the frame to open or close the blind that shields or exposes the bathroom from the rest of the room. The table lamp was very dim so don't bother to do stitching and embroidery there.  I like the way

title: 1 night staycation on a weekend 16th May
desc: Our 3rd staycation for the month, and M social adds in to an amazing stay to the list. Room was clean, staff was pleasant and since it was a very short stay we do not have anything to complain about. It was short and sweet. Will recommend it to friends!

title: June school holiday
desc: Shafiq was very accomodative towards us. A very pleasant stay overall and we are absolutely happy. My kids really enjoy the pool here. Room was clean and very instagramable. Will look forward to our next stay here

title: Recommended!
desc: My stay here was amazing! Hazirah, who checked my partner & I in was extremely bubbly and always smiling even though with the mask on. Our check in was fast free too and Hazirah even gave us a higher floor as per our request. Room is clean just that it is smaller than expected. It was meant to be cosy anyways so it is nothing to complain about. Will definitely come here again, cheers!

title: Slightly disappointed by the Mix and Stay package
desc: Booked the Mix and Stay package specially for the cocktail making workshop, but due to Phase 3 Heightened Alert measures, the Cocktail making workshop was cancelled and instead was just sent some cocktails to the room. Quite disappointed because that was the highlight of the stay and was something that I was looking forward to. I do not think that the replacement was acceptable at all. Imagine someone signing up for a baking class, but instead got a cake instead, this is definitely not the same or equivalent at all. But other than that, the stay was great.

title: M Social stay
desc: Really strange pre check in counter before the actual check in counter. Could have employed an online pre check in so their guests don’t have to wait too long and there wouldn’t be more crowd. This hotel also doesn’t provide face masks as part of a sanitary kit (a really nice touch that every other hotel I’ve been to has done) so bring your spares! Stayed in the loft gallery, shower area was just gross. Would never come back! Wish I had read the reviews before I booked.

title: Nice neighbourhood and a stylish and cosy hotel
desc: Nice residential neighbourhood, feels quite unique for Singapore, beside the river, no major roads nearby so quiet. But if planning to use public transport alot quite inaccessible as no bus stop or mrt nearby. However, it is near the city so a grab/gojek does not cost much. Food around here is also not cheap, I saw some ordering delivery for lunch/dinner and days I wasn't out i did too. Limited parking. Would be fantastic if you can bring a foldie and cycle the river. Can park in the car park and I feel unlikely to get stolen but just lock it up as no where to tether it to. Recommend to book the pool, it's quite a nice one. Gym is good too. The room is very nice and comfortable and personally I like the in-room sink, saves space and also convenient. My room also had

title: Pleasant 3days2nights staycation
desc: Beautiful rooms and property. Staff if prompt and they take pride in their service which can be seen how they serve and assist guests. We had encounter a issue on our first night as the AC didn’t work properly. DM Ras had arranged another room for us promptly and personally assisted us to move to new room. His passion can be seen for the hospitality on how he was apologetic and assisted us. The breakfast was good and worth for waking up early in the morning. Overall, worth the money and thank you for services rendered. Keep it up M Social team.

title: Lovely loft design but poor service
desc: Unique room design that’s lovely for a change as we upgrade to premiere loft. Service was below expectations. Even we took the initiative to smile it was ignored. The loft room is nice even though is small. Definitely well design. If you love style and design it’s good for a stay. However the Aircon was not cool. We could not have a good night sleep as we are really sweating. We ask for extra tea bags at night and it was deliver to us within mins by Noveiia. She was the only smiling staff that I met during this whole staycation. The highlight was the perfume workshop. It was conducted by Noveiia. It was done professionally and making us feel comfortable. We will highly recommend this workshop. We each bought home a bottle of personalized perfume.

title: Small yet Hip Hotel
desc: We checked in without any expectations as we just want a relaxing 2-night midweek break. We checked out all happy and satisfied with what the hotel offered. We started off loving the smell of the lobby and the stylishly funky interiors. The hotel gives off an edgy cool vibe, although a bit cramped in space but they manage to maximize it to the best they can. We love the neighborhood. It’s lovely to take a stroll by the river especially at night. Lots of restos and coffeeshops, Limoncello, Common Man Coffee Roasters and Toby’s Estate are nearby. The pool is alright, love the top floor location, though the area is surrounded by high-rise condos yet greeneries are placed strategically to give you privacy while lounging or swimming.

title: Expected better from the reviews
desc: Room is small and design on the inside is quite plain. Room is quite dark and not much space for to do work on a working desk. Pool was basic and average, able to suntan when the sun was out. Did not able to test out the gym as it was closed. Overall good to chill, but unable to cast Netflix to the TV provided too.

title: Birthday Staycay!
desc: Great stay for couples who are looking to rewind over the weekend! Also a quick shoutout to the staff who helped us with our request for joining the two single beds when they could not change room for us. Hope to visit when P2HA is is over! Thank you M hotel!

title: Customer service review
desc: The receptionist was kind and attended to us politely though the queue was long and overwhelming. She even gave us free macarons for the time lost we had to wait for our room to get ready. Overall, excellent customer service.

title: Great Hotel with friendly staff
desc: Great hotel location with interesting design of room and popular cafes around.. Nice and friendly staff, especially Shafiz who was extremely nice. Pool is available for use but must be reserved in advance. Room was slightly dusty and sink wasn’t cleaned thoroughly though staff responded quickly to rectify the situation.

title: Leisure stay at M Social
desc: Our stay at M Social was beautiful and fun. Room was cosy enough for me and the room was cool. Pool was great and spacious. Was assisted by the wonderful Novelia who helped with our stay. Would definitely come back!

title: Staycation At Studio M Hotel
desc: Hotel was good and adequate space. Good location for staycation. Prices are good and the food is excellent. Initially wanted to only come for the stay as the reviews are good, but was impressed with the facilities as well. Will recommend

title: Hotel Review
desc: I would like to compliment Shafiq as he gives us a free upgrade. He gives us warm hospitality and fast service. Despite the busy crowd, he manages to handle well. We will definitely come again for the dayuse and staycation for the next round. Thank you.

title: Engagement and 30th big figure change and Last day of service in Clearstream - Triple Celebration
desc: Best service and seamless check-in 😉 we highly recommend Hazirah as she was courteous and helpful. Lovely loft with cosy vibes! We would definitely return. Thank you for giving us an unforgettable and commerative experience!

title: We love it!
desc: Stayed here for my girlfriend’s birthday and was amazed at the exterior. Upon registration we were greeted with bubbly staff! Check in was really fast. Front desk Hazirah gave us a late check out as we came in quite late. Really appreciate that. She catered to our high floor request as well. Room is amazing. I saw a lot of reviews about it being small but I feel like it’s a common room size. I love that we were greeted by Hazirah every time we come in and out of the hotel. We love the hospitality given here and will definitely come back.

title: Social M was Marvellous!
desc: I stayed for a night. Mend my broken heart. The stay was great. The weather was awesome. The staff name Shafiq was friendly and professional. The cleaner even help to open my door cause I was a noob. It's my first solo staycay. 😅 But thank you for the great accomodations, guys.

title: Staycation
desc: It was a wonderful place to escape from the reality for a moment. Room was wonderful and comfortable . Front desk name shafiq cater to my request. Good job m social! Got breakfast as the very last min and he amend our booking smoothly. Will visit the place again!! 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

title: Great experience
desc: Msocial has always been our first choice when it comes to staycation. cleanliness, hygiene, service, facilities, view from the pool and room features has always been our top priority, throughout our enjoyable stay here, staffs were/are always approachable especially Ms./Mrs. Geraldine, she has always delivered exemplary service towards us during our stay here. Would and have recommended this place to our friends! We’d hope to come back again!

title: M not sociable
desc: Whilst Philippe Starke did a great job with the design of the room, the stay in its entirety left so, so, so much to be desired. The service was nothing but abysmal and the night shift staff including the duty manager had an aggressive stance and this did not improve in the morning where there were no friendly greetings aside from the housekeeper when we were checking out. Despite checking in later at night, we were allocated a room that had sewage smells emanating from the toilet, the shower stall floor was wet before we even used it along with the flush (which gives an impression that the room was used prior to check-in). Despite specifically requesting a bidet upon reservation and assured that we were allocated one during check- in, there wasn’t one when we got to the room.

title: Great hotel! Casual but yet comfortable!
desc: Very good experience with the hotel staffs and accommodation for a 2 days 1 night stayed at loft queen with free wine and desserts as we signed up for memebership with the hotel, just one thing to highlight is the space that is limited at the washrooms. Will recommended to friends and will come back again also will keep in mind of this hotel at overseas too!

title: Wow!!!
desc: *DISCLAIMER this is not my picture. Got it from Google as I forgot to take pictures of the room as I slept the entire stay – bed is too comfy* Queue was quite long but understandable as it is a weekend. Pre check in queue was handled by friendly staffs. I like that they greeted everyone who comes to them. Requested for a room with good view but it was already fully booked, what a shame. Location wise is ok. A lot of popular bars and cafe along Robertson Quay, follow the river to Clarke Quay and Central. Heard from friends that there isn’t housekeeping at night which is understandable as well because of this Covid, some things have to be cut down so I was already prepared to head down to get the cutleries when I called for it but Hazirah from front desk was kind to send the

title: scent making workshop!
desc: stayed @ M social with my bf. they had a free workshop for guests. we left with a new scent! the session duration was just right and the instructor was patient and helpful too! thank you for the pleasant first experience :)

title: Perfume Making Workshop
desc: There is a very good variety of scents to choose from and Mariia did a very good job explaining and guiding us. I have learnt a lot about perfume and had a great experience getting my very own unique perfume!!:)

title: Staycation
desc: Thanks for the good service Shafiq and shahul. The check in service is fast and efficient. Bed were comfortable. The hotel very instagrammable. However I feel that the restaurant can have more improvements.

title: SERVICE REVIEW
desc: Excellent Service from Mr Shafiq & Shahul! They gave us a free upgrade upon our 2nd check in in 2 days! The stay was comfortable and the staff here are super friendly and attentive to the customers needs

title: excellent service and clean comfy room
desc: Mr Shafiq was really helpful when we checked in. He was delightful and nice enough to give us a room upgrade as it was my birthday. The rooms were clean and the bed was comfortable. Overall it was a pleasant experience.

title: Maison 21 G Workshop is Amazing!
desc: Really enjoyed the Maison 21 G Perfume Workshop! Our Workshop Facilitator, Marila, has a great personality and very knowledgeable! Thank you Maison 21 G, M Social, and Marila for the wonderful experience!

title: Maison 21G perfume workshop
desc: It was an interesting workshop to look for the perfect scent for myself. It took some time to mix and match and viola, found it. It was fun though. The instructor was very nice and friendly too. Recommended if you cant find the perfect scent off the shelf in stores, customise one on this workshop.

title: M Social staycation
desc: Jessica was very helpful with the check in and explained to us everything needed. Very efficient and informative. Great service. Only issue was the carpark. No complimentary was given. Would have been better.

title: Perfume making workshop
desc: It’s very fun and engaging! There’s a lot of scents to experiment with. You get to learn your style by answering a quiz. From there, you get to customise one to bring home. Will be coming back again!!

title: Staycation
desc: it’s aesthetically pleasing and great customer service. however, i’m kind of upset because before booking, i was told that i will still be able to swim even if i only had my first dose of vaccination. turns out, i’m not allowed to. so it’s kind of upsetting but all is good.

title: Thanks Geraldine and Raymond
desc: Had booked the Alcove Terrace Room for my partner's birthday. Upon arrival I was greeted by Raymond for check-in and my queries were attended to swiftly while processing the check-in for me.   Special thanks to Geraldine for the Loft Gallery Room which I appreciate it a lot! Otherwise, the planned décor at the terrace for the initial room type will be soaked in rain.   My overall stay is a pleasant one and will definitely be back to try out the other room types.

title: Staycation for fiancé’s birthday!
desc: Impeccable service. They respond to queries and gets items like food, soap and blanket delivered fast! Concierge friendly and fast! The booking is done very smoothly as well! Enjoyed my stay here so much! Thank you☺️ Will come again!

title: Staycation
desc: Check in was very fast,thank you to Shafiq for accommodating to my request for an upgrade..he was very professional and patient :) Thank you so much for providing us such great facilities and hospitality services. we are glad that we got a chance to experience your service.

title: Home away from home
desc: My second stay., even better than the first. Front desk was spot on during check-in and esoecuskky during check out by stsff Gref. Awesome and approachable service.. Room was cosy. Service was good despite all the safe management measures in place. Will be back again real soon

title: Anniversary staycation
desc: Having a great time here as novelia is very helpful and friendly !! Cosy room with terrace and good location! And thumbs up for Novelia We will definitely come back again Gonna enjoy our stay here !!!

title: First time @ M social
desc: Thank you Ms Hazirah.😊. Friendly staff. Fast check in. 👍😊 All is good. Well done!! The alcove Terrace is good to have a outside space. But if have 2 chair will be good. Fast service of answer all my enquiry. Pool easy to book. The room basin is outside is it good as well. Only one issues is the Lobby and outside abit dark.😊

title: M Social Perfume Workshop
desc: The workshop is interesting and we enjoyed it greatly as a couple. Free perfume bottle and great explanation and guidance throughout. It came as a klook package with cocktail workshop. Both are great!

title: Can't ask for much more!
desc: Booked a staycation to celebrate my partner's birthday, and she loved the entire experience. The service from the hotel staff was impeccable, and the perfume workshop was truly a unique experience. Highly recommended!

title: Hotel Stay and Maison 21 G Workshop
desc: The Concierge staff was very friendly and made the check-in process seamless. The lobby was a little warm though. The room was cozy and comfortable though the air-conditioning was a little faulty. Mariia has been really informative and helpful with the workshop. She was really fun to engage with and made it a very pleasant experience for my partner and I! :)

title: Great Stayca!!
desc: Was warmly greeted by Ray during the check-in process. Although the pool and gym was fully booked due to the new covid regulations, but it can't be helped since we checked-in on the weekends. The room was clean and comfy. Upon check-out, Gretchen is there to send you off with the most lovely smile. Kudos to the team!

title: Maison21G Perfume workshop
desc: Good experience and interesting activity, i enjoy the workshop a lot, it’s a good idea for staycation during this period, it is suitable for couples or a group of friends, if you are looking for some gifts to send to your friends or family, this is the good one for you

title: Cleaning process is not known
desc: The hotel does not tell us about what their housekeeping processes are like...not even a brief description of the steps they take to ensure that our rooms are clean. So, I don't know if the service I received was up to their standard as I am not aware of them and makes the hotel seem less transparent with us. Would appreciate a housekeeping card in the future.

title: Cozy and well-appointed!
desc: Had a great couple of days' stay at M Social! Although the Alcove Room was small as expected, I found it rather well-appointed, probably only missing a bidet (still more convenient even though the WC was just next to the shower) and perhaps a floor lamp at the far end of the room to boost and balance out the lighting. Amenities wise, I loved both the pool and gym. The pool was long and very swimmable, I was able to do proper laps. The gym while not huge, had the right equipment which also looked relatively new; music was cute. Perhaps a nitpick would be a little more upkeep of the pool area. Throughout my stay, the loungers and umbrellas seemed to be just left to the elements, 1 or 2 umbrellas looked a little precarious. Front desk could be a tad warmer and friendlier but I
